items.entry: 面纱反对奥德之手。

entries: 一个由间谍、小偷和刺客组成的秘密网络，面纱是安克哈勒最大的犯罪集团。它是奥德之手秩序的一个混乱的对立面。
关于面纱的公开信息不多；其成员的身份和个人细节甚至在组织内部也是保密的，那些泄露这些秘密的人往往在被逮捕之前就被发现被谋杀。面纱在城市中没有永久的总部，不断更换基地以掩盖其踪迹。
虽然面纱在这次冒险中没有起到作用，但你可以在自己的冒险中把这个派别作为对手，以安克哈勒为背景。

entries.name: Alluvium District
entries: 冲积区是安克哈勒最北端的街区。这个地区因在该区边界的悬崖上开采出丰富的粘土而得名，它混合了密集的住宅区、粘土带状开采的地点以及用于口头表演和工匠市场的宽敞广场。

entries.title: Alluvium District

entries.name: Alluvium Gardens
entries: {@i Arboretum}
被称为冲积层花园的树木园因其树篱和花盆的细致、几何布局而闻名，模仿了该地区陶瓷大师的瓷砖艺术。在经过一天漫长的粘土运输后，矿工们经常退到花园的树荫下，放松心情，与朋友聊天。花园的中心是一片无花果、杏和石榴树的树林，花园里的游客可以自己动手摘取任何他们能拿到的成熟水果。花园里还有库拉克，这是一种难以栽培的水果，原产于马尔凯的丛林，有坚硬的、带刺的外壳，果肉柔软、甜美，像芒果一样。

entries.name: Opalite Forum
entries: {@i Entertainment Square}
八根由粘土矿的废弃沙子和碎片制成的五彩玻璃柱子，环抱着这个位于冲积区中心地带的宽大的石头院子的外面。蛋白石论坛是该区居民的中心聚会场所，经常用来举办节日和神圣的庆祝活动。
论坛也是来自艾克桑德里亚各地的说书人讲述他们故事的地方。白天，孩子们聚集在年长的编年史家身边，他们用祖先的口述传统讲述埃克桑德里亚的建国传说和灾祸故事。到了晚上，论坛被一群新兴的作家所占据，他们大声朗读自己的最新作品，有时还会进行诗意和智慧的友好对决。

entries.name: Goliaths of Exandria
entries: 艾克桑德里亚的巨人是一个强大的民族，他们的血管里流淌着石头巨人的血液。他们大多身高超过7英尺，拥有天生的强大体魄。他们淡灰色的皮肤上有深灰色的斑点或条纹。
在埃克桑德里亚的某些地方，巨人喜欢竞争和记分，计算他们的事迹，统计他们的成就以与他人比较。最重要的是，他们被驱动着去超越他们过去的成就。
埃克桑德里亚的巨人非玩家角色通常精通{@skill Athletics}技能，以及以下一种或两种特性。

entries.name: Mountain Born
entries: 歌利亚对冷损伤有抵抗力，并能自然适应高海拔地区，包括海拔20000英尺以上。

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: 在确定其运载能力和可推、可拖、可举的重量时，巨人算作大一码。

entries.name: Sa'irah Mines
entries: {@i Clay Strip Mines}
萨伊拉带状矿区的棱角分明的山脊在冲积区的其他地方若隐若现，工作期间，锤击和钻孔的嘈杂声几乎一直充斥着附近的街道。在这里收获的大部分粘土被用于建筑和修理建筑物。其中一些是由工匠加工的，他们已经完善了混合和烧制粘土的艺术，创造出色彩鲜艳的马赛克瓷砖和其他陶瓷作品。

The quarry is run by a gruff, middle-aged miner named Zala Keencutter, a neutral, tiefling {@creature thug}. Though he puts up an abrasive facade, Zala has a shy and empathetic soul, and he wants dearly to work up the courage to read his prose writings at the Opalite Forum some evening.

entries.name: Cerulean Palace
entries: 天蓝色宫殿的紫色和蓝色尖顶在其边缘反射出太阳的光芒，就像阳光下的瀑布。大多数公民只熟悉宫殿华丽的外表，上面覆盖着闪闪发光的青金石和绿松石图案，还有黄铜装饰。宫殿的内部通常只允许有公务的人进入，包括用于审议、辩论和判决法律事务的房间。宫殿下面有一个迷宫般的地牢，叫做奥布拉克（Oblag），也被称为 "猩红奥布拉克"。
在宫殿建筑群的中心是审判厅。审判室的外表面覆盖着复杂的瓦片。阳光透过构成屋顶的半透明蓝水晶窗格，照亮了里面的空间。在一个高高的石台上，坐着一个精雕细琢的青铜宝座，上面镶嵌着蓝宝石--J'mon Sa Ord的宝座，据说是领袖在宫殿最高塔顶的个人住所里使用的宝座的复制品。在审判厅，最可怕的罪行的肇事者被绳之以法。J'mon Sa Ord在主持这些听证会时，会下楼占据这个座位，然后亲自作出判决。

entries.name: The Circlet Walk
entries: Circlet Walk主要是一个住宅区，不过这里也可以找到酒馆和其他商业场所。该区的建筑物非常密集，人们习惯于从一个屋顶跳到另一个屋顶，而不是在狭窄的道路上穿行。

entries.name: Lyrean Linen
entries: {@i Front for the Black Market}
乍一看，Lyrean Linen和其他染布店一样，每根椽子上都挂着长长的布条，店门口摆放着大桶的彩色液体。如果顾客要求把布染成 "白石绿"，就可以看到店里的其他商品：一种叫做 "苏德 "的危险麻醉品和其他在黑市上出售的违禁品。

The shop is run by Bas and Kovra Lyrean, twin sisters who are neutral evil, half-elf {@creature Bandit||bandits}. Originally alchemists by trade, they use their knowledge to brew magic potions deemed by the Hands of Ord to be too dangerous for public consumption.

entries.name: Step Aside
entries: {@i Inn and Tavern}
这家舒适的机构是当地人的最爱，以其美味的食物和欢快的气氛而闻名，邀请人们从他们的日常烦恼中 "走出来"，休息一会儿。小酒馆的窗台和吧台的花盆里盛开着沙漠之花，楼上的房间里飘荡着厨房里的大蒜饭和炒肉的香味。在最闷热的日子里，酒馆提供招牌甜点：Haluh，这是一道来自马克西斯海岸西南部的菜肴，由刨冰和甜牛奶组成，上面有木瓜或库拉克、椰子条和甜紫薯。

The place is run by two former mercenaries: Irawan, a lawful good, elf {@creature veteran}, and his husband Calinao, a neutral good, elf {@creature druid}. Unbeknownst to many, Irawan and Calinao were among the original Scarbearers who came to Ank'Harel during the city's nascent years and defiantly showed to J'mon Sa Ord the scars they earned during their defense of the realm. The couple has long since retired from mercenary life, but they serve the people of the city in other ways. If the phrase "Pardon my steps as I pass through" is whispered to either Irawan or Calinao, they'll lead the individual to a safe house beneath the tavern, where the beneficiary is welcome to stay until other arrangements can be made.

entries.name: Guided District
entries: 引导区包含了几个礼拜场所，每个主要神灵都有代表。该区的建筑比城市的其他地区更具装饰性；许多寺庙都有复杂的马赛克装饰，并以带有镀金尖顶的尖塔为冠。

entries.title: Guided District

entries: 在安克哈雷尔发现的少数流浪者经常出现在这个地区的小巷子里，许多寺庙都派代表在这里为受苦的人提供食物和衣服。奥德之手（Hands of Ord）也在这里保持着明显的存在。

entries.name: Blessing Well
entries: {@i Holy Site}
导游区的中心是一个被称为祝福井的凹形石院。一行雪花石砖盘旋而下，一直延伸到广场的中心，以井本身为终点，其深蓝色的砖块上有银色的斑点，代表着夜空的样子。
祝福井并不是专门为某个神灵而设的，而是一个公共空间，供安克哈勒的任何人寻求精神指导。在许多情况下，一个人被放进井里，远离城市的亮光和喧嚣，以平静他们的思想并与神灵交流；几个小时后，他们出现了，眼睛里闪烁着新的目标，因为他们在井的深处经历了神圣的愿景。
这口井的水与城市运河中的水是分开的，只用于神圣的仪式。饮用井水会给饮用者带来可怕的神圣诅咒，即使是最强大的凡人魔法也无法解除。

entries.name: Crossings of Eventide
entries: {@i Necropolis}
超过两百英尺高的 "事件十字路口 "是一系列刻在导游区边界悬崖上的坟墓。浮雕描绘了墓主人最重要的事迹，装饰在封存坟墓的石板之间。日落时分，悬挂在整个墓园的水晶火炉捕捉到渐渐消失的光线，将附近的悬崖边涂上粉红色、橙色和紫色的鲜艳色彩。
在悬崖的底部，有一座供奉死亡之母的小庙。在安克哈雷尔（以及整个马尔凯特的大部分地区），人们对死亡和命运之神的看法与在怀德蒙、塔尔多雷和伊塞拉的土地上对她的看法不同。没有了 "乌鸦女王 "的称号，在这里，这位神灵与黄昏、不可避免和时间的流逝有关，她主持着生与死之间的过渡。一些马尔克斯教派将她称为 "黄昏之神"，将她描绘成一只眼睛敏锐的秃鹰，戴着金色的葬礼面具，羽毛的颜色从日落的色调到午夜的黑色。

entries.name: Temple of the Mentor
entries: {@i Temple to Ioun and Headquarters of the Cobalt Soul}
导师神庙的入口处镶嵌着三只睁开的眼睛，以钴蓝色为背景。献给伊欧恩的神庙与其说是礼拜堂，不如说是图书馆，它同时也是钴灵魂图书馆的马克西亚分部的运作基地。寺庙圣殿的墙壁上摆满了书架，所有的书架都被精心编目的书籍、卷轴和期刊填满，供公众查阅。
楼梯从避难所通向居民的公寓和剧本室，再往上则是钴之魂高级成员的宿舍。楼梯从避难所向下通向一扇锁着的门，这扇门只有特定的人和钴之魂的高级馆长才有钥匙。这扇门后面是钴之魂庞大的地下档案馆，里面有各种神秘的知识，是特意不向公众开放的。整个广袤的空间被{@spell continual flame}的法术所照亮。

At the high curator's behest, a sardonic monk named Iwo Zalarre, a chaotic good, half-orc {@creature monastic operative|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}), oversees all visitors to the public archives and registers all requests for access to the private archive. Though just as dedicated to Ioun's service as any other member of the Cobalt Soul, Iwo is eager to get out of the temple and take part in a challenging mission.

entries.name: Tower of Memory
entries: {@i Headquarters of the Sentinels of Memory}
八角形的记忆之塔位于指导区的最西边，以一个稍微弯曲的角度伸出地面。当记忆哨兵的创始人，守望者特拉斯特，购买了这座建筑，作为他的小规模但狂热的追随者的家时，这座建筑就被计划拆除了。此后，哨兵们几乎没有花时间修理这座建筑，所以象牙色的砖块之间仍有裂缝，木质地板每走一步都会吱吱作响。

Watcher Byron, a lawful evil, gnome {@creature veteran}, oversees most of the sentinels' operations for Watcher Trast and rarely leaves the Tower of Memory. Gentle of voice but volatile of temper, Byron has grown increasingly impatient with his faction's political strategy and has begun to plot more aggressive ways of hampering the Allegiance of Allsight's excavation of Cael Morrow. Though he would never admit it, Byron secretly longs to see the wonders of Cael Morrow for himself.

entries.name: The Ridge
entries: 坐落在城市三个高原之一的山脊，是安克哈勒的工业区。其街道上挤满了铁匠铺、铸造厂、船厂和仓库。

entries.name: Alsfarin Union Shipyard
entries: {@i Skyship Conglomerate}
艾克桑德里亚最重要的飞艇生产商，阿尔斯法林联盟，其运营基地位于安克哈雷尔。它的船厂在工作时发出雷鸣般的锤声，并闪烁着奥术能量的光芒，除了雇员之外，任何人都不能进入。Alsfarin联盟以铁腕方式保护其布鲁姆斯通的供应--这种魔法水晶可以神奇地支撑起天空之船。

由于整个艾克桑德里亚所有运行中的飞艇每年都必须到船厂进行一次维护和修理，所以船厂附近的地区已经成为世界各地文化的大杂烩。好奇的人们可以在珀西勋爵服饰店（Lord Percy Haberdashery）购买来自塔尔多雷（Tal'Dorei）的标志性头饰（这个名字并非由珀西瓦尔-德-罗洛三世勋爵认可），然后光顾卖来自怀德蒙（Wildemount）的达马利港的糕点的小车，沉浸在遥远的伊塞拉（Issylra）的瓦塞尔海姆（Vasselheim）酿造的啤酒中，所有这些都在同一个城市街区。

entries.name: Sunfire Forge
entries: {@i Smithy}
太阳火锻造厂部分建在与该区北侧接壤的山的一侧，是安克哈雷尔的首要铁匠和武器制造商。它的名字来自于锻造厂独特的动力来源：液体阳光，从其屋顶上的彩虹色晶体中获取的。这种集中的能量形式所产生的持续热量，使其能够创造出精细的金属制品，其中包含了脆弱的成分，如奥术矿物和宝石粉。两股发光的太阳之火从锻炉倾斜的屋顶两侧倾泻而下，然后停在石头水库中，液体在被输送到锻炉之前被储存在那里。

The Sunfire Forge is under the control of Rohaya Tak, a neutral good, half-elf {@creature commoner}, who inherited the business from her mother two decades ago. An innovative metalworker, Rohaya combines her smithcraft with shrewd business intuition. In addition to crafting blades and tools, Rohaya uses the forge to produce cannons for use on sailing ships and skyships, modeled after the bronze cannons of her family's homeland in southern Marquet.

entries.name: River District
entries: 河区的空气中弥漫着湿润的泥土气息，这里是城市大部分农业生产的地方。成片的灌溉农田与较新的水培农场交织在一起，而且用运河代替道路，连接该区的各个分区。大多数人乘坐小艇和轻型独木舟在河区的运河中穿行。

entries.name: Life Dome
entries: {@i Nexus of the Canals}
这个玻璃穹顶为安克哈雷尔的水源加冕：这个城市就是围绕这个绿洲建立的。河区的所有运河都起源于生命穹顶，该结构是一个庆祝中心和城市历史的纪念碑。到了晚上，穹顶内部神奇地被漂浮的蓝色和绿色发光体照亮，将附近地区描绘成彩色的光影。
生命穹顶也有一个重要的农业用途。由于填充安克哈勒绿洲的水不是来自自然源头，而是来自众神行为所创造的地下洞穴，因此水位经常波动。水可能会涌出或减缓到涓涓细流，分别威胁到洪水或旱灾的发生。为了解决这个问题，生命穹顶将任何超过公认水位的水瞬间转化为蒸汽，并将其储存在穹顶的缝隙中。当水位下降时，储存的水蒸气又被转化为液体，并被输送到灌溉渠中。

The Allegiance of Allsight scholar Carliale Kroogan, a neutral good, gnome {@creature scholarly excavator|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}), is currently the chief supervisor for the Life Dome. Lonely and a bit of a chatterbox, Carliale is always ready to chat about arcane theory with any individual who comes his way.

entries.name: Old Man Kruuk's
entries: {@i Bakery and Fence for Stolen Goods}

Old Man Kruuk, a neutral, half-orc {@creature bandit captain}, is a mediocre baker; his pitas are tough and chewy, and the caramel of his baklava is bitter and burned. Kruuk's talent lies in his true vocation as a fence for stolen goods. After an individual gains his trust, he drops his bumbling baker facade and reveals himself to be an excellent businessperson, able to sweet-talk even the most uncompromising thieves into a favorable deal.
克鲁克老人的行动范围远远超过了任何人的猜测，甚至超过了他作为一个人应有的能力。一些造谣者认为克鲁克是 "面纱 "的高级成员，但没有人证实这一推测。

entries.name: Steam Gardens
entries: {@i Arboretum and Bathhouse}
蒸汽花园是安克-哈雷尔植物园中最奢华的地方，因为它包括一个澡堂和温泉，所以很受欢迎。来自运河的水被输入到花园的神奇温泉中，这些温泉在释放按摩水柱时冒着气泡。

An hour's visit at the most exclusive spa costs 5 gp. Characters who spend 8 hours eating, luxuriating, and relaxing in the spa awaken the next morning with {@dice 1d10} {@book temporary hit points|PHB|9|Temporary Hit Points} that last for the next 24 hours, in addition to the usual benefits of finishing a long rest.

entries.name: Sand-Herald District
entries: 作为安克-哈雷尔的军事活动和执法中心，沙-赫尔德区是奥德之手的总部所在地。该组织的据点是该区的一个主要特征，仅次于塞鲁利亚宫。
沙赫德区的住宅主要由富人居住：有势力的商人、因在审判之杯的比赛中获胜而获得财富的有功之臣，以及当地的歌曲和舞台名人。该区也是安克-哈雷尔的天空港所在地。

entries.name: Bowl of Judgment
entries: {@i Combat Tournament Arena}

On the north side of the Sand-Herald District, an immense circular depression has been carved into the ground. The Bowl of Judgment is where warriors are made into legends. Sporting tournaments are held here on a regular basis, highlighted by a yearly event known as the Grand Tournament. At each competition, spectators wager on who will be the winner of the upcoming match. Anyone who can pay the entry fee of 20 gp can sign up to compete. Although most bouts end with one participant yielding or falling {@condition unconscious}, death is always a possible outcome in the Bowl of Judgment.
希德-卡尔托（Sheed Caltor）是一个混沌中立的兽人贵族，是碗里的风流人物。希德最关心的是他的形象、他的收入和他在安克哈勒上层社会中的地位。

entries.name: Indala Skyport
entries: {@i Skyship Port}
进行飞艇旅行的主要是那些希望避免远洋航行的时间和危险，或在沙漠中长途跋涉的人，以及那些能够负担得起这种交通费用的人。因达拉天空港可以追溯到天空船旅行的最早时期。它的中央航站楼因其精心设计的彩色玻璃天花板而闻名于世，它描绘了艾克桑德里亚表面的马赛克，上面有发光的小点在移动，代表阿尔斯法林联盟目前正在飞行的每艘飞艇。
从因达拉天空港飞出的航班连接到Exandria的其他主要天空港，包括Issylra的Vasselheim，Wildemount的Damali港，以及Tal'Dorei的Emon和Whitestone。

entries.name: Ord Bastion
entries: {@i Headquarters of the Hands of Ord}
与塞鲁利亚宫的大量装饰建筑相比，奥德堡的高墙是由坚固的泥砖砌成的，除了简单的、有棱有角的雕刻外，没有其他装饰，这些雕刻装饰着建筑的瞭望塔的顶部。
奥德堡主要是作为奥德之手成员的军营和训练中心，但由于加入奥德之手是一个终身的承诺，许多成员把他们的家人带到堡垒居住，创造了一个由爱和忠诚约束的小社区。

entries.name: Sigil District
entries: 西格尔区是安克哈雷尔较小的地区之一，但也是最繁忙的地区之一。整个城市的人们每天都来这里，在该区的各种学习中心学习。从基本的技能和行业到最深奥的奥术理想，各种智力追求在Sigil区都有体现。

entries.title: Sigil District

entries: The Allegiance of Allsight is a pervasive presence in this district; many of the faction's members and affiliates are on the faculties and staffs of these schools. Institutions of learning constructed in Ank'Harel's infancy abut structures of more modern architecture, and buildings representing cultures from across Exandria are a counterpoint to the grand, Marquesian-style domes of the Crystal Chateau. At the heart of the district is the excavation that leads to Cael Morrow, the mysterious sunken city (see "{@area Maw of Cael Morrow|1be|x}" below).
Sigil区的街道地图显示了与本章后面的派别任务相关的一小部分地区。它包括以下地点。

items.name: S1: Crystal Chateau Entrance.
items.entry: 下面介绍一下这所精英大学。

items.name: S2: Teleportation Atrium.
items.entry: 一个永久的传送圈矗立在这座朴素的圆顶建筑的中心。大多数由Allsight的Allegiance制作的{@item Teleportation Tablet|CRCotN|teleportation tablets}(见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Teleportation Tablet|CRCotN}})都以这个圆圈为关键。

items.name: S3: The Frog and Kebab.
items.entry: 这家受欢迎的小酒馆没有提供真正的青蛙，水晶城堡的学生经常光顾。

items.name: S4: Emerald Ibis Relic Hall.
items.entry: 这个大厅由绿色玻璃制成的雕像看管，形状像巨大的朱鹭，是全知之士检查新发现物品的地方。见"{@area Consortium Mission 3: Elephant in the Room|21e|x} "中的{@area Consortium Story Track|202|x}。

items.name: S5: Scroll's Alcove.
items.entry: 这座公寓楼主要由水晶城堡的教授和来访的客座讲师使用。见"{@area Cobalt Soul Mission 1: The Cultist of Zehir|241|x} "中的{@area Cobalt Soul Story Track|23a|x}。

items.name: S6: Lawbearer's Librams.
items.entry: 这是西格尔区的几十个图书馆之一，是该市最广泛的法律图书馆。

items.name: S7: Boughs of the Wild Mother.
items.entry: 白天可以看到学生们在这个院子里巨大的梧桐树的树荫下学习。有人说晚上有鬼魂潜伏在这里（见"{@area Consortium Mission 1: A Ghost in Our Midst|209|x} "中的{@area Consortium Story Track|202|x}）。

entries.name: Crystal Chateau
entries: {@i Elite University and Headquarters of the Allegiance of Allsight}
水晶城堡是由烟熏石英和白色大理石组成的巨大建筑，是西格尔区的一个主要地标。一条小溪蜿蜒穿过建筑周围的花园，然后从一个开口下流向主厅，据说那里的水的汩汩声有助于激发最高的思想。一道白色的铁栅栏将这里封闭起来，除了 "全知之心 "的成员之外。
水晶城堡是一所教授法术和奥术理论的大学，也是Allegiance的运营中心，具有双重功能。虽然不是所有的联盟成员都是大学的学生或教授，但每一个想要学习的学生都必须首先成为该派系的成员。学费是免费的，因为城堡的费用是由城市补贴的，希望大学的毕业生能用他们的天赋来保护安克哈勒，并提高其在全世界的威望。

Jor Raashid, a lawful neutral, halfling {@creature scholarly agent|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}), is the gatekeeper for the Crystal Chateau. Suspicious and condescending, Jor sternly prohibits nonmembers from entering the Chateau.

entries.name: Maw of Cael Morrow
entries: {@i Excavation Site Entrance}

What was once a public square has been converted into an excavation site, from where the Allegiance of Allsight conducts its exploration into the ruins of Cael Morrow. The "maw" is a 150-foot-diameter, roped-off hole, admission into which is prohibited to all except for holders of Allegiance of Allsight badges. A 10-foot-wide path spirals down along the edge of the maw, descending hundreds of feet into Cael Morrow (see {@adventure chapter 5|CRCotN|5}).

entries.name: Protection
entries: A contingent of five lawful neutral Scarbearer {@creature Veteran||veterans} patrols the rim of the maw, on the lookout for unauthorized visitors. They are led by a loyal, lawful good, orc {@creature scholarly excavator|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) named Hakzorne. He permits only people who display Allegiance badges to enter the maw; Hakzorne gives only one warning before ordering the mercenaries to attack.

entries.name: Omnival Library
entries: {@i Public Library}
褐色的石柱和尖尖的拱门构成了这座位于Sigil区东北部的巨大塔楼的四周。在里面，来自艾克桑德里亚各地的文本摆满了书架，这些书架在地板和图书馆的金色拱顶之间的墙上。楼梯和魔法升降机提供了通往最高书架的通道，而地板上则摆放着风化的木质书桌和五颜六色的坐垫。
欢迎任何个人从图书馆借阅，但要获得最深奥和最微妙的资料，需要得到Allegiance of Allsight 校长的批准。最近加入图书馆的资料包括最新的Cael Morrow探险的笔记副本。

The Omnival Library is managed by Bookkeeper Khime, a neutral good, orc {@creature mage}. He's convinced that shadowy forces are constantly trying to undermine Ank'Harel, and this penchant for conspiracy theories makes him incredibly observant. He's an excellent source of information about happenings in the city, despite his wild conclusions.

entries.name: Teres Schoolhouse
entries: {@i University}
特雷斯校舍是该市两所大学中规模较大、要求较低的一所，它提供的课程以魔法的实际应用为特色，并提供广泛的贸易技能。它的实际存在，虽然没有水晶城堡的气势，但占据了西格尔区的很大一部分，由风化砖的老建筑和从马奎特北部开采的石料建成的新建筑组成。
特雷斯学堂的学术安排通常分为两个学期，每个学期长5个月。该机构还举办单期教育研讨会，欢迎该市的任何人参加。与水晶城堡一样，特雷斯校舍的学费对安克哈勒的所有居民都是免费的。

entries.name: Suncut Bazaar
entries: 深红色的横幅，悬挂的各色旗帜，以及为拥挤的街道提供遮阳的布帘，都预示着安克哈勒商业中心--阳光集市的入口。遮阳篷在露天食品摊位上延伸，提供从新鲜水果到甜味精米饼到直接从烤架上切下的热肉等各种食品。密密麻麻的石头建筑中，大部分都是出售手工制品的商店和买卖魔法物品和非魔法饰品的商店。在该区的中心，坐落着宫殿式的Luck's Run赌场。

entries.title: Suncut Bazaar

entries: 阳光集市的街道地图显示了该地区的一小部分，在本章后面的派别任务中会发挥作用。它包括以下地点。

items.name: T1: Welcome Arch.
items.entry: 这个拱形的石头拱门上挂着深红色的旗帜，欢迎大家来到集市。

items.name: T2: Battlements.
items.entry: The walls of the Suncut Bazaar are made of sandstone and patrolled day and night by Hands of Ord {@creature Guard||guards} and {@creature Veteran||veterans}.

items.name: T3: Central Street.
items.entry: 这条贯穿整个区的尘土飞扬的红色道路上，挤满了购物者、扒手、游客和当地人，以至于很难看到铺路石。

items.name: T4: Market Stalls.
items.entry: 在集市的街道和小巷中，有遮阳棚的市场摊位。

items.name: T5: Luck's Run.
items.entry: 下面介绍一下这个赌场。

items.name: T6: Bone Garden.
items.entry: 下面介绍集市上最臭名昭著的当铺。

items.name: T7: Mystic Pursuits.
items.entry: 这个奥术师的住处描述如下。

items.name: T8: First Eclipse.
items.entry: 这个地方既是一个酒馆，也是朱雀之梦财团的秘密总部，下面介绍一下。如果在(1%)的结尾使用了Aloysia的{@item Teleportation Tablet|CRCotN|teleportation tablets}，那么它的屋顶就是人物出现的地方。

items.name: T9: Courtyard.
items.entry: 在营业时间，饥饿的人们在这个院子西侧的食品摊位前排队，而其他人则围坐在院子的喷泉边，分享闲话。

entries.name: Bone Garden
entries: {@i Purveyor of Oddities and Exceptionalities}
鱼骨风铃的咔哒声宣布人们进入骨园：这是一家集当铺、古董店和奇怪及放错地方的物品库于一身的商店。这家位于集市主入口附近的商店，已经成为安克哈勒居民之间的一个笑话。在寻找丢失的钥匙或耳环时，往往以 "它可能在一周内就会出现在骨头中 "这样轻松的评论而告终。

The Bone Garden is run by Rerosha, a chaotic good, human {@creature acolyte} who's a nonverbal young woman with a brazen attitude toward life. She uses facial expressions, gestures, and a sassy gray parrot named Akil to communicate.

entries.name: First Eclipse
entries: {@i Tavern and Headquarters of the Consortium of the Vermilion Dream}
与街对面闪闪发光的Luck's Run赌场形成鲜明对比的是，First Eclipse以其褐红色的石墙和灰黑色的门而闻名。里面的旧啤酒桶被改成了桌子，后面的墙上贴满了艾克桑德里亚各地的啤酒、葡萄酒和白酒桶的油漆盖子。
其中一个桶盖上有一个与任何已知酿酒商无关的符号：一个红色的新月。服务员如果被问及此事，就会被告知这个盖子代表 "家里的麦芽酒"。事实上，敲三下酒桶盖就会发现一扇秘密的门，通向一个隐藏的储藏室。朱雀之梦财团的成员将这个房间作为行动基地。(为了避免被发现，财团经常更换其总部）。
密室不过是一个地窖，里面有一张长桌，有几个上了锁的柜子，里面装着拳头大小的大块铷。它只用于私人任务简报和该派系所有五位主人的罕见聚会。

First Eclipse is owned and operated by Satzrak Runestrider, a neutral evil, blue dragonborn {@creature occult extollant|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}). He is a loyal member of the faction, and he longs to keep the Consortium headquartered at his place permanently; the group has already used the tavern for three months longer than originally planned, so his hopes are up.

entries.name: Luck's Run
entries: {@i World-Renowned Casino}
幸运之城赌场有三层楼高，由斑驳的红色斑岩制成，顶部有金属圆顶，具有马尔克斯式的宫殿风格。入夜后，微弱的紫光从赌场狭长的窗户中漏出，笑声和音乐声传入附近的街道。
赌场内，铺着深红色布条的桌子占满了整个地板空间，每个位置都挤满了试图在其中一种机会游戏中动手的顾客。穿着深灰色和金色制服的员工在人群中穿梭，同时在桌子之间搬运食物、饮料和硬币的托盘。

The casino is owned and run by Adima Shemsilver, a chaotic neutral, halfling {@creature noble} who walks with the confidence of someone twice his height. Adima secretly uses half of the casino's earnings to fund the Veil, as his family has done for generations.
下面介绍一下Luck's Run最受欢迎的三种游戏。

entries.name: Avandra's Favor
entries: 这个骰子游戏的最低赌注为25戈比。每个参与者掷出{@dice 2d6}，如果掷出7或12，就能赢回两倍的赌注。没有赢的参与者可以再掷一次(1%)，然后再下注25吉普，把它加到他们的总数中。参与者可以这样做，只要他们想，直到他们 "破产"，因为他们的总数超过了12。

entries.name: Gambit of Ord
entries: 这个纸牌游戏需要50戈比的初始赌注，这笔钱会进入桌子中央的一个锅里。每个参与者抽一张牌，然后是第二张，然后是第三张。每次抽牌后，每个参与者都有机会加注，站在原地，或弃牌。在抽出第三张牌后，参与者就会揭开他们的手。谁拥有最高等级的手牌，谁就能获得彩金。

To simulate the play of this game, have each participant roll dice in secret. At the first draw, all participants roll a {@dice d8}. The second draw is a {@dice d6} roll, and the third is a {@dice d4} roll. Then, all reveal their dice, and whoever has the highest total wins.

entries.name: Quon a Drensal
entries: 这个游戏也被称为 "Run of Luck"，是一场蜥蜴比赛的竞赛。每位玩家可以在三名选手中的一名选手身上投注10戈比或更多，支持冠军的人可以拿回两倍的投注额。在第二名的蜥蜴身上下注的人可以拿回一半的赌注。
To simulate the play of this game, roll {@dice 3d4} for each lizard. The winning lizard is the one with the highest total (ties are possible).

entries.name: Mystic Pursuits
entries: {@i Arcane Shop}
五颜六色的挂毯框住了这个机构的入口。在门槛之外，丝绸窗帘覆盖着墙壁，神奇的小饰品覆盖着被香味蜡烛照亮的矮木桌。一个占卜师坐在房间后面，她的深蓝色头巾拉下来遮住眼睛，一副纸牌在她面前摊开--如果有人敢这么做，就请他窥视自己的未来。

The "soothsayer" is a charlatan named Amkezne, a chaotic neutral, tiefling {@creature mage}. She is a Crystal Chateau dropout who makes a living defrauding wide-eyed tourists with her mystical displays and fake enchanted trinkets. Customers who see through her act but treat her with respect can purchase any spell component worth 1,000 gp or less from Amkezne. She also has a collection of fine jewelry for sale, including five gold bracelets (25 gp each), three gem-studded gold rings (250 gp each), and two jewel-encrusted necklaces and tiaras (750 gp each). An {@creature invisible stalker} watches over this collection and attacks anyone who tries to steal from it.

entries.title: {@creature Ruidium Elephant|CRCotN} in Figurine Form
A {@item figurine of wondrous power} corrupted by ruidium transforms into a rampaging crystalline elephant

entries.name: Allegiance Story Track
entries: 本节详细介绍了《忠贞不渝》故事轨道中的任务，随附的流程图中对这些任务进行了总结。

blocks.name: Mission 1: Deliver the Figurine
entries: 这些人物必须从Suncut集市的一家商店Bone Garden中取回一个小雕像，并将其安全送到水晶城堡。

blocks.name: Mission 2: Search the Life Dome
entries: 角色们必须前往河区，在生命穹顶上寻找可能的秘密入口，以进入凯尔-莫罗。

blocks.name: Mission 3: The Proxies of Prolix
entries: 角色们必须帮助{@creature Prolix Yusaf|CRCotN}清除他的名字，在Allsight的Allegiance找到一个间谍。

blocks.name: Mission 4: The Double Agent
entries: 剧中人物进入凯尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow），抓捕或杀死一名身份不明的财团间谍。

blocks.name: Mission 5: Scout the Rift
entries: 角色们必须回到Cael Morrow，进入Netherdeep，并确认另一边的ruidium的存在。

blocks.name: Mission 6: Secure the Netherdeep
entries: 角色们必须通过巩固与尼瑟德普的真正力量的联盟来帮助联盟控制Ruidium的流动。

entries.name: Allegiance Mission 1: Deliver the Figurine
entries: 随着关于凯尔-莫罗的谣言不断传播，全知之士的探险队成为其他派别和可能的盗贼的目标。最近，Allgiance找到了一件在与这样的盗贼相遇时被盗的物品：一个{@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power (marble elephant)}，现在正躺在Suncut集市的骨园里出售的奇珍异宝和饰品中。商店的老板Rerosha同意将该物品交给Allsight联盟。该派别的任务是将小雕像从Rerosha那里取回，并将其安全送到水晶城堡。关于骨园的信息，请参见"{@area Suncut Bazaar|1c2|x} "部分。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 这个任务是通过一封丢在他们所住地方门口的信传达给他们的。信中写道。
Allegiance的希望。
我们需要你去取送一个从我们这里偷走的大理石大象雕像。我们已经在日切集市一家名为骨园的古玩店找到了它，并安排店主雷罗沙不慌不忙地交出了货物。只要把小雕像交给水晶城堡的守门人拉希德，你的任务就完成了。
提前欢迎你加入这个团队！--莱姆勒-威斯特教授，全能的阿利安。

entries.name: Volatile Figurine
entries: 接触过它的人都不知道，这个大象雕像在凯尔-莫罗的时候被感染了Ruidium，这种物质扭曲了它的魔法属性。

When a character tries to retrieve the figurine, it reacts as if it had been activated, transforming into a crystalline version of the creature it was meant to become (use the {@creature ruidium elephant|CRCotN} stat block earlier in the chapter). This creature can't be controlled.
即使大象出现的空间被其他生物占据，该雕像也会变身。在大象出现的空间中的生物必须成功地做出DC13的灵巧救赎，否则会受到11({@dice 2d10})的力量伤害并被推到最近的无人空间中。

The elephant exits the shop and begins rampaging through the streets of the bazaar. As the characters pursue, have everyone roll initiative; this encounter can be played out using the {@adventure Streets of the Suncut Bazaar map|CRCotN|4|Streets of the Suncut Bazaar}.
将大象的命中率降为0会使它变回一个小雕像，之后它可以被安全地处理和运输。塑像在七天内不能再次变身。

entries.name: Success
entries: When the characters bring the figurine to Gatekeeper Raashid, outside the Crystal Chateau (area S1 on the Streets of the {@adventure Sigil District map|CRCotN|4|Streets of the Sigil District}), their task is complete.

entries.name: Failure
entries: 如果角色们没能打败大象或没能送出小雕，阿列伊会拒绝他们的入会申请。他们需要找到另一个派别来帮助他们调查阿普特恩的奥秘。

entries.name: Keeping the Figurine
entries: If the characters keep the elephant figurine for themselves, the elephant it creates uses the {@creature ruidium elephant|CRCotN} stat block (see earlier in the chapter) and can't be controlled.
如果人物杀死或救赎了阿普提翁（见{@area chapter 7|3dd|x}），小雕像就会摆脱它的ruidium腐蚀，并像普通的{@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power (marble elephant)}一样运作。

entries.name: Allegiance Mission 2: Search the Life Dome
entries: 为了追寻Allsight Allegiance的传言，这些人物被派去调查进入Cael Morrow的第二个可能的通道，据说是在河区。当神秘的力量袭击了这群人并意图杀人时，他们了解这个沉没的城市的时间被缩短了。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 一天清晨，{@creature Prolix Yusaf|CRCotN}与人物见面。
这个眼睛明亮的铁弗林说："你可能知道，全知之盟正在Sigil区进行一个大规模的挖掘项目。这是一项探索卡艾尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow）废墟的努力，卡艾尔-莫罗是安克-哈雷尔下面的一个更古老的城市。
"好吧，阿利安听说有传言说有另一个进入凯尔-莫罗的入口，穿过城市的绿洲。请你帮我们一个忙，调查这些说法。我被授权向你们小组支付300个金币，以补偿你们的时间和麻烦。"

If the characters agree to help, Prolix informs them that Carliale Kroogan, the gnome supervisor at the Life Dome, is expecting them in the early afternoon (see "{@area Life Dome|1b5|x}" earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: True Motives
entries: 普利克斯不知道，关于凯尔-莫罗的第二个入口的谣言是由记忆哨兵的成员莱姆勒-威斯特（Lymmle Wist）栽赃的，她假扮成一个被高度认可的古物学教授，潜入了万能的联盟。虽然莱姆勒在这次任务中没有出现，但她的阴谋却推动了剧情的发展。这些人物正走进一个埋伏--记忆哨兵试图消灭那些会让凯尔-莫罗重新回到人们记忆中的人。

entries.name: Into the Life Dome
entries: 当他们到达生命穹顶时，站在外面的卡利亚尔-克罗根见到了这些人物。
"我很少有访客，"地精解释说，然后转身面对生命穹顶。他高举一块薄薄的彩虹色发光石英碎片，随着一声轻哼，穹顶的一块玻璃板突然亮起了蓝色和紫色的奥术符文--然后闪烁消逝，留下了一个开口。"进来吧! 我给你介绍一下。"
穹顶内部潮湿而闷热，潮湿的泥土气息与一阵阵热气一起冲击着人们的感官。一系列的水晶桥横跨绿洲的60英尺直径的湖泊，穹顶的边缘长满了植物。被动智慧({@skill Perception})得分在17分以上的角色在开始在穹顶内活动时，会注意到一股短暂的、凉爽的气流（这是{@creature invisible stalker}偷窃卡利亚尔的魔法水晶的副作用）。

entries.name: Inspecting the Oasis
entries: The lake's bottom is a thick layer of silt. A character who surveys the area and makes a successful DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check finds no disturbance in the sediment that would suggest an underground passage to lower caverns.

entries.name: Talking with Carliale
entries: 卡利亚尔试图回答人物关于绿洲的任何问题。他知道以下信息。

items: 该绿洲是安克哈勒的主要淡水来源。
这些水来自安克哈勒下面被淹没的洞穴。这些洞穴也是凯尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow）的所在地，这让人相信关于连接凯尔-莫罗和绿洲的古老通道的传闻。
从Allegiance of Allsight的探险中收回的遗物表明，Cael Morrow是一个前卡拉米特社会的遗址，最初建在水面上。Carliale推断，自然构造的变化导致城市滑落到地表之下，但洞穴中水位的波动似乎无法解释。
生命之穹调节流入和通过运河的水流。利用魔法和工程的结合，生命穹顶将湖水分配到主要运河中，同时也从空气中吸取额外的水分，在必要时补充水流。
生命穹顶通常自动运行。作为首席监督员，卡利亚尔可以手动控制穹顶的控制装置，并根据需要调整水位。

entries: 在谈话的某个时刻，卡利亚尔注意到他的奥术超控器--他用来打开生命穹顶的入口和调整穹顶控制的魔法水晶--已经从他的口袋里消失了。他向大家保证，他一定是把它丢在了入口处。

entries.name: Sudden Surge
entries: 当卡利亚尔开始寻找他丢失的奥术超控水晶时，请阅读。
湖面开始搅动白色的泡沫，几秒钟后，一个巨大的水泉向上和向外迸发，把你送上天。
生命穹顶中的每个人都被冲到穹顶之外，被突然涌来的水推到一个5英尺深的运河上。

When they see that the characters survived the surge, two {@creature Invisible Stalker||invisible stalkers} move in for the kill. The {@creature Invisible Stalker||invisible stalkers} were summoned by Professor Lymmle Wist and infiltrated the Life Dome a short time ago without Carliale's knowledge, slipping through the entrance as the gnome arrived for work. The {@creature Invisible Stalker||invisible stalkers} focus their attacks on the characters, ignoring Carliale.
战斗结束后，卡利亚尔怀疑{@condition invisible}潜行者的召唤师与朱雀之梦的财团或记忆的哨兵有关。如果人物问起这些派别，他就会向他们介绍（见本章前面的"{@area City Factions|192|x}"）。

Characters who encountered the {@creature invisible stalker} at {@area Mystic Pursuits|1c9|x} (described earlier in the chapter) might assume that Amkezne, the owner of that shop, is behind the Life Dome incident. Amkezne denies any involvement and is telling the truth. If the characters use magical coercion or threaten to report her to the Hands of Ord, Amkezne tells them that she learned how to summon {@creature Invisible Stalker||invisible stalkers} in her final year at the Crystal Chateau and that the professor who taught her the arcane ritual was Lymmle Wist (see {@area mission 3|1e6|x} of this story track).

entries.name: Returning to the Chateau
entries: 挫败伏击后，角色们可以在返回水晶城堡前花点时间重整旗鼓。在听取了他们的报告后，普罗利克斯向这些人物支付了约定的300金币，并为今天的事件深表歉意。他对这些人物的技能表示感谢，并说他希望 "全知之盟 "的队伍中有更多像他们这样的人。

entries.name: Joining the Allegiance
entries: If this mission is successful, Prolix recommends the characters to Headmaster {@creature Gryz Alakritos|CRCotN} as potential new members. Within a week, Alakritos presents each character with a formal invitation to join the faction's ranks. Membership comes with the following benefits:

items: 每个新成员都会收到一个Allegiance of Allsight徽章，它可以作为成员资格的证明。如果徽章丢失，可以花50金币发行一个新的徽章。
每位新成员都会收到一套时尚的 "Allsight忠诚 "装备。如果衣服丢失或损坏，可以花10戈比购买一件替换品。
Each new member receives free lodging in Ank'Harel for as long as their membership lasts. The lodging is of modest quality (see "{@area Lodging|191|x}" earlier in the chapter).

entries: 除非他们成为该派别的成员，否则这些人物不能再接受来自Allsight Allegiance的任何任务。

entries.name: Allegiance Mission 3: The Proxies of Prolix
entries: 几个月前，"记忆哨兵 "的观察者莱姆勒-维斯特（Lymmle Wist）潜入了 "全知联盟"（Allegiance of Allsight）。此后，她不断晋升，并成为负责向阿利吉的特工分配任务的人之一。在这期间，她还向记忆哨兵和朱雀之梦财团提供有关阿利安的行动信息。

莱姆勒以前拥有一枚{@item ring of red fury|CRCotN}(见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Ring of Red Fury|CRCotN}})，是财团送给她的，作为对她的奖励。她决定将这枚戒指作为一个更宏大计划的一部分。最近，在生命穹顶遭到袭击后，全知之心处于高度警戒状态，莱姆勒将戒指安放在{@creature Prolix Yusaf|CRCotN}身上，并计划诬陷铁皮人是个叛徒。她与戒指中的Ruidium接触后，在她的皮肤上留下了痕迹。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: The characters notice a dark figure clumsily following them as they stroll through Ank'Harel one night. Confronting the figure reveals it to be a harried and distressed {@creature Prolix Yusaf|CRCotN}, who immediately asks if they can talk in private.
普罗利克斯穿的是不伦不类的深色衣服，而不是他一贯的 "全知之明 "的服装。当他和角色们远离窥探的耳朵时，他解释了自己的困境。
"我认为有人想把生命穹顶的袭击事件栽赃给我，"他低声说。
"今天早些时候，一个小偷在我走在街上时抢走了我的挎包。我报告了这起盗窃案，然后去做我的事。几个小时前，有人用一个{@i sending}的咒语通知我，我的挎包已经找到了水晶城堡，我应该马上去认领它。我在去取它的路上，发现了这个。"
他在口袋里翻了翻，掏出一枚带有红色金属条纹的银戒指。"我想有人把它塞进了我的口袋，但我发誓这不是我的。它看起来像是从凯尔-莫罗打捞上来的魔法物品之一，但我不能确定。你相信我，对吗？"
普利克斯认真而绝望地声称自己是无辜的。他担心，不管是谁在他身上安插了戒指，也在他的挎包里安插了一些东西，以进一步指控他。他不打算回到水晶城堡，也不打算向他的上级汇报，直到他知道谁在试图陷害他。
如果角色们同意帮忙，普罗利克斯就把他们引向他的朋友--簿记员基姆，他管理着西格尔区的Omnival图书馆，拥有从凯尔-莫罗打捞上来的每一件古物的记录。普利克斯相信，如果他们能确定戒指的来源，就能找到这个阴谋的幕后策划者。

entries.name: Hunt for the Truth
entries: 当人物来到Omnival图书馆时，Khime在前台后面迎接他们。他不是Allsight联盟的成员，但他愿意协助人物，从图书馆的档案中拿出以下信息。

entries.title: The Maw of Cael Morrow is the only known entrance to the Drowned City

items.name: Expeditions to Cael Morrow.
items.entry: 记录中只有一次提到戒指：在两个月前的探险队的清单中，该探险队由特工安巴拉-弗林特布雷克和伊德里斯-洛南组成，由莱姆勒-维斯特教授带领。记录显示，该小组在返回地表的途中被一个小偷搭讪，但记录中没有提到被盗的东西。

items.name: Sentinels of Memory.
items.entry: 阿利安文件证实，"记忆哨兵 "是一个新的派别，大约在探索沉没废墟的项目开始时成立。这些文件断言，记忆哨兵认为所谓的 "地下神庙 "是一座监狱，应该被封存和遗忘。

items.name: Ruidium.
items.entry: 朱雀之梦财团为识别在凯尔-莫罗废墟中发现的淡红色矿物而创造的名称已经进入学术词典。其属性的范围尚不清楚，但早期的报告说，这种矿物在其他物质中产生红色的结晶脉络--无机物和有机物都是如此--与它保持长期接触。

entries: 一个检查远征记录并成功进行DC10智力({@skill Investigation})检查的角色注意到一个模式：一些远征日志和回收物品的清单被涂改过或没有完成。在这个检查中成功5次以上的人物注意到，所有这些记录都是由莱姆勒-威斯特领导的探险队的。
如果被问及他的意见，基姆向角色们坦言，他倾向于相信记忆哨兵会不惜一切代价来实现他们的目标：保护安克哈雷尔的安全，使其免受可能潜伏在下面的东西的影响。此外，他相信朱雀之梦的财团和记忆的哨兵们正在共同对付他们共同的敌人--全知之心。

entries.name: Interrogating the Excavators
entries: 为了了解他们在图书馆记录中发现的更多信息，人物可以在水晶城堡询问探险队成员。

Anbara and Idris (lawful neutral, human {@creature Acolyte||acolytes}), the two agents from the expedition that recovered the ring, vaguely recall being attacked during their work, but they can't provide any details. A character who succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) or Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check discerns that this claim of ignorance is not a lie—Anbara and Idris have had their memories of the incident tampered with. Restoring their memories with a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic causes them to recall that Professor Wist led the group through a wrong turn, to an area where they were accosted by an armed ruffian. They were knocked out in the ensuing scuffle, but they can't identify who cast the spell or wielded the weapon that {@condition incapacitated} them.

If Lymmle Wist (a neutral evil, human {@creature mage}) is questioned, she deftly addresses the characters' inquiries, and her responses conform to the expedition records. A character who succeeds on a DC 16 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check notices a guarded expression in her eyes and a terse undertone in her voice, indicating her discomfort. Characters who have a passive Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) score of 15 or higher notice thin, elevated red veins encircling the base of her right ring finger—the result of her exposure to the {@item ring of red fury|CRCotN} before she planted it on Prolix.

entries.name: Infiltrator Exposed
entries: The characters can present their findings to Headmaster {@creature Gryz Alakritos|CRCotN} (see "{@area City Factions|192|x}" earlier in the chapter) and make a DC 18 Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check. The DC drops to 13 if Anbara and Idris are with the characters and at least one of them has had their memory restored. On a successful check, the headmaster immediately dispatches agents to apprehend Lymmle.

The characters can confront Lymmle directly by going to her office in the Crystal Chateau. Lymmle initially denies the accusation, then tries to turn the tables on the characters by accusing them of having ulterior motives. When it becomes clear to her that the characters are insistent, she casts {@spell fly} on herself and tries to escape by smashing through the window behind her desk. If she's unable to escape, Lymmle fights to the death.

entries.name: Epilogue
entries: 在莱姆勒被揭发为叛徒后，校长阿拉克里托斯给了这些人物一个装有50pp奖励的袋子。他还交给他们一个挎包，要求他们把它还给普利克斯--除去生命穹顶的图纸和其他被莱姆勒栽赃的文件。
为了表示感谢，普利克斯让人物保留{@item ring of red fury|CRCotN}(见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Ring of Red Fury|CRCotN}})，只要他们承诺分享他们学到的关于戒指属性的任何东西。

entries.name: Allegiance Mission 4: The Double Agent
entries: Seven days after their previous mission for the Allegiance of Allsight, the characters are summoned to meet with Headmasters {@creature James Cryon|CRCotN} and {@creature Gryz Alakritos|CRCotN} in Cryon's office at the Crystal Chateau. The headmasters want the characters to find a double agent who is undermining the Allegiance's activities in the ruins of Cael Morrow.

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 当人物到达与校长会面时，阅读或转述以下内容。
当你步入校长Cryon的办公室时，你看到他和校长Alakritos都在。前者礼貌地欢迎你，而后者则示意你在扶手椅上坐下。
"看来你可以在你的成绩单上加上反间谍活动，"校长Cryon冷冷地说。
"也是一件好事！" 校长Alakritos急忙跟上。"在凯尔-莫罗有麻烦。"
{@creature James Cryon|CRCotN}是一个居高临下的精英主义者，而{@creature Gryz Alakritos|CRCotN}则不那么粗暴，更加脚踏实地。每个人都以自己的方式，将Allsight Allegiance的最佳利益放在心上。他们向人物介绍了Allegiance的间谍所发现的以下细节。

items: 朱雀之梦的财团已经渗透到了阿列伊在凯尔-莫罗的挖掘现场。
考古队里有一个双重间谍。
这个间谍估计是在帮助财团寻找和走私Ruidium。

entries: 校长们要求这些人物完成以下任务，并在七天内汇报。

items: Enter Cael Morrow, travel to the Allegiance of Allsight's base camp, and meet with {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN}, a professor of archaeology and the leader of the current expedition.
探索Cael Morrow，捕获或杀死财团的间谍。

entries: 阿拉克里托斯给每个角色一个Allegiance of Allsight徽章，如果他们还没有的话，还有一个{@item potion of water breathing}（以防角色想在Cael Morrow的充满空气的区域之外旅行）。这些徽章证明了人物的效忠关系，并允许他们进入卡奥摩罗，在挖掘现场自由活动。克里昂警告他们，间谍必须已经获得了徽章。
消灭双面间谍的奖励是1,000金币，并且只要人物仍是全知的成员，就可以继续访问凯尔莫罗。

entries.name: Finding the Double Agent
entries: The number of workers in the Cael Morrow archaeological expedition has dwindled recently. Currently, only Professor {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN}, a kenku named {@creature Scribble|CRCotN}, and a goliath named {@creature Xot|CRCotN} are there. None of them is the double agent.

If the characters ask Professor Acuere about other members of the expedition, she mentions that many excavators have been lost. She seems most interested in learning the fate of her friend {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}, an adjunct professor of ancient literature at the Crystal Chateau. Unknown to Professor Acuere, {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN} is the Consortium spy.

entries.name: Key Locations
entries: 这个任务主要发生在凯尔-莫罗。人物必须访问的关键地点如下。

items.name: Maw of Cael Morrow.
items.entry: This location is the entrance to the Drowned City (see the "{@area Maw of Cael Morrow|1be|x}" section earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: Allegiance Base Camp ({@area Chapter 5, Area M3|28b|x})
entries: This site is the center of Allegiance operations in Cael Morrow. Professor {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN} runs the show from here.

entries.name: Hall of the Royal Library ({@area Chapter 5, Area M7a|2a1|x})
entries: Here is where the spy, {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}, can be found. She is trying to find the so-called Key to the Netherdeep. If seven days pass before the characters reach this location, she is gone.

entries.name: Cliffside Villa ({@area Chapter 5, Area M13|2be|x})
entries: 在这个地方，人物可以找到{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}正在寻找的Netherdeep的钥匙。如果七天过去了，人物还没有打败{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}，钥匙就会消失。

entries.name: Returning to the Chateau
entries: 如果人物打败了{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}，头领们就会按照承诺给他们1000金币的奖励，而Alakritos则告诉他们在一周后会有下一次任务。如果人物带回了{@item ruidium greataxe|CRCotN}（尼瑟德普的钥匙），他们会得到额外的1,000GP奖励。

entries.name: Allegiance Mission 5: Scout the Rift
entries: 角色们从他们对Cael Morrow的第一次探险回来七天后，校长Cryon邀请他们回到他的办公室，向他们介绍一个新的任务，这个任务将带领他们穿过一个平面裂缝，进入Netherdeep。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 校长Cryon在会议开始时严厉地宣布："Allsight联盟的生存可能取决于这次任务的成功"。然后他向人物提供了以下细节。

items: Allsight的Allegiance在Cael Morrow发现了一个平面裂缝，通向一个未知的目的地。
朱雀梦的财团已经派出特工前往裂缝，想办法通过裂缝，结果未知。
如果 "全知之忠 "要阻止财团接管凯尔-莫罗，人物必须进入裂缝，了解另一边的情况。

entries: 通过DC19智慧({@skill Insight})检查成功的人物意识到校长Cryon很紧张，因为他在校长Alakritos不知情的情况下安排了这次会议。在人物到达之前，Alakritos和Cryon在简报的最后一点上有分歧。阿拉克里托斯认为裂缝不能被打扰，但克雷恩认为它包含一个力量源泉，可以帮助摧毁朱雀之梦的财团和记忆哨兵。
校长Cryon要求这些人物完成以下任务，并在七天前向他报告。

items: 找到打开裂缝的方法。
进入裂缝，确认在里面可以找到Ruidium。

entries: 如果人物在前一个任务中获得了Netherdeep的钥匙，他们就已经完成了第一个目标。在这种情况下，Cryon将大斧交给他们，让他们用它来打开裂缝。他还为每个角色提供了一个{@item potion of water breathing}，以防他们没有其他办法在Cael Morrow的充满水的区域中航行。
进入裂缝（也就是尼瑟迪普）并报告后面的情况的奖励是1000金币。

entries.name: Key Locations
entries: 这个任务主要发生在凯尔-莫罗。人物必须访问的关键地点如下。

items.name: Maw of Cael Morrow.
items.entry: This location is the main entrance to the Drowned City (see the "{@area Maw of Cael Morrow|1be|x}" section earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: Cliffside Villa ({@area Chapter 5, Area M13|2be|x})
entries: 这个地方是人物可以找到尼瑟迪普的钥匙的地方。

entries.name: Temple of the Arch Heart ({@area Chapter 5, Area M9|2ad|x})
entries: 这个建筑是Alyxian的最后一个祈祷点。如果人物还没有获得尼瑟德普的钥匙，在这个祈祷点将{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}推进到它的{@item Jewel of Three Prayers (Exalted)|CRCotN|Exalted State}，就能进入裂缝。

entries.name: Rift to the Netherdeep ({@area Chapter 5, Area M17|2ce|x})
entries: 这个平面裂缝连接着尼瑟斯底层和物质界。

entries.name: Returning to the Chateau
entries: When they enter the Netherdeep, the characters must contend with the water pressure (see "{@area Netherdeep Features|2d5|x}" in {@adventure chapter 6|CRCotN|6}). If they don't have sufficient protection, they'll need to return to the Crystal Chateau and acquire it.
任务结束后，人物回到城堡，发现Cryon和Alakritos正在激烈地争吵。克里昂带着几乎无法掩饰的喜悦的表情转向他们，感谢他们的服务。阿拉克里托斯也黯然地感谢他们，然后鼓励他们在等待下一个任务时好好休息。既然裂缝已经被攻破，就没有回头路可走了。

entries.name: Allegiance Mission 6: Secure the Netherdeep
entries: Allegiance故事轨道的最后一个任务要求人物深入Netherdeep，确保有足够多的Ruidium来永久挫败Allegiance的敌人。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 在人物完成上一次任务返回后的七天，校长Cryon和Alakritos向人物介绍了他们的新工作。

items: 最近几天，Allsight的Allegiance已经完善了Ruidium武器和盔甲的制作。初步实验证明，这种设备可以为使用者提供保护，使其免受水下环境的危害。
其中有几件武器被发给了阿利根斯的侦察兵，他们被指示潜入水中，探索裂缝。除了一个人之外，其他的人都没有回来，被认为已经死亡。
这名唯一的幸存者在受伤前与一名探险队成员进行了简短的交谈。她说她的Ruidium武器使她能够在裂缝外的水压中存活下来，她还描述了她在尼瑟斯底层航行时听到的 "悲伤的智慧 "的声音，然后遇到了一个使她陷入困境的生物。

entries: 校长们要求这些人物完成以下任务，并在十四天前通知他们结果。

items: 进入Netherdeep。
联系住在里面的 "悲伤的智慧"，并说服它允许Allsight联盟在不被Netherdeep的生物威胁的情况下提取ruidium。

entries: If the party agrees to undertake the mission, the headmasters equip each character with a {@item ruidium dagger|CRCotN}. The headmasters' reward for completion of this mission is a promotion to the upper ranks of the Allegiance of Allsight and 5,000 gp each.

entries.name: Failure
entries: This mission, unbeknownst to the characters or anyone else, is doomed to fail. If the characters talk to Alyxian about harvesting ruidium while they're in the Netherdeep, Alyxian promises them whatever they want, as long as they free him from the Heart of Despair. The characters have no chance of claiming the reward, regardless of the adventure's outcome (see {@adventure chapter 7|CRCotN|7}).

entries.name: Which Faction Should the Rivals Join?
entries: 利用人物对派别的选择来决定对手方加入的派别，如下所示。

items: 如果人物加入Allsight联盟或Cobalt Soul图书馆，对手就会加入Vermilion Dream的财团。
如果人物加入了朱雀梦的财团，那么对手就会加入Allsight的效忠团。

entries.name: Vermilion Gambits
entries: 本节详细介绍了联合体故事轨道中的任务，并在随附的流程图中进行了总结。

blocks.name: Mission 1: A Ghost in Our Midst
entries: 人物必须在夜间访问野母神殿，找到鬼魂的证据，然后试图与它交好。

blocks.name: Mission 2: When Luck Runs Out
entries: 这些人物必须承担起守卫Luck's Run赌场的工作，防止一小群可能的盗贼。

blocks.name: Mission 3: Elephant in the Room
entries: 人物必须从Allegiance of Allsight偷出一个{@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power}，并将其送到{@creature Aradrine the Owl|CRCotN}。

blocks.name: Mission 4: Key to the Netherdeep
entries: 角色们必须与凯尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow）的一名间谍会合，并帮助寻找一把丢失的钥匙，以便通过裂缝进入尼瑟迪普。

blocks.name: Mission 5: Slay the Aboleth
entries: 角色们必须回到凯尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow），并杀死萦绕在沉没的城市中的aboleth--这个aboleth相信自己是传说中的英雄。

blocks.name: Mission 6: Ruidium Monopoly
entries: 角色们必须进入尼瑟德普，找到瑞迪姆的来源，并帮助财团获得对该物质的垄断权。

entries.name: Consortium Mission 1: A Ghost in Our Midst
entries: 没有被阿洛伊西亚介绍到朱雀梦财团的角色可能很难加入这个派别，因为它的性质很神秘。那些想在没有Aloysia的帮助下加入该派系的人可以花一天时间从Ank'Harel的公民那里收集信息。在这段时间结束时，任何通过DC15魅力({@skill Investigation})检查成功的角色都会了解到一个由红袍神秘主义者组成的组织在一个叫 "初食 "的酒馆里聚会。

If the characters enter First Eclipse (see the "{@area Suncut Bazaar|1c2|x}" section earlier in the chapter), they are greeted by the bartender, Satzrak Runestrider, a neutral evil, blue dragonborn {@creature occult extollant|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}). If they ask him about the Consortium, he gives each of them a drink on the house and tells them to keep quiet. When they finish their drinks, Satzrak hisses, "Go home and wait for a letter."

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 表示有兴趣加入朱雀之梦财团的人物，在他们的住处收到一封没有签名的信。信中写道。
有志者。
我们有一个任务，将考验你的能力。在你完成任务之前，不要试图再次联系我们。
谣言说，在黑暗中，有一个鬼魂在Sigil区的野性之母的神龛上出没。夜间进入甚至经过神殿附近的人都会听到可怕的哀号声，并感受到令人毛骨悚然的鬼手的触摸。
了解有关这种精神的真相，如果可能的话，将它的愤怒转化为我们的利益。我们在Sigil区能有的任何优势都是有用的。

entries.name: Search for the Ghost
entries: Finding the shrine is simple, since there is only one shrine to the Wild Mother in the Sigil District (area S7 on the Streets of the {@adventure Sigil District map|CRCotN|4|Streets of the Sigil District}). If the characters investigate this area at night, one of them is targeted by a {@spell chill touch} spell as a lonely wail fills the air. If they enter the shrine, they see movement inside.
这个 "鬼魂 "是{@creature Shira|CRCotN}，一个害羞、焦虑的15岁人类，具有天生的法术能力。由于担心周围人的安全，当她学会控制自己的能力时，{@creature Shira|CRCotN}已经开始使用神社作为夜间的藏身之处。她模仿幽灵的行为来吓唬别人。
{@creature Shira|CRCotN}是一个混乱的好人，人类{@creature commoner}，有以下额外的行动选项。

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries: {@creature Shira|CRCotN}施展以下一种法术，不需要任何物质成分，使用魅力作为施法能力（法术救赎DC10，用法术攻击命中率+2）。
随意。{@spell chill touch}
各1/天。{@spell blindness/deafness}, {@spell ray of sickness}

{@creature Shira|CRCotN} uses her spells to drive away intruders. A character can use an action to try to force her to surrender, doing so with a successful DC 14 Charisma ({@skill Intimidation} or {@skill Persuasion}) check, whereupon {@creature Shira|CRCotN} breaks down into tears and ceases her attacks. Only then can she be convinced to try to find another place in the city to sleep. She will grudgingly accept being taken in by a foster parent, if the characters offer to help her with this solution.

entries.name: A Home for Shira
entries: If the characters want to find a safe home for {@creature Shira|CRCotN} and bring her to First Eclipse for that purpose, Satzrak the bartender shows a soft side of his persona and offers her a small, private room in the tavern, along with free room and board if she's willing to perform simple chores and "not make trouble." Satzrak is inwardly happy to be a kind, loving father figure to {@creature Shira|CRCotN}.

entries.name: Consortium Mission 2: When Luck Runs Out
entries: 作为一个有着昂贵需求的小组织，朱雀之梦财团不断需要资金，促使该派别的领导人将他们的代理人和合伙人的服务借给那些需要保护的客户。
Luck's Run赌场的老板Adima Shemsilver听说有一伙盗贼打算抢劫赌场的金库。为了避免牵扯到奥德之手，阿迪玛向财团寻求保护，而财团则向这些人物求助。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 角色们收到一封措辞紧急的信，召唤他们去 "初食"，萨兹拉克在那里给他们点了一轮啤酒，并在其中一杯下面塞了一张纸条，上面写着 "她在后面等你"。如果被问及更多信息，萨兹拉克并没有详细说明。

Inside the Consortium's hidden storeroom in the back of the tavern, the characters find {@creature Aloysia Telfan|CRCotN}. If Aloysia died earlier in the adventure, replace her with another {@creature occult initiate|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}), and modify the following text accordingly:
"好吧，你成功了，"阿洛伊西亚说。她跳下凳子，拿出一个皮包，叮叮当当地发出硬币的声音。"我希望你不会对雇佣兵的工作感到失望。它不像其他工作那样令人兴奋，但它的报酬很高。"
阿洛伊西娅解释说，财团受雇于幸运之城的老板阿迪玛-谢姆希尔弗（Adima Shemsilver），负责守卫赌场，防止传闻中的抢劫案在当晚发生。
如果人物接受任务，Aloysia现在就付给他们250戈比，并说Luck's Run将在成功抓获小偷后再付给他们750戈比，其中500戈比要交给财团。她让他们在日落前一小时到达Luck's Run，届时赌场保安人员的队长会进一步向他们介绍情况。

entries.name: At the Casino
entries: When the characters get to Luck's Run, Security Captain Nedosi Anay, a neutral, half-orc {@creature veteran}, brusquely briefs them. She relays the following information:

items: Nedosi的情报报告说，至少有三个盗贼将共同完成这次行动，行动在日落时分开始。
Nedosi认为，盗贼的目标是位于三楼的赌场硬币库，该机构每天的大部分收入都存放在那里。
硬币库用一把神奇的锁密封。狭窄的滑道，每条直径为6英寸，从金库内部延伸到较低楼层的投币器。只有赌场员工可以进入这些投币机，他们必须在向赌场的顾客发放奖金之前这样做。

entries: Nedosi希望有两个角色在金库外驻扎，其余的人和她一起在赌场的底层巡逻。如果这些角色没有远距离交流的能力，她会给他们每个人一个充满电的{@item earring of message|CRCotN}（见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Earring of Message|CRCotN}}），让他们在晚上使用，然后再命令他们到自己的岗位上。她要求角色们只有在必要时才使用武力，而且只能使用非致命性的武力。

entries.name: Casino Floor
entries: 晚上，赌场很拥挤，因为人们在结束一天的工作后，都会涌入赌场，试玩赌场的某个游戏。赌场的每一层都有四名{@creature Guard||guards}巡视员；此外，底层有十名{@creature Commoner||commoners}工作人员。建筑物后面有一对装潢精美的螺旋形楼梯连接着三层楼。每个楼梯都很神奇，功能就像自动扶梯一样--一个楼梯载着顾客往上走，而另一个楼梯则是往下走。

entries.name: Vault Doors
entries: 赌场的圆柱形硬币库由闪闪发光的钢铁锻造而成，位于三楼的中心位置，从任何方向都可以看到，因此没有人可以接近硬币库而不被发现。

The vault is 10 feet in diameter and rises 20 feet to the apex of the casino's domed ceiling. It appears to have no door, but a character who examines the vault and succeeds on a successful DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check finds a thin keyhole near its base. The vault's lock can be opened by using a master key, which only Nedosi and Adima possess, by a character who makes a successful DC 21 Dexterity check using {@item thieves' tools|PHB}, or by magic. Nedosi has her copy of the master key on her person.

entries.name: Vault Trap
entries: If the vault is opened by any means other than using the master key, the vault's magical trap is triggered. Each creature within 5 feet of the vault must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 36 ({@dice 8d8}) psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

The trap can't be disarmed, but successfully casting {@spell dispel magic} (DC 15) on the lock before an attempt is made to open it suppresses the trap for 1 minute, allowing the lock to be manipulated without negative consequences.

entries.name: Casino Heist
entries: 当太阳沉入地平线以下时，盗贼们开始实施他们的计划。有三个人参与了这次行动。

items: Ena (neutral, human {@creature berserker}) masquerades as a casino patron.
Duskwood (chaotic neutral, half-elf {@creature spy}), like Ena, masquerades as a casino patron and wears a {@item hat of disguise}.
{@creature Koris|CRCotN}（合法中立，铁弗林{@creature assassin}），船员的领队，在赌场的一个牌桌上工作--她已经做了大约一个月的工作。她带着一个（2%），一个装有（3%）的小包，和一个（4%）。

entries: 如果任何一个盗贼在完成抢劫之前被人撞见，他们就会试图逃离赌场，通过在街上奔跑来阻挡任何追兵。使用{@book chase rules|DMG|8|Chases}和{@table Urban Chase Complications}表中的{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}来解决这种追捕。
计划中的抢劫案有四个阶段。

items.name: Stage 1:
items.entry: Lead-Up. Ena, Duskwood, and {@creature Koris|CRCotN} begin on the ground floor of the casino. A character who scans the crowd and succeeds on a DC 11 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check notices Ena's disinterest in the dice game she's standing at. Shortly thereafter, Duskwood begins chatting with one of the guards near Nedosi, and a character who succeeds on a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check notices the half-elf watching someone over the shoulder of the guard.

items.name: Stage 2:
items.entry: Infiltration. Characters on floor duty who know thieves' cant or have a passive Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) score of 15 or higher notice the three thieves flashing quick hand signals to each other. {@creature Koris|CRCotN} abruptly excuses herself from the game she's running and heads toward the employee area; a character who succeeds on a DC 13 Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check can follow her without being noticed. If she is detained, {@creature Koris|CRCotN} explains that she's on the way to collect winnings for one of her patrons, but a character who succeeds on a DC 13 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check sees through the lie. If she is not prevented from doing so, {@creature Koris|CRCotN} imbibes a {@item potion of gaseous form} and enters one of the coin chutes that connect with the vault.

items.name: Stage 3:
items.entry: Coin with Two Heads. When {@creature Koris|CRCotN} has entered the coin chute, Ena stands up from her seat and starts berating the guard whom Duskwood is chatting with. As Nedosi tries to break up the fight, Duskwood lifts the casino master key from her pocket, an act that a character on floor duty can spot with a successful DC 14 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check. Duskwood then ascends the spiral staircase and uses their {@item hat of disguise} to assume Nedosi's visage before arriving on the third floor. A character who succeeds on a DC 13 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check sees through Duskwood's trick as the thief approaches the vault.

entries.name: Stage 4
entries: {@b Getaway}. Inside the vault, {@creature Koris|CRCotN} dismisses her gaseous form, dumps a total of 10,000 gp into her {@item bag of holding}, and then uses {@item dust of disappearance} to become {@condition invisible}. Duskwood, disguised as Nedosi, unlocks the vault from the outside, pretends to inspect the interior as the {@condition invisible} {@creature Koris|CRCotN} escapes, and shuts it again. Characters standing guard outside the vault hear {@creature Koris|CRCotN} slip past them with a successful DC 24 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check. Duskwood and {@creature Koris|CRCotN} both leave the third floor while Ena faints in the arms of a guard downstairs to create a minor distraction. Ena then heads outside to "get some air." If the other two thieves are not stopped, the pair reunites with Ena outside the casino, and all three escape into the night with their spoils.

entries.title: {@creature Koris|CRCotN} flees the scene with adventurers in pursuit

entries.name: Aiding and Abetting
entries: 如果有人私下向这些盗贼了解他们的意图，他们就会向这些角色提供被盗钱财的分红，数额为800金币，如果他们让这些盗贼实施抢劫。一个角色如果成功地进行了DC11智慧（{@skill Insight}）检查，涉及到这三个盗贼中的任何一个，就会发现他们对这个提议是认真的。
如果人物帮助小偷而没有被抓到，{@creature Koris|CRCotN}会把他们的分成给他们，并感谢他们，承诺将来会回报他们。抢劫之后，在安克哈勒找到{@creature Koris|CRCotN}需要8小时的搜索和成功的DC18智力（{@skill Investigation}）检查，因为她保持低调。检查失败可以重复，但只能在再次搜索之后。

entries.name: Returning to First Eclipse
entries: 这些人物作为雇佣兵的任期在日出时结束，之后他们将返回初食。他们的任务有两种结果之一，分别描述如下。

entries.name: Thieves Are Caught
entries: 如果角色们抓到了小偷，内多西会向他们表示感谢，并在他们离开赌场之前向他们支付约定的750戈比。她解释说，尽管赌场不愿意与奥德之手打交道，但这些盗贼将被移交给奥德之手，让他们接受正义的审判。角色们可以保留他们从盗贼那里没收的任何魔法物品。
Aloysia在 "初食 "等着领取应付给财团的500金币。她说她希望看到这些人物在财团的队伍中得到提升。

entries.name: Thieves Escaped
entries: 如果人物无法阻止盗贼或放他们走，Nedosi对他们的失败感到沮丧，但她仍然为他们的努力支付375gp（约定数额的一半）。
当人物回到初食并告诉Aloysia发生的事情时，她表示失望，但说如果他们愿意提供预期的500GP，财团会忽略他们的失败。

entries.name: Joining the Consortium
entries: 如果人物完成了任务并交出了预期的500金币，他们就可以成为财团的成员。会员资格有以下好处。

items: 每个新成员都会收到一件红色长袍，就像财团其他成员所穿的那样。如果长袍丢失或损坏，可以在第一食堂以1戈比的价格购买一件替换。
Each new member receives free lodging in Ank'Harel for as long as their membership lasts. The lodging is of squalid quality (see "{@area Lodging|191|x}" earlier in the chapter).
每位新成员在奥术商店Mystic Pursuits（见本章前面的"{@area Mystic Pursuits|1c9|x}"）购买物品时可获得10%的折扣。折扣在三十天后失效。

entries: 除非他们成为该派别的成员，否则这些人物不能再接受来自财团的任何任务。

entries.name: Consortium Mission 3: Elephant in the Room
entries: Allegiance of Allsight最近掌握了一件在Cael Morrow发现的ruidium魔法物品。财团的领导人希望这些人物能够潜入水晶城堡，为他们获得这个物品。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: The characters are summoned to First Eclipse, where Satzrak quietly informs them that one of the masters of the Consortium wants to speak with them, though he doesn't know why. Following Satzrak's directions, the characters enter the tavern's secret storeroom to find Master {@creature Aradrine the Owl|CRCotN}, a lawful neutral, goliath {@creature occult silvertongue|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}), waiting for them. For more information on goliaths, see the "{@area Goliaths of Exandria|1a4|x}" sidebar earlier in the chapter.
阿拉德林对这些人物决定加入他们的行列表示赞赏，然后问他们现在是否准备好了解财团在安克哈勒研究的真相。
"看啊，"阿拉德琳说，卷起长袍的袖子，露出遍布她前臂的红色脉络网。她从袍子的褶皱里拿出一把匕首。它的银色刀刃上有与她手臂上的颜色相同的有机生长物。"这，"她说，指着金属条，"是Ruidium。这是厄运之月瑞杜斯的礼物，从城市下面的废墟中打捞出来的。有些人对它的力量感到退缩，但我们接受它。"
阿拉德林解释说，财团第一次意识到这种奇怪的矿物是通过一个能接触到凯尔-莫罗的间谍的努力。财团已经派出其他特工潜入挖掘现场，偷取矿物的样本，但Allsight的Allegiance对Cael Morrow的控制使得这项任务异常困难，促使Ank'Harel的间谍活动进一步展开。
阿拉德林希望角色们能找回一个大象形状的{@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power}，这个大象已经被ruidium影响。她认为这个小雕像被保存在水晶城堡里。她要求人物向水晶城堡的看门人乔尔-拉希德询问情况。
本任务中的地点是以本章前面的{@adventure Streets of the Sigil District|CRCotN|4|Streets of the Sigil District}地图为关键。

entries.name: Grilling the Gatekeeper
entries: 人物发现守门人乔尔-拉希德（见本章前面的"{@area Crystal Chateau|1bd|x}"）站在通往水晶城堡入口大厅（S1区）的双门旁边。要想从半身人那里获得信息，角色必须欺骗、恐吓或以其他方式说服他，在DC16魅力（{@skill Deception}、{@skill Intimidation}或{@skill Persuasion}）检查中取得成功。如果队伍已经成功地完成了 "全知之心 "的任务，并且曾经被乔尔看到过，那么这个检查是有优势的。
乔尔知道大象雕像已经从水晶城堡搬到了翡翠朱雀遗物馆（本章前面介绍的西格尔区街道地图上的S4区）的一个金库里。如果人物未能通过其他方式获得这一信息，可以用{@spell detect thoughts}法术或类似的魔法从他的脑海中撬开。

entries.name: Assassins Above
entries: As the characters travel to the storehouse where the elephant figurine is being kept, they are watched from the rooftops by two lawful evil, human {@creature Assassin||assassins} who have been hired by the Sentinels of Memory to grab the figurine from the storehouse and return it to the faction's headquarters. After watching the characters interact with Jor Raashid, the assassins follow them to the storehouse. When the characters arrive, the assassins attack. Characters who have a passive Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) score of 19 or higher spot the assassins before they attack and are not {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} during the first round of combat.

entries.name: Long Hands of the Law
entries: On initiative count 20 of the third round of combat, five Hands of Ord {@creature Knight||knights} arrive to apprehend everyone involved in the brawl. The assassins try to flee rather than face arrest and incarceration. Two of the knights pursue the assassins while the remaining knights try to take the characters into custody. If the characters don't resist, they are held overnight in a Sigil District jail, then released the next morning and fined 50 gp each for disturbing the peace. This delay enables the Allegiance of Allsight to keep the {@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power} safe, and the mission ends in failure (see "{@area Mission Failed|22c|x}" below).

entries.name: Emerald Ibis Relic Hall
entries: 在白天，这个仓库向公众开放。水晶城堡的学生们在这个布置得很温馨的研究大厅里，和那些陈列在玻璃钟里的物品打成一片，并进行研究。

entries.name: Daytime Entry
entries: The hall is managed by Relickeeper Kareema, a neutral good, orc {@creature scholarly agent|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) with messy dark curls and round glasses. If the characters convince her that they are members of the Allegiance of Allsight with a successful DC 18 Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check, she reveals that the figurine was placed in the downstairs vault (see "{@area Basement Vault|227|x}" below). On a failed check, Kareema becomes suspicious of the characters' intentions; she gives them the information, but then scuttles away to alert her superiors.

entries.name: Nighttime Entry
entries: The hall's front door is locked at night. A character who makes a successful DC 21 Dexterity check using {@item thieves' tools|PHB} can open the door. It can also be forced open by a character who succeeds on a DC 15 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. Anyone who breaks into the hall in this way is attacked by six animated statues that resemble ibises. The statues, which are made of green glass, patrol the public spaces during off hours. A single character can avoid the statues' notice with a successful DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check; if two or more characters are present, have them make a group check instead.
每个{@creature animated glass statue|CRCotN}都使用{@creature giant vulture}的状态块，并有这些变化。

items: 每个雕像都是一个构筑物，在60英尺的范围内有{@sense darkvision}。
每个雕像对{@condition charmed}、{@condition exhaustion}、{@condition frightened}、{@condition paralyzed}、{@condition petrified}和{@condition poisoned}情况都有免疫力。

entries: 对房间进行搜索后发现，这个小雕像并不在公共展示区。但人物在建筑的东南角发现了一个楼梯，通往地下室（见下面的 "地下室金库"），那里没有动画雕像的巡视。

entries.name: Basement Vault
entries: 大厅的地下室里有一个隐藏的金库。搜查地下室并成功通过DC15智慧({@skill Perception})检查的人物注意到墙壁上一个圆形石门的模糊轮廓，旁边是一个栓在地上的书架。

A character who examines the bookcase and succeeds on a DC 13 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check spots four tiny symbols engraved in its wood. A character who then succeeds on a DC 10 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check recognizes them as symbols of abjuration, evocation, divination, and transmutation. When a character casts a spell from one of those schools of magic while within 10 feet of the bookcase, the bookcase absorbs the spell (which is expended with no effect), and the corresponding rune begins to glow. If a spell from each of the four schools is absorbed by the bookcase, the vault door swings open. Magic cannot otherwise open the door.

A character can use an action to try to forcibly pry open the vault door, doing so with a successful DC 21 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. Forcing the vault open, however, produces a loud, concussive blast of energy that fills a 15-foot cube immediately outside the vault. This trap can't be disarmed. Any creature in the cube must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 33 ({@dice 6d10}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: A short flight of stairs descends into the main chamber of the vault. Square alcoves line the walls, and inside one of them is the {@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power}.
Most of the other alcoves are empty, but a thorough search of the vault also yields a set of {@item Nolzur's marvelous pigments} and a {@item wand of wonder}.

entries.name: Hasty Getaway
entries: If the characters aroused Kareema's suspicions or activated the trap in the basement vault, they are intercepted as they exit the hall by Headmaster {@creature James Cryon|CRCotN}, a lawful neutral, elf {@creature scholarly mastermind|CRCotN}, and two lawful neutral {@creature Scholarly Excavator|CRCotN|scholarly excavators} serving as bodyguards (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8} for their stat blocks). Headmaster Cryon is willing to talk as long as the characters seem willing to relinquish the figurine, but if any character tries to escape with it, Headmaster Cryon and his bodyguards attack.
三名Allegiance成员试图使这些人物失去能力，并夺回从金库中取出的任何物品。如果校长Cryon的生命值减少到25点以下，他就会咒骂并要求撤退，让这些角色离开。

entries.title: Master {@creature Aradrine the Owl|CRCotN}

entries.name: Returning with the Elephant
entries: 如果人物将大象雕像交给她，阿拉德林大师会很高兴，她允许他们保留任务中获得的任何战利品。此外，她还安排在{@dice 1d6}天内将他们选择的一件{@item ruidium weapon|CRCotN}或一套{@item ruidium armor|CRCotN}的衣服（见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9}）送到他们手中。

entries.name: Keeping the Figurine
entries: The characters can keep the elephant figurine, but they would be wise not to use it, for the elephant it creates uses the {@creature ruidium elephant|CRCotN} stat block (see earlier in the chapter) and can't be controlled.
如果人物杀死或救赎了阿普提翁（见{@area chapter 7|3d5|x}），小雕像就会摆脱它的ruidium腐蚀，并像普通的{@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power (marble elephant)}一样运作。

entries.name: Mission Failed
entries: 如果人物没有带着小雕像回到阿拉德林，巨人就会冷冷地看着他们，并咆哮道："我对失败者没有什么同情心。滚出我的视线"。乞求阿拉德琳宽恕的人物只会进一步激怒她。如果他们拒绝离开，她会叫来六个{@creature Occult Initiate|CRCotN|occult initiates}(见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8})来清除他们。

After a week of silence, the characters receive a letter from {@creature Aloysia Telfan|CRCotN}. If Aloysia died earlier in the adventure, the letter is sent by another Consortium agent (modify the following text accordingly):
同行的入会者。
Aradrine大师已经决定忽略你的失败。你与Apotheon的联系太强了，不允许一个错误的步骤使你失去进一步服务的资格。她要求你参加一项重要的任务--需要最大限度的隐蔽性。再一次失败是不能容忍的。
—{@creature Aloysia Telfan|CRCotN}

entries.name: Consortium Mission 4: Key to the Netherdeep
entries: 在结束最后一次任务的七天后，人物被邀请到阿拉德琳的家中与她见面--在安克哈雷尔的指导区，这是一个有百叶窗的简陋公寓。当他们到达时，请阅读或转述以下内容。
阿拉德林公寓门上的一个面板滑开了。她的眼睛注视了你一会儿；然后面板关闭，门打开。室内光线昏暗，墙上挂着天文图表和深红色的窗帘。
阿拉德林没有穿着她惯常的红袍，而是穿着一件简单的无袖外衣。当她走回她的椅子时，她手臂上的深红色生长物和结晶刺一览无余。
阿拉德林大师希望通过表现出脆弱来获得人物的信任，向人物提供了以下信息。

items: 一个名为{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}的联盟特工通过冒充全知联盟的成员并结交一些全知联盟的挖掘者，潜入了凯尔莫罗的考古现场。
{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}报告说，凯尔-莫罗的一个裂缝已经被打开，但如果没有合适的钥匙，任何人都无法进入。财团雇佣的占卜师声称，一个被称为Netherdeep之匙的东西，一个镶有Ruidium的大斧头，就在Cael Morrow的某个地方。
阿拉德林担心阿列伊家族会怀疑{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}，不想冒失去钥匙的风险。

entries: 阿拉德林要求这些人物完成以下任务，并在三天内汇报。

items: 进入Cael Morrow，尽可能避免与Allegiance of Allsight人员接触。
与{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}会合，她说她会在Cael Morrow的皇家图书馆（{@area area M7a|2a1|x}在{@adventure chapter 5|CRCotN|5}）内等待。
确保Netherdeep的钥匙。（目前阿拉德林还不知道，任何{@item ruidium weapon|CRCotN}都可以作为钥匙使用。）

entries: 阿拉德林给了每个角色一个偷来的Allsight的Allegiance徽章。这些徽章可以让人物冒充阿利根的特工，进入卡奥莫罗，并在挖掘现场自由活动。
她承诺，只要带回尼瑟德普的钥匙，就可以得到1000金币的奖励。

entries.name: Key Locations
entries: 这个任务主要发生在凯尔-莫罗。人物必须访问的关键地点如下。

items.name: Maw of Cael Morrow.
items.entry: This location is the main entrance to the Drowned City (see the "{@area Maw of Cael Morrow|1be|x}" section earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: Royal Library Hall ({@area Chapter 5, Area M7a|2a1|x})
entries: {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}在这里寻找Netherdeep的钥匙。如果三天后才到达这里，(1%)已经被人物的对手发现并杀死了，他们与Allsight的Allegiance是一伙的。

entries.name: Cliffside Villa ({@area Chapter 5, Area M13|2be|x})
entries: This site holds the Key to the Netherdeep: a {@item ruidium greataxe|CRCotN}. If three days pass before the characters reach this location, the key has already been removed by the characters' rivals.
如果对手获得了Netherdeep的钥匙，他们会把它带到Allegiance of Allsight在Cael Morrow的大本营（{@area area M3|28b|x} in {@adventure chapter 5|CRCotN|5}）。竞争对手的任务是守卫钥匙，但他们宁愿投降也不愿意为它被杀死。

entries.name: Success
entries: 如果人物带着尼瑟德普的钥匙回到阿拉德琳身边，她就会把钥匙从他们手中拿走，以便进一步研究，并给他们奖励。

entries.name: Consortium Mission 5: Slay the Aboleth
entries: 在人物成功完成任务4的七天后，阿拉德琳邀请他们去她家，向他们介绍一项新任务。首先，她传达了以下信息。

items: 卡伊尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow）有一个通往尼瑟德（Netherdeep）的裂缝，是所有Ruidium的来源。
裂缝由一个相信自己是传说中的英雄Apotheon的aboleth守护着。

entries: Aradrine要求人物进入Cael Morrow并杀死aboleth，从而使财团更容易从Netherdeep打捞出ruidium。他们完成任务的奖励是1,000gp。

entries.name: Key Locations
entries: 这个任务主要发生在凯尔-莫罗。这个任务的关键地点包括以下内容。

items.name: Maw of Cael Morrow.
items.entry: This location is the main entrance to the Drowned City (see the "{@area Maw of Cael Morrow|1be|x}" section earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: Kelp Forest ({@area Chapter 5, Area M11|2b9|x})
entries: {@creature Alyxian Aboleth|CRCotN}的巢穴在这里，尽管人物可能在其他地方遇到它。

entries.name: Consortium Mission 6: Ruidium Monopoly
entries: 这个故事轨道的最后一个任务要求角色们深入尼瑟迪普（Netherdeep），并确保财团是安克哈雷尔（Ank'Harel）唯一能够获得瑞德的派别。
在他们成功完成任务5的七天后，阿拉德林向人物介绍了他们的下一个任务。

items: 要打开Cael Morrow通往Netherdeep的裂缝，需要一个{@item ruidium weapon|CRCotN}（见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Ruidium Weapon|CRCotN}}）。财团已经确定，任何这样的武器都可以作为通往尼瑟斯地的钥匙。
Allsight的Allegiance已经派出特工进入裂缝。他们的动机不明。

entries: 阿拉德林要求这些人物完成以下任务，并在14天之前汇报。

items: 进入Netherdeep。如果人物没有至少一个{@item ruidium weapon|CRCotN}作为进入Netherdeep的钥匙，Aradrine会给他们在任务4中获得的{@item ruidium greataxe|CRCotN}，假设那个任务是成功的话。(在超凡状态下，{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}也能让他们通过裂缝旅行。)
找到鲁伊德姆的来源。如果这个源头是个生物，让它成为盟友或捕获它。

entries: 完成这个任务的奖励是在朱雀之梦财团内晋升为大师级，每月有1000金币的薪水。

entries.name: Failure
entries: 归根结底，这项任务是注定要失败的。人物不能给阿拉德林她想要的东西。如果Apotheon被杀或被救赎，所有的Ruidium都将不复存在；此外，在Apotheon被释放之前，人物不可能希望与他结盟，而在他处于腐败状态时释放他，就不可能与他结盟了。

entries.name: Knowledge Is Power
entries: 本节详细介绍了《钴之魂》故事轨道中的任务，并在随附的流程图中进行了总结。

blocks.name: Mission 1: The Cultist of Zehir
entries: 人物必须跟踪一个可疑的学者，确定他对安克哈勒和钴魂图书馆的意图。

blocks.name: Mission 2: Half-Baked Scheme
entries: 这些人物必须调查当地的一个面包师，他可能向安克哈勒的最坏分子出售危险的魔法物品。

blocks.name: Mission 3: Elephant Uproar
entries: 这些人物必须与神奇的大象作战，然后赶往朱雀之梦财团的总部。

blocks.name: Mission 4: Allegiance Alliance
entries: 角色们必须与凯尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow）的一位Allsight教授会合，赢得她的信任，并找到一把丢失的钥匙。

blocks.name: Mission 5: Enemy of Our Enemies
entries: 角色们必须回到凯尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow），并处理萦绕在沉没的城市中的阿波利斯（aboleth）--也许是通过与它交朋友。

blocks.name: Mission 6: Destroy the Netherdeep
entries: 角色们必须摧毁Netherdeep。只有这样做，他们才能使Ruidium不被敌对派别所掌握。

entries.name: Cobalt Soul Mission 1: The Cultist of Zehir
entries: 这个介绍性任务是由钴魂的档案管理员用来评估人物的能力和对组织的潜在价值。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: If the characters arrived in Ank'Harel with Question, the tiefling scholar they met in Bazzoxan in {@area chapter 3|116|x}, she greets them at their lodgings the morning after their arrival. Question knocks on the characters' door and cheerfully states that her superior, Iwo Zalarre (a chaotic good, half-orc {@creature monastic operative|CRCotN}; see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}), wants to speak with them. If the characters accept the meeting, Question takes them to the Temple of the Mentor, the headquarters of the Cobalt Soul in Ank'Harel (see "{@area Temple of the Mentor|1af|x}" earlier in the chapter).
如果人物没有被邀请加入钴之魂的问题，他们可以通过与导师庙的伊沃-扎拉雷交谈来申请加入。
当人物与伊沃-扎拉雷见面时，阅读或转述以下内容。
伊沃-扎拉尔站在一个阳台的边缘，指着下面一个穿着学术长袍的苍白的巫师。这名巫师身上有许多穿孔，似乎在读一本书的时候正在管自己的事。在他旁边靠着一根顶着蛇头雕刻的法杖。
伊沃低声说："我们的调查员报告说，这个人很可能是背叛者之神之一的隐身蛇泽希尔的崇拜者。你的任务是跟随他回到他的家，在不引起混乱的情况下，找出他在这里的原因。如果是为了制造麻烦，逮捕他并将他交给奥德之手。完成后向我报告。"
The person of interest is a chaotic evil half-elf named {@creature Laurin Ophidas|CRCotN}. He uses the {@creature cult fanatic} stat block, with these changes:

items: 他对毒药伤害和{@condition poisoned}条件有免疫力。
He wields a {@item staff of the adder} and is attuned to it as though he were a cleric.

entries.name: Ophidas's Motives
entries: {@creature Laurin Ophidas|CRCotN}是地狱之神大会的一名失宠成员，地狱之神大会是德温达利亚帝国在威尔德蒙的一个施法者组织。他从上级那里偷了一个{@item staff of the adder}的东西后逃离了那个组织。由于确信大会的刺客正在追捕他，奥菲达斯正试图找到城市中其他能保护他的泽希尔邪教徒。他的搜索并不顺利。

entries.name: Following Ophidas
entries: Shortly after the characters receive their orders, Ophidas leaves the Temple of the Mentor in a foul mood and hails a carriage to take him back to his lodgings in Scroll's Alcove, a stately apartment building in the Sigil District (see area S5 on the {@adventure Streets of the Sigil District map|CRCotN|4|Streets of the Sigil District}). The characters can follow him in a carriage of their own, at a cost of 2 sp per rider.

entries.name: Showdown
entries: 与奥菲达斯对峙的角色可以通过以下方式之一迫使他透露他们所寻求的信息。

items: A character can use an action to try to bully Ophidas into revealing his motives, doing so with a successful DC 16 Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) check.
如果奥菲达斯的命中率降到一半或更低，他就会投降，并回答人物向他提出的任何问题。

entries: If the characters accost Ophidas in public, he hollers for the Hands of Ord. Five Hands of Ord {@creature Knight||knights} arrive 3 rounds later. If the characters are still nearby when the Hands arrive, the guards try to arrest them and hold them overnight. If they don't resist, the characters are detained in a Sigil District jail, then released the next morning and assessed a fine of 50 gp each for disturbing the peace. While the characters are cooling their heels in jail, Ophidas (who is questioned by the Hands of Ord but not arrested) collects his belongings and disappears. The characters have no chance of finding him again.

entries.name: Success
entries: 如果人物向伊沃报告了奥菲达斯动机的真相，伊沃向人物保证几天后他们会被再次召唤，并从一对{@item sending stones}的石头中给他们一块，以便将来交流。

entries.name: Failure
entries: 如果角色们在Ophidas消失之前没能了解他的动机，Iwo说他们必须先努力成为图书馆管理员，然后才会给他们另一个任务。虽然这条道路最终可能会导致正式的成员资格，但角色们知道他们不能等那么久来揭开Apotheon的神秘面纱，所以他们需要找到另一个派系来加入。

entries.name: Cobalt Soul Mission 2: Half-Baked Scheme
entries: 角色们为钴之魂所做的第二个任务要求他们监视克鲁克老人，一个被怀疑是赃物提供者的半兽人面包师。他们在运河上的悄悄监视演变成了一场激烈的追逐战，因为他们试图阻止强大的魔法落入坏人之手。

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 在人物成功完成第一个任务的七天后，伊沃-扎拉尔通过{@item Sending Stones||sending stone}向其中一个人物发送了一条信息。哪个角色拥有匹配的石头，就会收到消息，内容如下。
"还有兴趣加入钴之魂吗？在导师庙见我。我有另一个任务给你。"
当人物在导师之庙与伊沃重新联系时，读到。
伊沃给你看了一张城市地图，其中一个圆圈指出了河区的一个位置。"我们怀疑当地一个叫克鲁克的面包师参与了危险魔法物品的非法销售，但在涉及奥德之手之前我们需要证据。地图上的圆圈显示了面包店的位置。我们假设克鲁克在日落之后做所有的黑市生意，那时面包店会关门。我建议你等到那个时候再去接近这个地方。"
伊沃要求这些人物完成以下任务。

items: 获得克鲁克老人在黑市上出售魔法物品的证据。
没收在克鲁克面包店发现的任何魔法物品，并把它们带到伊沃。

entries: 伊沃先付给这些人物250戈比，并承诺如果他们获得克鲁克出售魔法物品的证据，就再付250戈比，从他的面包店取回的每件魔法物品再付250戈比。

entries.name: Kruuk Makes a Deal
entries: While outwardly appearing as a kindly, elderly baker, Old Man Kruuk runs an efficient operation as a fence for stolen goods (see "{@area Old Man Kruuk's|1b6|x}" earlier in the chapter). His exploits have earned him connections with not only petty thieves but also professional mercenaries and black-market spellcasters.

entries.name: River District Canal Map
entries: 河区运河地图显示了以下地点。

items.name: Q1: Old Man Kruuk's.
items.entry: 该机构在下文 "运河边的面包店 "一节中有所描述。

items.name: Q2: Trees.
items.entry: 有几棵巨大的雪松树生长在这个区。

items.name: Q3: Canal.
items.entry: 这条5英尺深、20英尺宽的运河是河区众多此类水道中的一条。这些运河上有绳索或桥梁，使行人在该区的旅行更加方便。

entries.name: Bakery by the Canal
entries: 当人物在日落后不久到达克鲁克老人的面包店时，请阅读或转述以下内容。
当你接近建筑物时，可以听到水拍打运河岸边的柔和声音。蜂蜜和玫瑰的香味与新割的草的味道混在一起。门上用大字画着 "克鲁克老人"，门把手上挂着一个牌子，上面写着 "对不起，我们关门了！"。明天早上见！"
检查建筑物的正面，并成功地进行DC16智慧({@skill Perception})检查，可以使角色注意到挂在门把手上的标志被一圈彩色的点所包围。在未经训练的人看来，这些点的摆放很不规则，但了解盗贼行为的人却能认出这些图案是密码的一部分，从而确定这个地方是赃物的存放处。然而，仅凭这个标志还不足以证明克鲁克在贩卖非法魔法物品。

entries.name: Q1a: Bakery Shop
entries: The front door is unlocked, and a small silver bell on the door jingles as it's opened. Unsold items are still sitting in their display cases. Old Man Kruuk, a neutral, half-orc {@creature bandit captain}, sits behind the counter, counting the day's proceeds.

The entry bell spoils any chance of the characters entering undetected. While some characters keep Kruuk occupied, another character can sneak away by making a successful DC 13 Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check.
如果人物试图与克鲁克交谈，他就会回答说面包店已经关门了，但在他们走之前会向他们出售一些吃剩的蛋挞或面包卷。

与克鲁克用盗贼的口吻交谈或成功通过DC15魅力（{@skill Persuasion}）检查的角色会得到他的信任，他就会透露最近有一把 "魔法短剑 "落入他的手中，他计划今晚晚些时候将其出售（见下文"{@area A Deal Goes Down|256|x}"）。如果人物表示有兴趣购买这把武器，克鲁克会要求他们等到买家到来，然后他将把剑卖给出价最高的人。如果人物没有通过检查，克鲁克就不会说任何关于魔法短剑和他的非法生意的事情。

entries.name: Q1b: Bakery
entries: Kruuk's bakery is filthy, with waste bins filled with moldy dough and stale flatbread. Behind a table on the north wall is a secret door that leads to his back room (area Q1e). A character who examines the wall and succeeds on a DC 10 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check finds the hidden door, which can be opened by pushing on it.

entries.name: Q1c: Bedroom
entries: 克鲁克的卧室里有一张写字台和椅子，地板上有一张床垫，架子上放着个人物品，还有一对25磅的哑铃。北面墙上挂着一幅全身穿着暴露的铁皮人的画。这幅画掩盖了一扇通往他的密室的门（Q1e区）。

entries.name: Q1d: Courtyard
entries: 克鲁克庄园的中心是一个长满草的院子。它有木门通往它周围的四个房间。这些门都是锁着的，但任何一扇门都可以用克鲁克随身携带的钥匙打开。一个角色如果成功地进行了DC16的灵巧检查，就可以用{@item thieves' tools|PHB}撬开锁。门可以被一个成功进行DC11力量检查的角色打破。

entries.name: Q1e: Back Room
entries: The exterior door on the west wall is locked. The lock can be picked by a character who makes a successful DC 15 Dexterity check using {@item thieves' tools|PHB}. The door can be broken down by a character who succeeds on a DC 11 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check, but the noise alerts anyone in the building.
这个房间有腐烂的气味，铁制的手铐被栓在墙上。地板上有各种各样的污渍。房间里有水壶、散落的珠宝和装有低价值赃物的箱子。

A character who makes a successful DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check locates a metal lockbox stowed underneath an upside-down crate in a corner of the room. The lockbox can be opened by a character who makes a successful DC 21 Dexterity check using {@item thieves' tools|PHB}. It can also be pried open with a successful DC 16 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. If the box is forced open, poison gas sprays outward, and the character who opened it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@dice 4d10}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour.
箱子里放着克鲁克计划出售的{@item ruidium shortsword|CRCotN}(见下文 "交易进行中")。如果人物获得了克鲁克的信任，他就会打开锁箱给他们看这把剑，然后解释它的魔法特性（见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Ruidium Weapon|CRCotN}}）。

entries.name: A Deal Goes Down
entries: Kruuk plans to meet one hour after sunset with {@creature Ashann|CRCotN}, a chaotic neutral, gnome {@creature occult extollant|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) working for the Consortium of the Vermilion Dream. {@creature Ashann|CRCotN} carries a pouch containing five peridots (500 gp each).

entries.title: {@creature Ashann|CRCotN}

entries: At the appointed time, {@creature Ashann|CRCotN} arrives at Kruuk's bakery. If the characters haven't neutralized him, Kruuk leads {@creature Ashann|CRCotN} to the back room (area Q1e) so she can examine the {@item ruidium shortsword|CRCotN}. If he has more than one potential buyer, Kruuk holds an impromptu auction in the back room and starts the bidding at 1,000 gp. {@creature Ashann|CRCotN} can't afford to pay more than 2,500 gp for the shortsword, and she attacks anyone who bids over that amount. {@creature Ashann|CRCotN} surrenders if she is reduced to 10 hit points or fewer.
如果{@creature Ashann|CRCotN}已经被排除，一个角色可以通过DC14魅力({@skill Intimidation}或{@skill Persuasion})检查成功说服克鲁克以500金币出售短剑，要么威胁他的生命，要么让他相信角色有兴趣成为回头客。

entries.name: Urban Chase
entries: 人物可以在她与克鲁克的交易完成后，等待从{@creature Ashann|CRCotN}那里抢夺{@item ruidium shortsword|CRCotN}，在这种情况下，{@creature Ashann|CRCotN}试图带着剑逃跑，而不是战斗，结果是追击（使用{@book chase rules|DMG|8|Chases}和{@table Urban Chase Complications}表中的{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}）。如果{@creature Ashann|CRCotN}被抓，她会奋力保住{@item ruidium shortsword|CRCotN}，但如果她的命中率降到10点或更低，就会交出它。

entries.name: Returning to the Temple
entries: 伊沃很高兴收到{@item ruidium shortsword|CRCotN}，并交出了约定的奖励以换取它。伊沃小心翼翼，不敢赤手空拳地触摸这把武器。(在仔细检查了这把剑几天后，钴之魂的僧侣们销毁了它，以确保它不会腐蚀任何人）。如果角色们似乎不愿意放弃这把剑，伊沃警告他们，这把武器可能会对持剑者造成危险。如果有必要，伊沃会将奖励提高到1000金币，希望额外的硬币能说服人物放弃武器。
如果人物有克鲁克、{@creature Ashann|CRCotN}或两者都在他们手中，伊沃就会把罪犯拘留起来，直到召唤出奥德之手把他们带走。

entries.name: Joining the Cobalt Soul
entries: 在人物成功完成这项任务的七天后，钴之魂的档案管理员认为他们有足够的价值和动力加入他们的组织，成为正式成员。人物通过{@item Sending Stones||sending stone}收到来自伊沃的简短祝贺信息。会员资格有以下好处。

items: 每个新成员都会收到一件和钴魂其他成员一样的僧袍。如果袈裟丢失或损坏，可以在导师寺院以1戈比的价格购买一件替换。
Each new member receives free lodging in Ank'Harel for as long as their membership lasts. The lodging is of comfortable quality (see "{@area Lodging|191|x}" earlier in the chapter).

新会员可以在导师庙购买以下魔法物品：一个{@item spell scroll}的{@spell detect magic}(10 gp)，一个{@item spell scroll}的{@spell divination}(125 gp)，一个{@item spell scroll}的{@spell commune}(250 gp)，和一对{@item sending stones}(250 gp)。

entries: 除非他们成为该派别的成员，否则这些人物不能再接受来自钴魂的任何任务。

entries.name: Cobalt Soul Mission 3: Elephant Uproar
entries: After the Cobalt Soul receives reports of strange happenings in the Suncut Bazaar, High Curator {@creature Jamil A'alithiya|CRCotN} surmises that the Consortium of the Vermilion Dream must be making progress researching the crimson substance known as ruidium. Concerned about the potentially destructive repercussions if the Consortium learns how to use it, Jamil sends the characters to infiltrate the Consortium's headquarters.

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 下一次人物访问导师之庙时，伊沃通知他们，高级馆长想和他们谈谈。高级馆长的办公室在三楼。当人物进入办公室时，阅读。
坐在宽大的桌子旁的是一个不超过30岁的年轻人，棕色的皮肤和淡褐色的眼睛。他的白袍上装饰着蓝色的图案。
He smiles warmly as you enter. "Please, shut the door behind you," he says, closing the book in front of him. "I am High Curator {@creature Jamil A'alithiya|CRCotN}, and I've heard much about you.
"我们知道朱雀之梦财团正在试验一种其领导人称之为ruidium的红色物质。有传言说，这种物质来自安克哈雷尔下面的水下城市凯尔莫罗的废墟。
"我担心财团正在篡改其无法控制的力量。这就是为什么我想让你潜入财团的总部--一个叫 "初食 "的酒馆--并找出任何你能找到的关于它对铷的研究。如果你碰巧遇到了财团拥有的任何魔法物品，请没收它们，并将它们带到我们的寺庙进行检查和保管。"
{@creature Jamil A'alithiya|CRCotN}，一个中立的好人，人类{@creature monastic high curator|CRCotN}(见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8})，为完成任务提供1,000GP的奖励。
虽然他怀疑朱雀之梦的财团已经开始制作瑞金武器和盔甲，但贾米尔暂时对这个信息保密。他希望这些人物能够证实或消除他的猜测。

entries.name: A Bazaar Encounter
entries: 当人物到达日切集市时，阅读。
木头碎裂的声音和恐慌的呼喊声在街道上回荡，然后突然被一声号角般的吼叫声所淹没，预示着两头红色的晶莹大象的到来。一头大象撞开了一个摊位，另一头大步走到它的同伴后面。

This combat encounter takes place on the {@adventure Streets of the Suncut Bazaar map|CRCotN|4|Streets of the Suncut Bazaar}. The crystalline creatures are two {@creature Ruidium Elephant|CRCotN|ruidium elephants} (see their stat block earlier in the adventure). These elephants are running amok and must be destroyed before they cause any further damage.

The first elephant that drops to 0 hit points turns into a tiny marble elephant {@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power} with thin veins of ruidium running through it.

The second elephant crumbles into ruidium dust when reduced to 0 hit points. A character who makes a successful DC 17 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check determines that this elephant was created using magic, with a small amount of ruidium as a material component; in other words, it was never a magic item to begin with.
一旦大象被赶走，人物就可以沿着大象的破坏痕迹回到初食。如果人物与朱雀之梦财团打过交道，就会对这家酒馆很熟悉。

entries.name: Keeping the Figurine
entries: The characters can keep the elephant figurine, but they would be wise not to use it, for the elephant it creates uses the {@creature ruidium elephant|CRCotN} stat block (see earlier in the chapter) and can't be controlled.
如果人物杀死或救赎了阿普提翁（见{@area chapter 7|3d5|x}），小雕像就会摆脱它的ruidium腐蚀，并像普通的{@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant||figurine of wondrous power (marble elephant)}一样运作。

entries.name: First Eclipse
entries: The elephants were released by Khelkur the Gull, a neutral evil, dwarf {@creature occult silvertongue|CRCotN} who's one of the masters of the Consortium of the Vermilion Dream. He and the bartender, Satzrak Runestrider, a neutral evil, blue dragonborn {@creature occult extollant|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8} for both stat blocks), are in First Eclipse's taproom, celebrating the success of their experiment. The tavern is otherwise empty.
当人物进入时，萨兹拉克叫道："我们关门了！"并希望人物立即离开。如果他们不这样做，凯尔库尔说："现在就离开，否则就会遇到厄运！"
除非人物立即离开，否则凯尔库尔和萨兹拉克就会攻击。
战斗结束后，任何搜查凯尔库尔的人物都会发现他的一个口袋里塞着一张皱巴巴的纸条。这张纸条是他的一个同事写的，上面写着以下普通话的信息。
克尔库尔大师。
我们试图进入裂缝的尝试是灾难性的。有一只亚伯勒斯在淹没之城出没。它屠杀了我们上次探险队的所有成员，只留下一个。这个生物自称Alyxian--肯定不是aboleth的名字，但也不是我熟悉的名字。但要知道这一点。卡伊尔-莫罗是我们必须集中精力的地方，以免全知之盟将唯一已知的瑞金来源据为己有。
我们通往裂缝的钥匙丢失了，但我们有一个间谍在淹没之城寻找它。同时，我们已经决定建立一个新的总部。请确保在奥德之手搜查这里之前，第一日蚀被清空，而且是迅速清空。
谦卑地，Dendarron大师
搜索初食的角色没有发现任何魔法物品或其他宝物。Khelkur指挥的财团特工已经清空了酒馆里的贵重物品，并将该派别的总部搬到了新的地方。

entries.name: Returning to the Temple
entries: 任务结束后，贾米尔欢迎人物回到导师之庙。如果他们交出丹达隆的纸条、大象雕像或两者，他就会给他们承诺的1000金币的奖励。
Dendarron大师（Jamil认出他是朱雀之梦财团的领导人之一）的手写纸条清楚地表明，该财团渴望获得更多的瑞金，而瑞金只能通过Cael Morrow的裂缝进入。贾米尔告诉角色们，他将联系Allsight联盟的盟友，为角色们安排进入淹没之城的安全通道。在收到他的消息之前，人物可以做他们想做的事。

entries.name: Cobalt Soul Mission 4: Allegiance Alliance
entries: Seven days after they complete the previous mission, the characters are invited to the Temple of the Mentor to meet with High Curator {@creature Jamil A'alithiya|CRCotN}, who plans to send them on a mission in the Drowned City.

entries.name: Getting the Mission
entries: 当人物到达贾米尔的书房时，阅读或转述以下内容。
当你进入他的书房时，这位高级馆长张开双臂，轻轻地说："欢迎。我很高兴再次见到你。
"Allsight的Allegiance已经允许你进入Cael Morrow。联盟对挖掘现场的控制受到朱雀梦财团的威胁，所以我们必须迅速行动。
"Ruidium是一种神奇的物质，会腐蚀它所接触的一切。它来自一个叫Netherdeep的地方，通过Cael Morrow中心的一个裂缝就可以到达那里。有人告诉我，通过裂缝需要某种钥匙，但我不知道钥匙是什么形式。
"只要裂缝存在，我担心安克哈雷尔会进一步动荡。Netherdeep必须被封锁或摧毁，以免Ruidium继续找到进入Ank'Harel的途径。但首先要做的是。我们需要那把钥匙。"
Jamil认为Allsight的Allegiance和朱雀梦的Consortium利用他们进入Netherdeep的机会，是一种自私的行为。他要求角色们完成以下任务，并在七天前汇报。

items: Enter Cael Morrow and rendezvous with Professor {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN} at the Allegiance of Allsight base camp.
Earn {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight}'s trust and learn how to access the Netherdeep.
获得通往尼瑟迪普的 "钥匙"。

entries: 贾米尔承诺，如果他们找到通往尼瑟迪普的钥匙，就会得到1,000吉普的奖励。
在会议结束时，贾米尔给每个角色一个从该组织借来的Allsight忠诚徽章。这些徽章将允许他们进入凯尔-莫罗，并在挖掘现场自由活动。

entries.name: Insight's Quest
entries: The characters can meet {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} in the Allegiance base camp ({@area area M3|28b|x} in {@adventure chapter 5|CRCotN|5}). She tells them that her companions are searching for the writings of an ancient hero who tried to save Cael Morrow from destruction during the Calamity. Earlier expeditions found dozens of stone tablets from the period in question at the south end of the excavation site. Her team, however, no longer has the force of arms to fight the dangerous creatures that lurk in this region. If the characters can find more of these tablets and return them to her, she'll be grateful.

entries.name: Insight's Reward
entries: If the characters bring back the tablet from {@area area M10|2b5|x} in {@adventure chapter 5|CRCotN|5}, {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} shares the following information:

items: {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} reveals the location of the rift leading to the Netherdeep ({@area area M17|2ce|x} in {@adventure chapter 5|CRCotN|5}) and informs the characters that weapons infused with ruidium can open this rift.
{@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} believes there might be keys to the rift in Cael Morrow—left behind by agents of the Consortium of the Vermilion Dream.

entries.name: Key Locations
entries: 这个任务主要发生在凯尔-莫罗。人物必须访问的关键地点如下。

items.name: Maw of Cael Morrow.
items.entry: This location is the main entrance to the Drowned City (see the "{@area Maw of Cael Morrow|1be|x}" section earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: Allegiance Base Camp ({@area Chapter 5, Area M3|28b|x})
entries: 这个地方是Allegiance在Cael Morrow的业务核心。

entries.name: Unstable Building ({@area Chapter 5, Area M10|2b5|x})
entries: This location contains the tablet that {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} seeks.

entries.name: Cliffside Villa ({@area Chapter 5, Area M13|2be|x})
