entries: The "key" to enter the Netherdeep can be any {@item ruidium weapon|CRCotN}. Such an item can be found in this sunken villa.

entries.name: Returning to the Temple
entries: 如果人物完成任务并回到贾米尔身边，他就会给他们1000金币的奖励，并要求他们在七天后等待另一次召唤。

entries.name: Cobalt Soul Mission 5: Enemy of Our Enemies
entries: 在这些人物完成上一次任务的七天后，贾米尔要求与他们再次会面，期间他传授了以下信息。

items: 在过去的七天里，"全美之家 "和 "朱雀之梦 "财团之间的关系越来越紧张。
通往Netherdeep的裂缝由一个相信自己是传说中的Apotheon的aboleth守卫着，它在保卫自己的王国，抵御入侵者。
据说Apotheon在灾变结束时死在了Cael Morrow。也许阿波提确实是这位堕落英雄的某种诡异表现。

entries: 杰米尔需要这些人物完成以下任务之一，并在三天内报告。

items: 如果Aboleth真的是Alyxian，它可能会听从理智。人物必须告知boleth他们不是Apotheon的敌人，并说服它允许他们进入裂缝。
如果第一个任务无法完成，角色们必须杀死aboleth，这样他们在时机到来时就能更容易地进入Netherdeep。

entries: 贾米尔对这项任务的奖励是1000金币。他承诺他将继续研究尼瑟迪普，希望他能帮助他们最终进入尼瑟迪普。

entries.name: Key Locations
entries: 这个任务主要发生在凯尔-莫罗。人物必须访问的关键地点如下。

items.name: Maw of Cael Morrow.
items.entry: This location is the main entrance to the Drowned City (see the "{@area Maw of Cael Morrow|1be|x}" section earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: Temple of the Arch Heart ({@area Chapter 5, Area M9|2ad|x})
entries: 这个地方是阿利仙的最后一个祈祷场所。进入它是解锁{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}的全部力量的必要条件。

entries.name: Kelp Forest ({@area Chapter 5, Area M11|2b9|x})
entries: Alyxian Aboleth在这里藏身，不过人物可能在其他地方遇到这种生物。

entries.name: Rift to the Netherdeep ({@area Chapter 5, Area M17|2ce|x})
entries: 这个平面裂缝连接着尼瑟斯底层和物质界。

entries.name: Negotiating with the Aboleth
entries: The {@creature Alyxian Aboleth|CRCotN} attacks the characters on sight. As an action, a character claiming to be Alyxian's friend or ally can try to persuade the aboleth to leave the party alone, doing so with a successful DC 25 Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, or DC 15 if that character presents the {@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}.
如果检查失败，Aboleth就会对人物大吼："我是Alyxian! 我是Apotheon! 我是神圣的，我是无敌的! 我是凡人无法企及的！" 这个妄想的怪物无情地攻击它的敌人。
如果检查成功，boleth会满意地咕哝着说："那么，我的朋友们，我将加入你们的战斗，打败我们共同的敌人，就像我很久以前做的那样。" aboleth不再攻击人物，如果他们要求的话，就会骚扰他们的对手和他们所确定的任何其他对手。

entries.name: Cobalt Soul Mission 6: Destroy the Netherdeep
entries: 钴魂故事轨道的最后一个任务要求人物进入尼瑟德普，并试图从内部摧毁它。
从上一个任务回来七天后，这些人物从贾米尔那里接到了下一个任务，他传授了以下信息。

items: 朱雀之梦财团和万象之盟都在试图囤积瑞迪姆。如果不立即切断流向尼瑟迪普的废墟，后果可能是灾难性的。
财团已经派了一批熟练的冒险者进入尼瑟德普。(这群人就是敌对方）。
为了在Netherdeep的水下压力下生存，人们需要一件至少部分由Ruidium制成的物品。{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}也能让佩戴者承受住压力。)

entries: Jamil要求这些角色找到摧毁Netherdeep的方法，并在14天内向他报告。贾米尔说，他想不出有什么合适的奖励来完成这么大的任务，但他给每个角色提供了2000金币，希望这就够了。

entries.name: Success
entries: 这个任务只有在人物杀死或救赎Alyxian，从而在这个过程中摧毁Netherdeep和所有ruidium的情况下才能成功（详见{@area chapter 7|3d5|x}）。

data.name: Chapter 5: The Drowned City
entries: 凯尔-莫罗位于安克-哈雷尔的地基下的一个被淹没的洞穴中。这里只剩下废墟，但即便如此，毫无疑问，在灾变之前，卡奥莫罗是世界上最宏伟的城市之一。(城市的原名不详；"Cael Morrow "是Allsight Allegiance的考古学家们给这个地方起的名字）。在那些日子里，这里是各类精灵的家园--包括那些在科瑞隆在战场上刺穿了毁灭者格鲁姆什的眼睛之后，被他的血液转化为埃克桑德里亚第一批兽人的人。这座城市是一个希望的堡垒，它的魔法护栏受到拱心的祝福。
由于输给了科雷隆，格鲁姆什被激怒了，他发誓要消灭凯尔-莫罗。背叛者站在一百多英尺高的地方，在城市中心的科雷隆神庙上隐约可见。在那里，他举起了他可怕的长矛，打算用如此大的力量击打大地，使整个马尔凯特化为灰烬--只是在最后一秒，他的一击被阿普特翁的阿利仙所抵挡。

淹没之城Cael Morrow是成千上万格鲁姆什受害者的坟墓。即使是阿莱克斯安的牺牲，以他的自由为代价保护了马奎特的大部分土地，也无法拯救这座城市。现在，凯尔-莫罗的中心是一个平面裂缝，诞生于格鲁姆什的长矛击打大地的地方。这个裂缝是通往Netherdeep的大门，是腐蚀元素Ruidium的源头，也是Ank'Harel各派别的一个迷恋对象。这条裂缝将把人物和他们的对手再次卷入冲突--有机会成为英雄。

entries.title: An aboleth mutated by ruidium haunts the dark waters of Cael Morrow

entries.name: Running This Chapter
entries: 本章包含了对凯尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow）废墟的描述，人物在前一章详述的各种派别任务过程中对其进行了探索。这些任务因人物与哪个派别结盟而不同，构成了本章的故事。这些任务对于推进冒险情节并不是必须的；如果角色想拯救Alyxian并进入Netherdeep，他们可以不经派系的提示而这样做。但如果他们需要一个推动力来进入Netherdeep，{@adventure chapter 4|CRCotN|4}的任务可以帮助激励他们。

entries.name: Rival Developments
entries: 和人物一样，对手们代表他们的派别进入了凯尔-莫罗。但险恶的废墟和恐怖的生物让这群人付出了代价。
当角色们在凯尔-莫罗遇到他们的对手时，这可能是他们自巴佐克桑以来的第一次见面。在此期间，对手一直在与一个对立的派别合作，以他们自己的方式探索Cael Morrow和Netherdeep，并面对其中的阴森生物。

By the time the characters meet them again in Cael Morrow, the rivals have changed dramatically. They now use their tier 3 stat blocks (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}). The changes the rivals have undergone are as follows:
{@creature Ayo Jabe (Tier 3)|CRCotN|Ayo Jabe}. 阿尤想证明自己是个英雄，想证明自己比那些人物高明，这种动力把她带到了这个地方。她意识到她的追求使她的朋友们受到了创伤。这种感觉使她怀疑自己的领导能力。阿尤对任何挡在她面前的东西都充满了冷酷的愤怒，包括她自己的不安全感。
{@creature Dermot Wurder (Tier 3)|CRCotN|Dermot Wurder}. 德莫特保护朋友的愿望仍然是他的核心所在。但几十次的战斗和濒临死亡的经历使他的不确定性变成了坚定的信心。
{@creature Galsariad Ardyth (Tier 3)|CRCotN|Galsariad Ardyth}. 格尔萨里德的傲慢已经从他的心中耗尽--正如他所有其他的情感一样。他目睹了以获得更大的魔法力量为名的难以言喻的恐怖，并通过压制他的所有情感来保护自己不被恐惧和自我厌恶所征服。
{@creature Irvan Wastewalker (Tier 3)|CRCotN|Irvan Wastewalker}. 当他在凯尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow）与滑行血鳍的战斗中失去手臂时，艾文的骑士风度消失了。他的派别盟友为他安装了一个时尚而实用的奥术假肢，但这次与死亡的擦肩而过使他变得脾气暴躁、小心翼翼和不信任。欧文担心，任何进一步的错误都会使他永久地失去生命。

{@creature Maggie Keeneyes (Tier 3)|CRCotN|Maggie Keeneyes}. 一种深深的忧郁在麦琪的心中扎下了根。出于对阿尤的爱，她继续执行任务，但她担心她的领导人的决心可能不足以取得胜利。玛姬不相信卡奥-莫罗（Cael Morrow）的Allsight特工（即使对手已经与该派别结盟），认为他们受到一股邪恶力量的影响。她曾多次与阿尤分享她对这个组织的疑虑。

entries.name: Encountering the Rivals
entries: 这些对手已经隶属于你选择的一个派别，很可能是朱雀梦的财团。他们加入他们的派别并与人物发生冲突的原因取决于到目前为止人物与他们的互动情况。

items.name: Friendly Rivals.
items.entry: 对人物友好的对手们很乐意让这些团体一起工作。

items.name: Indifferent Rivals.
items.entry: 如果对手对人物无动于衷，那么这种竞争就不是针对个人的--这只是生意，而且他们恰好站在不同的立场上。如果他们为同一派别工作，那么对手愿意合作，但他们明确表示打算出线并被视为真正的英雄。

items.name: Hostile Rivals.
items.entry: 对人物有敌意的对手对他们怀恨在心，旨在证明自己的优势。

entries: 角色遇到对手的好时机是当角色试图带着有价值的东西离开Cael Morrow时，例如Netherdeep的钥匙（见{@adventure chapter 4|CRCotN|4}中的派系故事轨道）或其{@item Jewel of Three Prayers (Exalted)|CRCotN|Exalted State}中的{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}（见{@area area M9|2ad|x}）。
如果人物在这一章中战胜了对手，你可以利用对手的失败来改变下一章中探索尼瑟德普的节奏。竞争对手可以用几天时间来舔舐他们的伤口，为下一次与角色的相遇做准备。或者，对手的失败可以让他们重新振作起来，促使他们在探索Netherdeep的过程中取得先机。

entries.name: Allegiance of Allsight Badges
entries: Cael Morrow is currently under the jurisdiction of the Allegiance of Allsight, whose members wear badges inside their robes. (For more information on these badges and how the characters can obtain them, see {@adventure chapter 4|CRCotN|4}.) Interlopers who don't show their official badge when asked are attacked on sight. Allegiance agents try to apprehend intruders by knocking them {@condition unconscious} and then take them to Professor {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN} (see {@area area M3|28b|x}) for questioning.

entries.name: Cael Morrow Overview
entries: 很少有东西在死后仍然保持美丽--凯尔-莫罗就是其中之一。通过Allsight Allegiance的努力，这座沉没的城市的一部分已经被收回，并且用魔法抵御了无孔不入的洪水。在过去的几个月里，该派别已经尽其所能加固城市的侵蚀性建筑，为了该派别的考古追求而确保这个地方。
尽管有这些努力，但卡奥-莫罗仍然是一个基本上不适宜居住的地方。其他世界的水生生物在废墟中茁壮成长，有些适应并扭曲了不可逾越的黑暗，有些则是在尼瑟斯底层产生的反常生长。更糟糕的是，很久以前的灾难中的死者和被诅咒者的灵魂仍然在城市的残骸中出没。

entries.name: Features of Cael Morrow
entries: 凯尔-莫罗地图上所描绘的淹没之城的区域具有以下特征。

entries.name: Architecture
entries: 除非另有说明，凯尔-莫罗的区域有30英尺高的天花板，而连接走廊的天花板有20英尺高。门口有8英尺高，3英尺宽。

entries.name: Flooded Cavern
entries: 包含沉没之城的洞穴在地下500英尺，里面充满了从尼瑟德普裂缝（{@area area M17|2ce|x}）流出的淡水。水通过洞顶的一条狭窄的天然通道（地图上没有显示）涌向安克哈勒。
角色们首先从一个天然石柱（{@area area M1|285|x}）的中空内部进入被淹没的洞穴，这个石柱从洞穴的顶部延伸到底部。

entries.name: Light
entries: 除非另有说明，地图上所有的关键位置都由{@spell continual flame}的法术照亮。唯一不以这种方式照亮的地方是Allsight的Allegiance还没有建立起保护性防御的地方（如下所述）。

entries.name: Magical Barriers and Keystones
entries: 如地图上所示，Allsight的Allegiance已经在Cael Morrow的某些区域建造了1英寸厚的魔法屏障，闪烁着淡蓝色的力量。这些屏障将水逼出了这些区域，留下了干燥、充满空气的房间和走廊。淹没之城的其他地方都在水下。
屏障是隔音的，其边缘与墙壁、门、天花板和地板重叠而不损害这些特征。在屏障与石墙、门、天花板或地板重叠的地方，它是{@condition invisible}和不可触及的。
任何围住一个区域的病房都会在进出该区域的门口形成一道屏障。这些屏障具有气闸的功能。
屏障对所有伤害免疫，对液体不渗透，并且不能被驱散。一个生物可以通过屏障，不管是哪个方向，只要花费5英尺的移动距离，但没有生物可以被另一个生物推或拉过去。当一个生物通过屏障时，它会有一种无害的刺痛感。

每个守卫区都有一个位于其中某处的钥石。例如，一块基石可能被插入门框的顶部或镶嵌在地板上。钥石是一个边长为6英寸的实心灰色石头的立方体，每一面都刻有奥术符文，发出与屏障相同的蓝色光芒。钥石有17点攻击力，50点命中率，对毒药和精神伤害有免疫力。摧毁一个区域的钥石，从它所影响的区域移除一个钥石，或者用{@spell dispel magic}的法术瞄准一个钥石，都会使该区域周围的屏障消散。如果发生这种情况，该区域的每个生物都必须做一个DC20的灵巧救赎，如果救赎失败，会受到21({@dice 6d6})的重击伤害，如果成功，会受到一半的伤害，因为该区域会充满水。

entries.name: The Alyxian Aboleth
entries: 潜伏在Cael Morrow水域的是一个相信自己是Apotheon的实体化身的aboleth。它使用{@creature Alyxian Aboleth|CRCotN}的状态块在{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}。

entries.name: Where Is the Aboleth?
entries: The aboleth's lair is in Cael Morrow's kelp forest ({@area area M11|2b9|x}). The creature routinely swims about in the ruins, striking fear into those who are delving into the remains of the city. If the Alyxian Aboleth is reduced to half its hit points or fewer, it retreats to its lair and tries to take an uninterrupted short rest, regaining {@dice 9d10 + 36} hit points at the end of it.
当角色们探索Cael Morrow时，要确定Aboleth的下落，请掷出{@dice d20}并查阅Aboleth的位置表，或者选择一个建议的位置。Aboleth可以自由进入所有的水下地图位置。建议每当角色从一个区域移动到另一个区域时，你都要为Aboleth确定一个新的位置，不过如果你认为合适的话，这个生物可以减少移动次数。

entries.caption: Aboleth's Location
rows: 在它的巢穴中沉睡{@area area M11|2b9|x}。
寻找{@area area M8|2a7|x}考古学家的吞噬者
巡逻的裂缝在{@area area M17|2ce|x}。

entries.name: Poisoned Emotions
entries: Aboleth的精神力量已经被弥漫在其肉体中的Ruidium所放大。

当角色第一次进入几个关键地点（{@area M2|288|x}、{@area M4|293|x}、{@area M5a|299|x}、{@area M7c|2a6|x}、{@area M8|2a7|x}、{@area M10|2b5|x}和{@area M15|2c6|x}）时，aboleth会向一个随机决定的角色传送心灵感应的信息，这个角色会听到aboleth的声音--他们在幻觉中听到的Alyxian的真实声音的扭曲版本--在他们的头脑中回荡。在 "中毒情绪 "表上掷骰子，以确定阿波勒斯的信息。在接收到信息后，角色必须在DC10智慧救赎中成功，否则就会受到信息的相应影响，如表中所述。角色可以在完成短时或长时休息后重复蓄力，成功后结束对自己的影响。该效果也可以通过任何结束诅咒的魔法从一个角色身上消除。
当阿普特恩的意识在科里隆神庙中显现时，阿波利特就会失去这种能力（见{@area area M9|2ad|x}中的 "第二视觉"），任何目前受其影响的生物都会感到其效果立即结束。

entries.caption: Poisoned Emotions
rows: "忘恩负义的可怜虫--他们已经忘记了我所做的一切！"
该角色在智力检查和智力救赎方面有劣势。
"我的力量是不够的。它永远不会是。"
该人物在攻击卷上有劣势。
该角色在智慧检查和智慧救赎上有劣势。
"他们是对的。我带来的只有绝望。"
该角色在魅力检查和魅力救赎中处于劣势。
"如果我活不下去了，我就把这个世界和我一起烧掉。"
Whenever the character hits a creature with a weapon attack, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} psychic damage, and the character also takes {@dice 1d6} psychic damage.

entries.name: Uncharted Waters
entries: 凯尔-莫罗的许多地区还没有被 "全知之心 "所保护。探索没有魔法屏障保护的地区是一个危险的提议，饥饿的海洋生物很可能潜伏在任何角落里。当人物进入一个没有防护罩保护的凯尔-莫罗的区域时，在凯尔-莫罗的遭遇表上滚动，以确定他们面临的情况。如果该地区已经有敌意的生物，就不要在这张表格上滚动了。
卡伊尔-莫罗（Cael Morrow）包括本书描述之外的许多其他区域。你可以用这个表格中的遭遇来填充沉没之城的其他部分，让队伍去探索。

entries.caption: Cael Morrow Encounters
rows: 一只{@creature swarm of sorrowfish|CRCotN}（见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}）围绕着鲨鱼尸体的残渣成群结队，贪婪地寻找更多的猎物。
Three {@creature Scuttling Serpentmaw|CRCotN|scuttling serpentmaws} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) search for food.
一个{@creature giant octopus}与一个锁着的箱子搏斗。箱子里有1000个硬币，是很久以前在Cael Morrow铸造的。
当一个{@creature death embrace|CRCotN}(见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8})注意到人物时，触手从黑暗中迸发。
两只{@creature Slithering Bloodfin|CRCotN|slithering bloodfins}(见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8})在水中疾走，渴望吃到食物。
Two {@creature aboleth spawn|CRCotN} (see their stat block later in the chapter) spot the characters and flee to alert the Alyxian Aboleth, which appears 1 minute later.

entries.name: Cael Morrow Locations (M1-M8)
entries: 下面描述的地点是以凯尔-莫罗地图为关键。这张地图并没有显示整个沉没的城市，只是显示了对这次冒险很重要的区域。你可以通过添加你自己设计的地点和遭遇来扩展卡艾尔-莫罗。

entries.name: M1: Stone Column
entries: A 10-foot-wide spiral staircase descends along the interior of a hollow stone column that extends down from the Maw of Cael Morrow in Ank'Harel's Sigil District (described in {@area chapter 4|1be|x}).
当人物第一次到达栏底时，请阅读或转述以下内容。
你从一个螺旋形的楼梯下来，走了几百英尺。附近墙壁上的窗户可以瞥见安克哈勒下面的一座沉没的城市。神奇的灯光照亮了其中的几处废墟，但城市的大部分都被隐藏起来。
楼梯的底部是一个普通的、没有窗户的房间，里面有一箱箱的考古工具和标有Allegiance of Allsight标志的箱子。不远处有一条通道，通向一扇同样标有 "忠诚 "标志的石门。靠在门旁边的墙上的是一个兽人，他戴着全知之心成员的徽章。他似乎并没有注意到你。

The person near the door is a sullen, lawful neutral orc named Gortag Inkdrinker (use the {@creature scholarly agent|CRCotN} stat block in {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}). The characters can surprise him if they act quickly. If the characters are members of the Allegiance of Allsight or the Library of the Cobalt Soul, Gortag treats them as allies and invites them to meet with his superior, Professor {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN}, in the Allegiance base camp ({@area area M3|28b|x}). If the characters accept the invitation, he escorts them there.

If one or more characters aren't wearing Allegiance badges or claim to be in league with the Consortium of the Vermilion Dream, Gortag tells them to halt and return up the stairs and does his best to hinder their progress without provoking conflict. If combat breaks out, he opens the door he's guarding, pushes himself through the magical barrier that extends across the doorway (see "{@area Features of Cael Morrow|27b|x}" earlier in the chapter), and alerts the guards in area M2. If he's successful, he runs to area M3 to warn {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} that enemies have entered the Drowned City. If Gortag is unable to flee, he throws himself on the characters' mercy and can be persuaded to lead the party past the guards in area M2, if only to avoid harm.

entries.name: Crates
entries: 箱子里装着回收的文物和玻璃瓶中的标本，都是为运输而包装的。

entries.name: M2: Warded Entrance Hall

entries: 一条由闪亮的蓝光构成的走廊在你前面延伸。这条密闭的通道在一扇镶嵌在水下建筑墙壁上的门前结束。门口上方是一个小石块，上面刻有发光的蓝色符号。站在门前的是两个卫兵，一个是人类，一个是半身人，他们穿着全知的服装，佩戴着徽章。隧道闪闪发光的墙壁外生长着青翠的海藻，五颜六色的鱼儿在摇曳的鱼群中飞翔。

The first time the characters enter this area, one among them (determined randomly) receives a telepathic message from the Alyxian Aboleth (see "{@area Poisoned Emotions|282|x}" earlier in the chapter).
这个大厅完全是由放置在M3区门口上方的钥石所形成的魔法屏障组成。更多信息见"{@area Features of Cael Morrow|27f|x} "部分。

Two {@creature Scholarly Agent|CRCotN|scholarly agents} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) stand outside the door to area M3. One is a lawful neutral human named Kal, and the other is a lawful good halfling named Nadiya.
这些卫兵以前曾与突袭者和渗透者打过交道。他们对任何试图通过他们而没有徽章的人都充满敌意。如果这些人物是Allsight联盟的成员或由Gortag陪同，这两名守卫会让这群人通过，只需进行最少的询问。如果他们认为这些人物在撒谎，守卫就会转为敌视并攻击。

entries.name: Keystone
entries: 通往M3区的门上方的石块是一块钥石（见本章前面的 "Cael Morrow的特征"）。摧毁这块基石或将它从这个区域移走，会使包围M2区域的魔法屏障消失。当这种情况发生时，走廊里的所有生物都会被水吞没。M3区周围的障碍物则保持完好。

entries.title: The Allegiance of Allsight maintains an underwater base camp, from where it coordinates archaeological excavations

entries.name: M3: Allegiance Base Camp

entries: 这座储存楼有三层，由一个螺旋形楼梯连接。考古学家们正在利用这些书架空间来储存期刊、打捞出的文物和挖掘设备。由闪烁的蓝光屏障遮挡的窗户提供了这个结构外的水下洞穴的景色。
三个身穿 "Allsight "服装和徽章的人--一个铁皮人、一个巨人和一个Kenku--在空间里忙碌着，全神贯注于他们的工作。

The Allegiance's base of operations in the ruins is maintained by an adjunct professor of archaeology named {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN}, a lawful good tiefling. Most of her team has been recalled to the Crystal Chateau, but she still has two research technicians helping her: the laconic {@creature Scribble|CRCotN}, a chaotic neutral kenku, and the rambunctious {@creature Xot|CRCotN}, a neutral good goliath (see the "{@area Goliaths of Exandria|1a4|x}" sidebar in {@adventure chapter 4|CRCotN|4}). See below for their statistics and roleplaying information.

几乎是形影不离，{@creature Scribble|CRCotN}和{@creature Xot|CRCotN}已经在营地一起工作了几个月。他们作为朋友和学者相互补充。{@creature Xot|CRCotN}倾向于不停地谈论她的最新发现，而{@creature Scribble|CRCotN}则耐心地听着，将{@creature Xot|CRCotN}的许多兴奋的胡言乱语吸收到他自己的讲话中。

If {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight}, {@creature Scribble|CRCotN}, and {@creature Xot|CRCotN} become hostile toward intruders, they fight to kill. On the first turn of combat, {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} uses a {@item sending stone|AI} to contact Headmaster Cryon in the Crystal Chateau and request aid. Twenty minutes later, ten {@creature Scholarly Agent|CRCotN|scholarly agents} and five {@creature Scholarly Excavator|CRCotN|scholarly excavators} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8} for both stat blocks) arrive by way of area M1 to secure the base camp.

entries.title: Professor {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN}

entries.name: Insight Acuere
entries: {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|tiefling professor}使用{@creature scholarly mastermind|CRCotN}状态块(见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8})，但有这些变化。

items: 教授会说阿肯语、普通话、地狱语和兽人语。
她对火灾伤害有抵抗力，并且在60英尺范围内有{@sense darkvision}。

entries: {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} won't cooperate with the Consortium of the Vermilion Dream unless she is tricked or magically compelled into doing so. If the characters are members of the Allegiance of Allsight, {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} informs them that they have arrived earlier than she expected, but she's nonetheless happy to see them. If they're allied with the Cobalt Soul, she requires them to prove their usefulness before she reveals any information (see "{@area Insight's Quest|266|x}" in {@area mission 4|263|x} of the Cobalt Soul Story Track in {@adventure chapter 4|CRCotN|4}).

{@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} is the primary archivist for the Cael Morrow archaeological project and would put her life on the line to ensure its success. She is willing to share the results of her research with fellow Allegiance members. {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} can offer the following information in response to the characters' questions:

items: 阻止水的防护措施是由每个被防护的地点的关键石块神奇地产生的。这些基石看起来像小石块，侧面刻有发光的符文。从它所保护的区域移走一块基石，会使该地点周围的障碍消失，让水进入。
竖立起来的护栏在一座古老的拱心殿结束，拱心殿似乎有自己的神奇方式来挡住水。效忠团成员还没有突破神庙的防线。

A fourth member of the expedition, {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight}'s friend {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}, a high elf professor of ancient literature, hasn't been seen in three days. {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} is concerned but hasn't yet considered raising a search party because {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN} has a shield guardian to protect her.

entries.name: Scribble
entries: {@creature Scribble|CRCotN}使用{@creature scholarly agent|CRCotN}状态块(见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8})，但有此变化。

items: {@creature Scribble|CRCotN}能听懂奥兰语和普通话，但只能通过模仿来说话。他可以模仿他所听到的任何声音，包括声音。

entries: {@creature Scribble|CRCotN}看起来很讨人喜欢，但是和他相处超过10分钟的人物就能看出这个肯库有鬼了。在为Cael Morrow寻找遗迹时，他收到了来自Alyxian Aboleth的心灵感应威胁，但他缺乏词汇来表达那次经历的恐怖；不过，他可以重复中毒情绪表上所列的任何短语。

entries.name: Xot
entries: 这个巨人使用{@creature scholarly excavator|CRCotN}状态块（见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}），并做了这些改变。

items: {@creature Xot|CRCotN}会说普通话和巨人语。
她对寒冷伤害有抵抗力，在确定她的携带能力和她能推动、拖动或举起的重量时，她算作大一号。

entries: 如果这些人物是Allsight Allegiance的成员，或者他们在DC14魅力（{@skill Deception}或{@skill Persuasion}）检查中成功，{@creature Xot|CRCotN}会向他们展示她和{@creature Scribble|CRCotN}存放在大楼二楼的物品。她解释说，这些物品被认为太过损坏或无足轻重，不值得运到上面去，但她发现它们太有魅力，不能完全丢弃。

{@creature Xot|CRCotN}的收藏品包括古老的饰品、生锈的矛头和不值钱的珠宝--但如果一个角色成功地进行了DC12智力（{@skill Investigation}）检查，就会发现一个{@item ring of the ram}和一个泥泞的但仍然有效的{@item Potion of Superior Healing||potion of healing (superior)}。{@creature Xot|CRCotN}可以被一个成功进行DC18魅力（{@skill Persuasion}）检查的角色说服，放弃她收藏的这两样东西。

entries.name: Double Agent
entries: Characters who are following the {@area Allegiance Story Track|1cc|x} might come to Cael Morrow hoping to expose a double agent in the expedition. A character who speaks with {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN}, {@creature Scribble|CRCotN}, or {@creature Xot|CRCotN} can make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check to get a sense of that person's loyalty. On a successful check, it's apparent to the character that the individual is fully dedicated to the expedition and doesn't have any intention of betraying their faction.

entries.name: Exploring the Building
entries: Cael Morrow的地图只显示了M3区的第一层，但上面两层的平面图类似。下面对这些楼层进行说明。

items.name: First and Second Floors.
items.entry: These floors have shelves holding organic and mineral specimens taken from Cael Morrow. Characters interested in Exandrian history might find several clay tablets, sound-storing magic crystals, and water-damaged vellum manuscripts containing accounts and images of daily life in the city before the events of the Calamity that brought it to ruin. Tucked among the specimens is a selection of baubles that {@creature Xot|CRCotN} has hoarded.

items.name: Third Floor.
items.entry: Allegiance members come up here to rest. Large holes in the roof are covered by magical barriers of blue force, thanks to a keystone hidden on this floor (see "Keystone" below). This former attic holds six small crates of preserved food, a dozen casks of fresh water, six cots with soft pillows and blankets, and an unlocked wooden case containing two {@item Breathing Bubble|EGW|breathing bubbles} (see {@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Breathing Bubble|EGW}}) with full air supplies and three {@item Potion of Water Breathing||potions of water breathing}. {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} and her companions won't permit the theft of these items, but {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} is willing to share them with the characters if they request her aid and their goals align with hers.

entries.name: Keystone
entries: The keystone that keeps the water out of this building and the L-shaped corridor linking it to area M4 (see "{@area Features of Cael Morrow|27b|x}" earlier in the chapter) is hidden in a wall on the building's third floor behind a loose stone. {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight}, {@creature Scribble|CRCotN}, and {@creature Xot|CRCotN} know where the keystone is, but they won't divulge its location to others if doing so might endanger them or any other Allegiance members.

It takes 10 minutes for a character to thoroughly search the third floor. At the end of that time, the character can make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, finding the keystone on a successful check. If the keystone is destroyed or removed from this area, water comes gushing in through the rooftop. In addition, the barriers that form the corridor to M4 disappear, engulfing the corridor's occupants in water.

entries.name: M4: Royal Guest House

entries: 在你面前的是一座曾经宏伟的白石房子的废墟。天花板已经脱落，留下大理石地板，上面堆满了砖石、破碎的床架和其他至少三层倒塌的家具。一个楼梯从入口大厅通向主房间的上层。蓝色的光墙挡住了四面的水，使室内保持干燥。

The first time the characters enter this area, one among them (determined randomly) receives a telepathic message from the Alyxian Aboleth (see "{@area Poisoned Emotions|282|x}" earlier in the chapter).

Long ago this building was a guest house for royal visitors to Cael Morrow. Now it is an empty husk, mostly picked clean of valuables by the researchers of the Allegiance of Allsight. The keystone for the wards in this location (see "{@area Features of Cael Morrow|27b|x}" earlier in the chapter) is above the north door.

entries.name: M4a: Parlor
entries: 这个没有屋顶的密室里堆满了从倒塌的上层楼和曾经通往上层楼的楼梯的碎石。

entries.name: M4b: Private Study
entries: 这间破败的书房里充满了巨大的倒塌砖石块。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Any character who spends 10 minutes searching through the rubble can make a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check. On a successful check, the character finds a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell teleport}. Only one such scroll can be found here.

entries.name: M5: Access Corridor
entries: 这条由闪闪发光的蓝色屏障组成的走廊与一座守卫塔（M5a区）的遗迹相交，后者也被屏障所包围。维持障碍物的钥石被镶嵌在塔楼的地板上。有关魔法屏障和基石的更多信息，请参见"{@area Features of Cael Morrow|27b|x} "部分。
当他们穿过这个大厅时，人物可以看到东边有深红色的光芒（从{@area area M17|2ce|x}的Ruidium刺里发出来的）。

entries.name: M5a: Crumbling Guard Tower

entries: 冷水从上面滴下，围绕着这座废墟塔的护栏在闪烁。在地板中间的一个浅浅的凹陷处，有一个边长六英寸的石制立方体，它发出嘶嘶的响声，冒着火花。

The first time the characters enter this area, one among them (determined randomly) receives a telepathic message from the Alyxian Aboleth (see "{@area Poisoned Emotions|282|x}" earlier in the chapter).
被动智慧({@skill Perception})得分在15分以上的角色会注意到一只巨鲨的身影在塔上盘旋。只要障碍物还在原地，鲨鱼就不会构成威胁。

entries.name: Malfunctioning Keystone
entries: 任何仔细检查钥石并成功通过DC15智力({@skill Arcana})检查的角色都能确定它的魔力正在减弱，但无法得知它何时会停止运作。凯尔-莫罗的Allsight探险家们并不知道这个问题，因为这块基石最近才开始出现故障。
有问题的基石迟早会失效，导致塔楼周围的屏障和保护相邻走廊的屏障消失。把基石从地板上移开也会导致这种情况发生。在有缺陷的状态下，这个立方体有25点命中率，而不是正常的50点。
如果人物不打扰基石，他们就可以安全通过塔，继续前进。如果他们中的任何一个人第二次回到塔里，基石就会在他们面前发出巨大的爆裂声，并裂成两半，使魔法屏障崩溃。鲨鱼是{@creature corrupted giant shark|CRCotN}（见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}），攻击现在发现自己在水下的角色。

entries.name: M6: Sunken Tavern
entries: 这个石墙酒馆在水下。它的部分外墙已经倒塌，留下了可以看到内部的开口。
裂开的石砖和海带田围绕着一座被淹没的建筑，其内部散发着光芒。通过一面墙上的洞，你看到一个蓝皮肤的精灵，长着白色的头发。从这个角度很难看清她到底在做什么，但她似乎是在打理酒吧。

{@spell Continual flame} spells illuminate the interior of this underwater tavern, which is strewn with detritus. A neutral good sea elf named {@creature Olara|CRCotN} floats behind a granite countertop. If approached, the barkeep cheerfully introduces herself and welcomes the characters to what she calls the Last Willow Tavern. {@creature Olara|CRCotN} uses the {@creature scout} stat block, with these changes:

items: 她的游泳速度等同于她的步行速度，她可以呼吸空气和水。
她有{@sense darkvision}到60英尺的范围。
她对寒冷伤害有抵抗力，并且在结束自己身上的{@condition charmed}状态的拯救动作上有优势。魔法无法使她入睡。

entries: {@creature Olara|CRCotN}会说一种古老的方言，这种方言构成了精灵语和兽人语的基础，任何能说并理解这两种语言的角色都能与她交谈。这是她与一些仍在凯尔-莫罗废墟上出没的亲属鬼魂的共同特征，但（1%）不是鬼魂；她是几个世纪前从格鲁姆什的攻击中幸存的少数凡人之一。她以生长在整个淹没之城的海带为生。
在Netherdeep和Alyxian Aboleth附近度过的数十年，损害了{@creature Olara|CRCotN}的记忆。一些Allegiance of Allsight的考古学家与{@creature Olara|CRCotN}进行了交流，但无济于事，由于她对他们的努力没有表现出敌意，他们决定不再管她。

entries.name: Buying Goods from Olara
entries: {@creature Olara|CRCotN}对待这些人物就像对待她酒馆里的顾客一样，她评论说，虽然酒馆里没有食物和烈酒，但她仍然可以提供一些特殊的酒水。如果角色对她有兴趣，{@creature Olara|CRCotN}就会展示她收藏的普通葡萄酒和魔法药水--它们的容器都是密封的。角色可以购买这些物品中的任何一种。

items.name: Magically Preserved Wine.
items.entry: {@creature Olara|CRCotN}有三瓶这种美味的、分歧前的年份酒的库存，每瓶要价50金币。Ank'Hareli的品酒师将为这瓶稀有的葡萄酒支付高达1,000金币。

items.name: Potions of Healing.
items.entry: {@creature Olara|CRCotN}有5个{@item Potion of Healing||potions of healing}的存货，以每个50戈比出售。

items.name: Potions of Heroism.
items.entry: {@creature Olara|CRCotN}有两个{@item Potion of Heroism||potions of heroism}的存货，以每个300gp的价格出售。

entries.name: Clearing Olara's Mind
entries: 笼罩{@creature Olara|CRCotN}头脑的阴霾是由魔法引起的，这是多年来在Alyxian Aboleth和Netherdeep附近的结果。任何结束诅咒的魔法都能治愈{@creature Olara|CRCotN}的痛苦。杀死Aboleth也会结束这个效果。

If the characters ask {@creature Olara|CRCotN} about Alyxian after clearing her mind, she fondly recalls serving wine to him on one occasion. She remembers Alyxian as a haunted and tragic figure, but beautiful in a way.

entries.name: M7: Hall of the Royal Library
entries: 一条干燥的、充满空气的走廊被魔法屏障包围着，由{@spell continual flame}法术照亮，沿着一栋摇摇欲坠的石头建筑的南侧。维持走廊屏障的钥石设置在西边的门上。关于魔法屏障和基石的更多信息，请参见 "凯尔-莫罗的特点 "部分。
走廊北墙的一扇门通向一个干燥、充满空气的图书馆（M7a区）。南墙的一扇门外有一个被水淹没的密室（{@area area M8|2a7|x}），门口有一个保护屏障，可以挡住水。走廊东端的一扇门也有类似的屏障，透过它，人物可以看到拱心殿（{@area area M9|2ad|x}）。

entries.name: M7a: Royal Reading Room
entries: 神奇的障碍物包围着这个房间，把水挡在外面。这个房间的钥石设置在南门上方。如果基石被破坏或从这个区域被拿走，房间周围的屏障就会消失，导致水从北门冲入，并从墙壁和屋顶的裂缝中渗入。房间需要1分钟才能完全被淹没。关于魔法屏障和基石的更多信息，请参见"{@area Features of Cael Morrow|27b|x} "部分。
当人物第一次进入这个区域时，请阅读或转述以下内容。
尽管这个被魔法照亮的房间已经被抽干了水，但空气中充满了腐烂的、被水淹没的木材的味道。墙上的书架上摆满了被淹没了几个世纪的书籍和卷轴，已经变成了烂泥。
一个女精灵正在筛选房间里的杂物，似乎很气愤的样子。站在她附近，但看着你的方向的是一个十英尺高的建筑，它的双足由金属、石头和木头组成。

一个名叫{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}的中性邪恶的高等精灵{@creature occult extollant|CRCotN}（见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}）和她的{@creature shield guardian}Crescent一起在这个房间扎营。{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}脖子上挂着{@item Master's Amulet|MM|shield guardian's amulet}，但把它藏在衣服下面。
修改{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN|Galeokaerda's}状态块如下。

items: {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}会说天族语、普通话和精灵语。
她有{@sense darkvision}到60英尺的范围。
She has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

entries: As described in the faction story tracks in {@adventure chapter 4|CRCotN|4}, {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN} has long posed as a professor of the Allegiance of Allsight and has become {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight}'s friend. Now she regrets betraying her friend and secretly hopes that she can convince {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} to turn against the Allegiance of Allsight when {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN} and the Consortium of the Vermilion Dream take over Cael Morrow.

entries.title: {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}

entries: If the characters are on a mission that doesn't involve {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}, she tells them to get lost while claiming that she's doing research for the Allegiance of Allsight. If the characters refuse to leave, she threatens to unleash her shield guardian. But if the characters call her bluff, she doesn't follow through on her threat, afraid that doing so will lead to her defeat. If the characters attack {@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN} or Crescent, however, the two of them react in kind.

{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}对任何她不认识的人都很怀疑，即使是与财团有关联的人。如果人物的任务涉及到(%%)，并且把自己描绘成同行的探险家，她会要求他们从M7b区拿回一块泥板来证明自己的价值，她说这块泥板上刻有一个 "符号序列"。如果他们这样做了，她会告诉他们，她已经确定了通往尼瑟迪普的钥匙的位置：南部悬崖上的一座废墟别墅（{@area area M13|2be|x}）。

entries.name: Double Agent
entries: 在与{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}的任何谈话结束时，一个角色可以通过成功的DC15智慧（{@skill Insight}）检查来辨别她的真实意图和归属。任何仔细观察{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}的角色都可以通过成功的DC15智慧({@skill Perception})检查，发现她手臂上明显的ruidium腐败痕迹。如果有角色注意到这些标记，{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}会匆忙地试图解释她是如何在工作中得到这些标记的；然后她意识到任何解释都是没有结果的，于是就会攻击。

entries.name: M7b: Royal Study Chamber
entries: This damaged, water-filled chamber contains a hungry {@creature swarm of sorrowfish|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}).

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 躺在房间中间的地板上的是一个{@item teleportation tablet|CRCotN}(见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Teleportation Tablet|CRCotN}})，是朱雀之梦财团的成员留下的。这个人在搜索该地区的遗物时，一条巨鲨从屋顶的一个洞中进入。这名特工惊慌失措地逃走了，在返回M7a区的路上丢掉了石碑。{@creature Galeokaerda|CRCotN}想获得这块石板，它连接到安克哈雷尔的日割集市中第一食堂屋顶上的一个传送圈（见{@area chapter 4|1c4|x}）。

entries.name: M7c: Royal Ritual Chamber
entries: 这个被水淹没的房间已经被水和时间剥得一干二净。

The first time the characters enter this area, one among them (determined randomly) receives a telepathic message from the Alyxian Aboleth (see "{@area Poisoned Emotions|282|x}" earlier in the chapter).

A character who spends at least 1 minute searching the area can make a DC 14 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, uncovering a permanent teleportation circle on a success. A character who knows this circle's sigil sequence (which can be learned by studying the circle for 1 minute) can teleport to it using the {@spell teleportation circle} spell.

entries.name: M8: Submerged Library

entries: 在这个曾经的图书馆的残骸中，躺着刻有文字的破碎泥板。曾经抛光的大理石架子现在成了长满珊瑚的废墟，上面长满了海带。一扇圆形玻璃窗的碎片散发出微红的光线。

The first time the characters enter this area, one among them (determined randomly) receives a telepathic message from the Alyxian Aboleth (see "{@area Poisoned Emotions|282|x}" earlier in the chapter).

The writing on the tablets is in a script that has elements familiar to anyone who understands Elvish or Orc. Any character who spends at least 10 minutes searching through the detritus can make a DC 13 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, finding three unbroken tablets amid the rubble on a success.
当按照适当的顺序并排放置时，这三块石板讲述了精灵在艾克桑德里亚各地聚集的故事；科瑞隆对他们的定居点凯尔莫罗的祝福；以及第一批兽人的诞生。然而，在以这种方式操纵石板之前，人物必须处理困扰他们的古代幽灵。

entries.name: Haunted Tablets
entries: Each of the three unbroken tablets is inhabited by a lawful neutral {@creature ghost}, desperate for a peaceful end to its suffering. When a Humanoid first touches a tablet, the ghost inside tries to possess the creature using its Possession action. If the creature resists that attempt, the ghost appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the tablet. After one ghost has emerged from its tablet, whether by possessing a creature or otherwise, the other two ghosts appear alongside it.
其中两个鬼魂看起来像男性精灵，第三个看起来像女性兽人。这三个人都穿着优雅的长袍，上面有精美的刺绣。鬼魂没有敌意；他们试图占有生物，只是为了让他们能够分享自己的故事，从而在死后找到安宁，但如果受到攻击，他们会自我保护。在附身于生物时，鬼魂会将生物的身体尽可能地远离战斗，并且不强迫生物进行攻击。

任何被鬼魂附身的角色都会经历鬼魂过去生活的幻象：他们的家人和朋友，他们的城市在全盛时期闪耀的雪花石尖顶，以及格鲁姆什开始进攻时疯狂的疏散尝试。幻象以一个场景结束，显示两个精灵和兽人在一个富丽堂皇的图书馆里，即将牺牲他们的生命，徒劳地试图保存他们的历史，以便他们所爱的人不会被遗忘。他们从图书馆的窗户向外看，看到了附近的一座神庙。一个手持长矛和盾牌的孤独战士--亚利桑--站在建筑物的顶端。他被笼罩在阴影中，而格鲁姆什那一百英尺高的身影在他头上晃动并大笑。当格鲁姆什的长矛落在神庙上时，视野变暗。幻象需要1分钟的时间才能完全展现出来。当它结束时，鬼魂结束了附身。

entries.name: Speaking with the Ghosts
entries: 会说精灵语或兽人语的角色可以与鬼魂交谈，他们说的是一种古老的方言，构成了两种现代语言的基础。鬼魂们尊敬阿普特恩，他们认为阿普特恩是为了反抗格鲁姆什而枉死的。他们对Alyxian知之甚少，只知道他与Sehanine、Avandra和Corellon的神圣联系，而且他们不知道Netherdeep和ruidium的存在。

entries.name: Laying the Dead to Rest
entries: The ghosts find peace if they are reassured that they and their city will be remembered. A character can try to bring peace to the ghosts by offering reassuring words and then making a DC 12 Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check. A character who was possessed by one of the ghosts has advantage on the check. On a successful check, the ghosts thank the character before disappearing in a shimmer of light. As a token of the ghosts' gratitude, the character gains {@book inspiration|PHB|4|inspiration} (see the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}). On a failed check, the ghosts are not laid to rest, and further attempts by that character to reassure the ghosts fail automatically.

entries.title: Divine magic keeps water from flooding the temple of Corellon in the sunken heart of Cael Morrow

entries.name: M9: Temple of the Arch Heart

entries: 一座曾经雄伟的石庙矗立在一个下沉的院子中间。发出柔和光芒的雪花石柱围绕着这个空旷的地方。脉动的红光从通往寺庙内部的拱门发出。

被动智慧({@skill Perception})得分在15分以上的角色注意到在雪花石柱和神庙中心之间的水面上过滤的光线出现了扭曲。柱子在神庙周围投射出一个{@condition invisible}的神圣魔法保护穹顶。只有由科瑞隆的虔诚崇拜者陪同的角色才能通过这个穹顶；否则，这个穹顶无法被穿透，对所有伤害免疫，也无法以任何方式被驱散。如果队伍中没有角色符合这一要求，可以在{@area area M14|2c2|x}中找到科里隆的一个牧师的鬼魂。

entries.name: Temple Interior
entries: 如果人物移动到可以看到寺庙南墙的拱门的位置，就读。
寺庙的内部是干燥的。雕刻精美的柱子排列在内墙，地板上装饰着银色和绿色的玻璃马赛克，上面描绘着两个青翠的新月和一颗四角星。马赛克的中心是一块红色的水晶碎片，以模拟心跳的方式跳动着光芒。猩红的卷须从它身上散发出来，爬过石雕。靠北墙站着一尊科雷隆的雕像。
寺庙里的空气很新鲜，有淡淡的香火味，尽管气味的来源并不明显。科瑞隆的神术将水隔绝开来，只要科瑞隆的雕像保持完好，屏障就会一直存在。雕像有AC20；80点攻击力；对毒药、精神和辐射伤害免疫。如果雕像被毁，神庙周围的神力屏障就会结束，允许水从入口处涌入，并使生物能够在没有科瑞隆的牧师或神职人员陪同下进入神庙。

entries.name: First Vision
entries: 当人物第一次进入寺庙时，一种和平的感觉降临在他们身上，一种愿景充满了他们的头脑。
一个画面出现在焦点上。Alyxian在这个地方跪着，他的头弯曲，表情憔悴。他看起来老得不能再老了。他抬起目光看向科瑞隆的雕像，尽管他的脸上露出了{@condition exhaustion}的表情，但他的眼睛却很清晰。
"不惜一切代价，"他低声说，他的声音充满整个房间。"即使它以我的生命和灵魂为代价。我将不惜一切代价来保护他们。"
任何在寺庙中心的红色脉动水晶10英尺范围内的生物都必须在DC15智慧救赎中成功，否则就会成为它的{@condition frightened}。这个效果一直持续到该生物离开神庙。蓄力成功的生物会对水晶的恐惧效果产生免疫。

entries.name: Second Vision
entries: 从马赛克上突出的Ruidium碎片在神庙中显然是不合适的。第一次与水晶进行物理接触的人物经历了第二个异象。
一阵光亮吞噬了你，就像高速行驶的感觉一样。你正在下降，比你想象的要快，因为你的胸骨上方绽放出一阵剧痛。你一直在下坠。光线逐渐减弱，然后熄灭。
突然间，你俯视着漂浮在黑夜中的阿利仙。他的表情是一种慢慢增长的恐怖。他向你伸出一只手臂，似乎在乞求你握住他的手，拯救他。
"当你看到我时，请允许我离开，"他说。"我自己做不到。你必须这样做。你会的！"
异象结束后，红色水晶在裂开和爆炸前发出一声巨大的嘶嘶声。神庙里没有经历过第二次异象的生物看到红色水晶破碎时发出的光芒。刹那间，一个半透明的阿利贤的影像出现在神庙的中心，他的脸色严厉而不耐烦。然后它就消失了，一切又恢复了平静。

When the crystal shatters, the character who touched it must make a DC 16 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the character takes 33 ({@dice 6d10}) psychic damage and gains 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. If the character isn't already suffering from ruidium corruption, the character becomes corrupted when they fail the save. On a successful save, the character takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

当一个角色经历第二个异象时，阿利仙阿波利斯失去了毒害附近生物情绪的能力，而{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}(见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}})则转变为它的{@item Jewel of Three Prayers (Exalted)|CRCotN|Exalted State}--这都是获得大心脏科里隆的祝福的后果。

entries.name: M10: Crumbling Building
entries: 这个结构似乎处于倒塌的边缘。无害的小鱼在墙壁的许多裂缝中飞快地进出。

The first time the characters enter this area, one among them (determined randomly) receives a telepathic message from the Alyxian Aboleth (see "{@area Poisoned Emotions|282|x}" earlier in the chapter).
如果人物探索建筑物的内部，请阅读。
墙壁上布满了褪色的壁画，描绘了兽人和乌鸦一起在青翠的丛林中心建造城市的情景。几十块泥板散落在地板上。

Four {@creature Scuttling Serpentmaw|CRCotN|scuttling serpentmaws} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) lurk amid the rubble and scuttle across the floor to attack characters who investigate the room. Characters who have a passive Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) score of 18 or higher notice the serpentmaws and aren't {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} when they attack.

entries.name: Clay Tablets
entries: Characters who spend 10 minutes searching the floor of the building find, among other clay tablets that describe ancient prayers and catechisms of the monks of the temple of Corellon, the particular tablet that {@creature Insight Acuere|CRCotN|Insight} has been seeking (see "{@area Insight's Quest|266|x}" in {@area mission 4|263|x} of the Cobalt Soul Story Track in {@adventure chapter 4|CRCotN|4}). This tablet is written in Celestial script. It reads:
我不知道谁会读到这篇文章，因为如果我活下来，就没有必要读它，如果我死了，也不会有人活着读它。但我觉得有必要记录我的想法。毁灭者和他的军团向我们靠近。城墙被攻破，被独眼的神变成了废墟。成千上万的人已经死了，还有成千上万的人也会死，除非我能够鼓起勇气来阻止他。
人们已经叫我 "阿普特恩"。我不配拥有这个头衔，但我将要求它。如果称我为半神使他们有勇气与我并肩作战，我就会戴上这个头衔。即使我在接下来的时间里倒下，他们也会向我致敬，让这一牺牲成为他们对抗背叛者的动力。为此，愿这一天的记忆永不消失。

entries.name: M11: Kelp Forest

entries.title: Two aboleth spawn guard the lair of the Alyxian Aboleth

entries: 这里曾经是一个郁郁葱葱的花园，现在到处都是一缕缕的海带，高达大约30英尺。苍白的石头砌成的小神龛矗立在生长物之间。它们的表面雕刻着科雷隆的脸，宁静而仁慈。
两个{@creature aboleth spawn|CRCotN}（见附带的状态块）守卫着海带森林。这些触手生物被束缚在Alyxian Aboleth上，听从它的命令。它们的任务是守护Aboleth的宝藏（见下文 "宝藏"）。

The kelp forest is the lair of the {@creature Alyxian Aboleth|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}). If the aboleth retreated here to take a short rest, it tries to hide from interlopers until its rest is finished before attacking them. If the aboleth is not present but returns to find any of its treasure missing (see below), it scours Cael Morrow in search of the thieves, determined to destroy them.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Any character who spends at least 5 minutes searching the kelp forest can make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, finding the aboleth's accumulated treasure on a success. This hoard consists of a pouch that holds 156 gp, a {@item ruidium shield|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Ruidium Shield|CRCotN}}), a {@item ruidium shortsword|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Ruidium Weapon|CRCotN}}), and a {@item brooch of shielding} still pinned to the garments of a water-bloated human corpse (the remains of an Allegiance of Allsight explorer).

entries.title: {@creature Aboleth Spawn|CRCotN}

entries.name: M12: Cliffside Path

entries: 一条狭窄、蜿蜒的小路登上了一个陡峭的岩石坡，上面散落着形状怪异的石块。这条路分成两个分支，分别沿着一个不同的八十英尺高的山峰向上。一座山峰上有一座曾经优雅的别墅，另一座山峰上有一座破败的瞭望塔。

Closer examination reveals that the chunks of stone are shaped like the dismembered hands, arms, legs, heads, and torsos of Humanoids. The head-shaped chunks all have screaming faces. These are the {@condition petrified} remains of the victims of the creature that has taken up residence in the villa (see area M13). A character who succeeds on a DC 12 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check recognizes the signs of petrification and knows that the bodies are too broken to be restored to life.

entries.name: M13: Villa

entries: 这座建筑的屋顶已经坍塌，但其20英尺高的墙壁仍然基本完好。珊瑚生长在结构底部一个封闭的石门周围。
人物可能会在这个地方遇到他们的对手。竞争对手（如果存在的话）聚集在别墅前，争论是通过门还是通过开放的屋顶进入。用下面的文字来描述里面的情况。
漂浮在废墟别墅中间的是一个巨大的、像水母一样的生物，有带刺的触手。它的铃铛上覆盖着晶莹的晶格，上面夹着一把大斧头，斧头上的纹路是由Ruidium构成的弧形。在铃铛的下面，有一个卷曲的深红色块状物闪烁着能量，为一群细小的尖牙鱼提供庇护。

一个{@creature death embrace|CRCotN}(见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8})在这个曾经富丽堂皇的地方的废墟里做了它的巢穴，攻击任何接近它的触手的人。一只（2%）（见（3%））潜伏在（4%）的卷轴中，获得（5%）。当{@creature death embrace|CRCotN}{@action grapple||grapples}的生物出现时，鱼群就会失去掩护，悲伤鱼就会出现，以{@condition grappled}的生物为食。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 在{@creature death embrace|CRCotN}的铃铛中嵌入了一把{@item ruidium greataxe|CRCotN}(见{@adventure appendix B|CRCotN|9|{@item Ruidium Weapon|CRCotN}})，也就是Allsight联盟和Vermilion Dream联盟所追求的所谓Netherdeep之钥(见{@adventure chapter 4|CRCotN|4})。斧头只有在生物死亡后才能从{@creature death embrace|CRCotN}中取出。

A character who spends 10 minutes searching the villa and succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check finds a locked jewelry box. The jewelry box can be opened by a character who makes either a successful DC 15 Dexterity check using {@item thieves' tools|PHB} or a successful DC 15 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. Inside are two emerald rings (1,500 gp each), a string of pearls (750 gp), and a {@item ring of shooting stars}.

entries.name: M14: Watchtower

entries: 这个瞭望塔坐落在一个高高的山顶上，俯瞰着这座沉没的城市的其他部分。该结构大约有30英尺高，但以前更高。它的一部分已经倒塌了，剩下的结构是一个参差不齐的松散的石冠。一道石门通向地面上的塔楼。
通过敞开的门或游到屋顶往下看，窥视塔内的人物会看到以下场景。
一个摇摇欲坠的楼梯沿着内墙爬到一个15英尺高的阳台。楼梯继续向上攀登，直到离塔顶的空地还有几英尺时才消失。武装起来的、像包裹一样的形式在塔内移动，就像一支准备好的、不知道战争早已结束的驻军。漂浮在阳台上方几英尺的是一个脸色苍白、幽灵般的兽人。

The tower is haunted by eight {@creature Sword Wraith Warrior|MPMM|sword wraith warriors} under the command of Beltreath, a lawful neutral {@creature sword wraith commander|MPMM}. See {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8} for these creatures' stat blocks.

The sword wraiths are former defenders of Cael Morrow who fell during the battle against Gruumsh. They are protecting the {@creature ghost} of Hadarai, a neutral good, orc priest of Corellon. Hadarai is soft-spoken and kindhearted. He swore a vow of pacifism centuries ago that he has never broken; even after being stripped of his mortal form, he won't fight or use Possession.

entries.name: Roleplaying the Spirits
entries: 如果人物进入塔楼或以其他方式表明他们的存在，不和谐的号角声就会穿透水面，战士们会立即聚集起来，保卫哈达莱和塔楼。
在举起武器之前，Beltreath解释说他的战士是淹没之城最后的看守者，并告知人物任何入侵都是不受欢迎的。如果角色解释了他们来到卡奥莫罗的原因，哈达莱和Beltreath会仔细聆听。如果人物所说的目的涉及到帮助阿波提翁，哈达莱和贝尔特雷特都认为这是一个有价值的目标，鬼魂就会对人物友好。

Hadarai met Alyxian once long ago, while the warrior was praying to Corellon for aid in the hours before Cael Morrow was destroyed. Hadarai is slow to accept that the Apotheon yet lives and can be saved, but a character can convince him of the truth of this claim with a successful DC 15 Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check. If a character shows Hadarai the {@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}, the check is made with advantage, since the ghost recognizes the jewel and knows its properties.

If combat breaks out and Beltreath is reduced to 50 hit points or fewer, he surrenders and begs the characters not to destroy him, for Hadarai's sake. If the characters show mercy, Hadarai is grateful and offers to assist them in any way he can. For example, the ghost, as a priest of Corellon, can help the characters bypass the magic ward around the temple ({@area area M9|2ad|x}) or can warn the characters about the {@creature Alyxian Aboleth|CRCotN|aboleth} that haunts the city.
无论Hadarai走到哪里，Beltreath和他的剑灵都会跟随。这些灵魂都不能离开凯尔-莫罗，他们也不愿意。

entries.name: M15: Collapsed Guard Tower

entries: 这座塔既倒塌了，又向内塌了。在它的地基周围是成堆的碎石。

The first time the characters enter this area, one among them (determined randomly) receives a telepathic message from the Alyxian Aboleth (see "{@area Poisoned Emotions|282|x}" earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: Hidden Symbol and Trapdoor
entries: A character who searches the tower ruins and succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check discovers a large symbol of Corellon inscribed on the floor, mostly hidden under sand and debris. Closer examination discloses a 5-foot-diameter, circular stone trapdoor disguised as part of the symbol. The trapdoor is closed and stuck. A character can use an action to try to pry it up by using a crowbar or similar tool, doing so with a successful DC 17 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. A {@spell knock} spell or similar magic can also open it. If all else fails, the trapdoor (which has AC 17, 60 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage) can be destroyed.

entries.name: Secret Armory
entries: 活板门下面是一个10英尺高、20英尺直径的圆形军械库。一个被腐蚀的铁梯子下到了密室中。

A character who searches the opening for traps and succeeds on a DC 17 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check spots a tiny glyph inscribed along the edge of the opening, in a location that's not visible while the trapdoor is closed. If this glyph is dispelled with a successful casting of {@spell dispel magic} (DC 17) or defaced using {@item mason's tools|PHB} or similar equipment, the following trap ceases to function.

entries.name: Trap
entries: 如果一个生物进入军械库而没有先向科瑞隆祈祷，那么房间里就会爆发出一阵光芒。军械库中和陷阱门15英尺范围内的每个生物都必须做一个DC18宪法救赎，救赎失败时受到33({@dice 6d10})辐射伤害，救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。这个陷阱只能被触发一次。

The burst of light from this trap attracts the {@creature Slithering Bloodfin|CRCotN|slithering bloodfins} in area M16 and possibly the {@creature Alyxian Aboleth|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8} for their stat blocks). If the aboleth is in the nearby kelp forest ({@area area M11|2b9|x}) when the trap is sprung, it sees the light and immediately moves to investigate it.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 军械库的墙上挂满了长剑、短剑、长矛、长弓、短弓、装在皮革箭筒里的箭和钢盾--所有这些都被腐蚀或腐烂得没有用处。在这些物品中，有两个魔法物品，都可以通过使用{@spell detect magic}的法术快速找到：一个{@item sentinel shield}和一个{@item frost brand longsword}。否则，一个角色必须花至少1分钟的时间在军械库中寻找这些魔法物品。

entries.name: M16: Collapsed Ruins

entries: 一座宫殿倒塌的废墟散落在洞穴的地面上。黄绿色的海藻从成堆的碎石之间的缝隙中冒出来，被腐蚀的银色和青铜色的尖顶弯曲着躺在地上，五彩的鱼群在它们之间游来游去。
除非角色们在M15区杀了它们，否则有三只{@creature Slithering Bloodfin|CRCotN|slithering bloodfins}(见{@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8})在这个区域徘徊，寻找猎物。角色们发现了它们--三条深红色的条纹在废墟中飞奔。除非角色们立即离开废墟，否则血鳍鱼会游向入侵者并发动攻击。

entries.name: M17: Rift to the Netherdeep

entries: 在一座沉没的宫殿的废墟中，有一道裂缝，上面跳动着病态的红光。在裂缝的开口处，黑色的能量旋转着，闪闪发光，发出嘶嘶声。发光的Ruidium刺从它的边缘冒出来，在空间周围形成一个参差不齐的、部分完整的圆顶。

If the characters have yet to defeat the {@creature Alyxian Aboleth|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}), it senses their intrusion into this area and arrives 1 minute later, attacking the characters in a rage.
通往Netherdeep的裂缝被一层黑色的能量薄膜所覆盖和保护，薄膜上有各种颜色的光谱，看起来很像浮油。水、液体和Netherdeep的生物可以从任何方向通过这层屏障，但其他生物或物体不能这样做，除非这层屏障被{@item ruidium weapon|CRCotN}刺穿（见下文）。

entries.name: Opening the Rift
entries: 要进入裂缝，人物必须使用以下物品之一强行打开它。

items: 一个{@item ruidium weapon|CRCotN}，像{@area area M13|2be|x}中的那个。将武器的边缘接触到屏障，就能打开裂缝。
{@item Jewel of Three Prayers (Exalted)|CRCotN|Jewel of Three Prayers}在其高尚的状态下。当生物将护身符带入裂缝的10英尺范围内时，它就会发出圣光，穿透保护裂缝的屏障。

entries: 当裂缝打开时，60英尺范围内的每个生物都必须做一个DC18的魅力救赎，救赎失败会受到33({@dice 6d10})的精神伤害，成功的话会受到一半的伤害。
当裂缝被打开时，人物可以使用这条路线进入Netherdeep。裂缝在1小时后关闭，但可以再次被强制打开。

entries.name: Into the Netherdeep
entries: The rift to the Netherdeep opens directly into {@area area N1|2e8|x} in {@adventure chapter 6|CRCotN|6}. The first time they reach this area, the characters might not carry out a full exploration. It's likely that they'll return to Cael Morrow and then to the surface, especially if anyone in the party is susceptible to the effects of water pressure, as described in {@area chapter 6|2dd|x}. If they are slow to reenter the Netherdeep, a directive from their faction might be necessary to encourage them to follow their mission to its completion.

data.name: Chapter 6: The Netherdeep
entries: 抛开安克哈雷尔的繁华街道和凯尔-莫罗的阴暗环境，队伍现在要在尼瑟德普的黑暗水域中航行。这个由Alyxian自己创造的异世界的坟墓类似于一个半位面或一个与物质界相连但不属于物质界的超维空间。换句话说，Netherdeep是它自己的存在平面。它是Apotheon的负面情绪发酵的地方，创造出后悔、愤怒、渴望和绝望的迷宫般的壕沟。

entries.title: Adventurers are transported to the Netherdeep, an underwater domain warped by alien magic and the torment of the Apotheon

entries.name: Running This Chapter
entries: Refamiliarize yourself with the {@area Apotheon's back story|00c|x} in the {@adventure introduction|CRCotN|0} before running this chapter. Because this chapter leads up to the final confrontation with the Apotheon, understanding his past and his frame of mind is crucial. The ending of the adventure hinges on whether the characters can help him overcome his pain and despair.

entries.name: Netherdeep Overview
entries: Netherdeep是一个位于无光深渊底部的水下地牢。能够让角色在水下呼吸的法术或魔法物品是探索Netherdeep的必要条件。
下面的章节描述了Netherdeep反复出现的特征，人物在面对Apotheon之前必须获得的苦难碎片，以及人物在走向Apotheon的监狱时必须克服的主要威胁。

entries.name: Netherdeep Features
entries: 以下各节总结了尼瑟德普的重要或反复出现的特征。

entries.name: Ceilings and Floors
entries: 隧道有10英尺高的天花板，而密室或岩洞则没有天花板，除非其描述中另有说明。如果一个区域没有天花板，请假设它的墙壁大约有100英尺高，而墙壁之外是一个黑暗的水下深渊。向上游的生物永远无法到达水面，只能向下返回它们离开的区域。
除非另有说明，所有的隧道都有不规则的地板，与它们相邻的房间的地板在同一高度上。

entries.name: Fragments of Suffering
entries: 要进入囚禁阿波提翁的 "绝望之心"，一个生物必须至少吸收了一个 "痛苦碎片"--阿波提翁所感受到的情感的具体表现。在Netherdeep存在九个碎片。一个苦难碎片看起来就像一个不动的光点，大约有一个无花果那么大。苦难的碎片表显示了碎片的名称和位置。

entries.name: Absorbing a Fragment
entries: As an action, a creature can touch a fragment it can see and thereby absorb the fragment into its body. If a character absorbs a fragment, give that character's player the card that corresponds to the fragment (see {@adventure appendix D|CRCotN|11}). The fragment disappears and becomes part of the creature's soul until the creature dies, transfers the fragment to another willing creature (see "Releasing a Fragment" below), or enters the Heart of Despair.
一个生物最多可以吸收三个苦难碎片。如果一个携带三个碎片的生物试图吸收第四个碎片，这个尝试会自动失败。

entries.name: Releasing a Fragment
entries: 一个生物可以使用一个动作将它携带的一个碎片转移到另一个生物身上，方法是接触该碎片的目标接收者。当一个碎片离开一个生物时，该生物将失去该碎片所赋予的利益和缺点。如果一个角色发起了转移，让该角色的玩家把相应的牌给新的接受者。
如果携带碎片的生物死亡或进入绝望之心，碎片会立即离开该生物并回到它原来的位置（在苦难碎片表中注明）。

entries.title: Alyxian is seen in visions as a young man struggling to come to grips with his destiny

entries.name: Light
entries: Netherdeep中的地点要么被黑暗吞噬，要么被Ruidium矿藏照亮（见下文 "Ruidium"）。所有在Netherdeep的非鲁伊德的光源所发出的光线都是平时的一半。例如，一个{@spell light}的法术在10英尺的范围内发出亮光，在另外10英尺的范围内发出暗光。

entries.name: Ruidium
entries: 整个Netherdeep都有大量的Ruidium。短暂接触朱砂矿物并无害处，但接触超过几秒钟就会导致瑞德姆腐蚀（见"{@area Ruidium Corruption|022|x} "中的{@adventure introduction|CRCotN|0}）。抵抗腐败的救赎DC是20。

entries.name: Secret Doors
entries: Netherdeep中的秘密门是由与周围的墙壁相同的Ruidium纹路的石头制成的。在任何有秘密门的地方，文字都会解释如何找到和打开这扇门。

A character who spends at least 10 minutes searching an area for secret doors can make a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check at the end of that search. If the check succeeds and there's a secret door to be found, the character finds it. Secret doors in the Netherdeep are unlocked unless otherwise noted, and they open easily despite their great weight.
当人物通过一扇秘密门时，除非它被抓住或楔入，否则它将在他们身后关闭。通过过一次暗门的人物总是可以从门的任何一侧找到并再次打开它。
秘密之门有AC17，50点攻击力，对毒药和精神伤害免疫。任何在暗门10英尺范围内的生物，如果对它造成伤害，必须进行DC 15宪法救赎，救赎失败会受到22({@dice 4d10})精神伤害，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。

entries.name: Water Pressure
entries: Netherdeep是一个超自然的深渊，它对里面的生物施加的水压是大多数凡人无法承受的。非Netherdeep的生物在Netherdeep内每呆一分钟就会受到35({@dice 10d6})的力量伤害，除非他们穿着或挥舞着注入了Ruidium的物品或在他们体内嵌入了Ruidium。请参阅{@area appendix B|427|x}以了解更多关于鲁伊迪恩物品的信息。

entries.name: Apotheon Lore
entries: 在这一章中，人物经历了转瞬即逝的幻觉，揭示了阿利仙的过去。角色们作为一个团体经历这些幻象，无论他们彼此之间有多亲近。这些幻象是按照阿普特恩传说表格中的顺序出现的。
只要发生以下事件之一，就会出现异象。

items: 角色们作为一个团体，在尼瑟迪普完成了一次短暂或长时间的休息。
一个角色吸收了一个苦难的碎片。
A character falls {@condition unconscious} in the Netherdeep.
如文中所述，尼瑟迪普的一些其他事件会触发一个异象。

entries: 在人物收到所有20个幻象后，他们可以拼凑出阿波提翁的整个故事。

entries.caption: Apotheon Lore
rows: 一个孩子出生了，阴森地沉默着，而助产士拒绝抱他。"看。甚至他也知道，"当他的母亲抱着婴儿颤抖时，她对他的母亲咆哮道。"他小小的灵魂准备迎接可怕的预兆，这些预兆将困扰他的余生。"
两位父母将一个婴儿放在Pelor的牧师面前，乞求他的祝福。牧师在婴儿的头上做了个手势，然后又缩了回去。"这里对他没有帮助。别犯傻了。红月亮的标记是无法治愈的。"
一个面包师把一个蓬头垢面的男孩藏在店里的柜台后面，趁人不注意给他塞了一个蛋挞。外面，孩子们在笑着呼唤这个有预兆的男孩，一个顾客偷偷地对面包师说："我听说他身上流着背叛者的血。"
一个少年在朱红色的月亮下睡得很不安稳，月亮的光辉以微弱的红色调洗刷着他。他不容易休息，直到一朵云飘到月亮前面，把月亮的视线从他的睡梦中遮住。
一个年轻人站在山顶上，看到了绿色的Xhorhasian风景线。他拿着一把茂盛的花朵。画面一转，现在他看到的是被灾变破坏的相同景观--绿色植物被烧成了灰烬，山坡上到处是尸体，他握着一把滴血的剑。
在一个充满人和怪物尸体的广场上，一名士兵蹲在她死去的指挥官身边。责任的重量不自觉地落在她身上。"Harbinger！"她向Alyxian吐口水。"战争的使者！预兆! 我们庇护了你！"
当他劈开面前的敌人时，年轻战士的喉咙里发出了咕咕的吼声。他急促的呼吸使他周围的盟军士兵感到害怕。"恶意的预兆，"一个人对另一个人嘶吼道。"不要和他作对。"
现在已经成年的战士跪在变化使者阿凡达的废墟庙宇中的祭坛前。"为他人的自由而战，"他虔诚地低语道。他的手伤痕累累，颤抖着握住了他的剑柄。"运气眷顾大胆的人，"他坚定地说。"变革的使者不会保佑懦夫。"
在月亮卡塔的庇护下，战士将双手举向天空，银色的光芒，一滴月光落入他的手掌中。它变成了一个颜色的漩涡，然后变成了一个小小的金色护身符。战士被惊呆了，当他把{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}按在胸前时，低声祈祷。
大出血的战士在燃烧的战场上一瘸一拐地走向一个哭泣的孩子。当她看到他时，她尖叫起来；他退缩了，但他把她抱了起来，然后带着她走向远处的文明遗迹。
接近睡眠时，蜷缩在一棵树下，披着一条破旧的毯子，战士用手指沿着{@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}的边缘，从它熟悉的形状中找到一些安慰。
在一场雷雨中，战士吼道："为什么？ 阿凡达，这不是我所寻求的变化！告诉我，我为什么要走这一步？告诉我，我为什么要走这些台阶！" 他只听到暴风雨的咆哮声作为回应。他用手捋了捋头发。"告诉我！"

The warrior kneels in front of two moonlit graves bearing the names of his parents. He places incense between them, resting it on a simple box decorated with wedding bells. The box bears the inscription "For those whose love never wavered." Around his neck, he wears the {@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}, which carries the blessings of Avandra the Change Bringer and Sehanine the Moon Weaver.
战士的剑将一只野兽劈成两半。它的尸体倒在血流成河的地面上，与其他许多受害者一起。受伤的战士站在大屠杀之上。两个人从附近的房子里靠出来，然后是四个人。十个。数十人。他们跑到他身边，哭喊着，其中一些人抽泣着。"Apotheon！" "他们说你会来！" "我们知道！"
战士跪在一位精灵君主面前。"我听说了关于你最令人好奇的事情，Alyxian，"精灵抽泣道。"你一直拒绝我给你的称号。土地、财富、仆人。" 战士低声回答："改变命运的力量。这就是我所要求的一切。"
酒馆里的灯光温暖而昏暗，疲惫的战士在那里听着吟游诗人的歌。"不要在红色的月亮下接吻，也不要向甜蜜的眼睛承诺自己！他们会过早地离开去另一个人的家，或者在他们的谎言中串起你的心！"。他们会过早地离开去另一个人的家，或者用他们的谎言串起你的心！" 尽管时间尚早，他还是付了酒钱，离开了。

The warrior stands at the door of a ruined house and peers inside at a huddled, {@condition frightened} family. They draw back when they see him, but he pulls off his cloak and drapes it over a shivering youth. "Go to the city," he rasps. "It is a bastion of hope."
夜晚的空气中弥漫着金属般的血腥味，战士在看到它之前就能感觉到大屠杀。他翻过一座山头，凝视着马奎特南部的一座城市，当鲁伊杜斯的月光将尸体沐浴成红色时，他的心在颤抖，期待与恐惧交织。

Standing in front of a mirror, the warrior considers the toll the Calamity has taken on him—the scars, the {@condition exhaustion} etched into his features, all the result of the endless clash between faith and fear. He clasps the {@item Jewel of Three Prayers|CRCotN}, now complete with the addition of the blessing of Corellon the Arch Heart. "Three divine mantles," he whispers. "Let us all be free of this duty."
一个战士站在神庙顶上，在独眼泰坦的高大身躯下，似乎打算用他人类大小的长矛来测试背叛者神的巨大武器。"我披着月光，"他低声说，闪耀着银色的光环。"我的心被深邃的魔法所武装。" 灿烂的绿色充斥着银色的光环。半神面对格鲁姆什的世界末日之矛。"并以改变命运的力量为武器！" 金色的光芒闪耀，就在神的长矛向下刺去之前，一切都变得黑暗。

entries.name: Rivals in the Netherdeep
entries: In this chapter, the characters' rivals use their tier 3 stat blocks (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}).
除非他们早些时候被击溃或被杀死，否则对手也在试图到达阿普特恩。根据先前事件的发展情况，对手要么在人物的前面，要么在他们的后面。无论如何，你必须选择角色在尼瑟斯底狱第一次遇到对手的时间和地点。如果你不确定这次相遇应该在哪里发生，请选择以下选项之一。

items: 竞争对手在{@area area N1|2e8|x}等待人物的到来。他们的目标是迫使人物逃离，同时警告他们不要再回来。

The two groups meet in {@area area N26|3a9|x}. If the rivals are hostile toward the characters, this is their final stand—a fight to the death. If the rivals are friendly or indifferent toward the characters, they fight as hard as they can but are willing to retreat if the battle turns against them.

entries: 如果人物在跟踪对手，你可以通过让对手留下一些他们最近经过某个地区的痕迹来强调 "比赛正在进行 "的观点。通过在 "对手的证据 "表上滚动来确定他们留下了什么。在任何特定的区域，不要多次使用此表。

entries.caption: Evidence of Rivals
rows: 被对手杀死的一个或多个Netherdeep生物的尸体
一块破碎的盔甲，被扭曲得不成样子
刻在墙上的嘲弄信息，告诉人物他们已经落后了。
丢失或丢弃的武器、弹药、药水瓶或小饰品

entries.name: Race to the Bottom
entries: 如果人物与敌对方有友好关系，阿普特翁就会试图破坏他们的友谊，使两个团体产生矛盾。以下是阿普特翁的干扰的一些表现方式。

items: 在与一个或多个Netherdeep生物发生小规模冲突后，角色们发现对手正在处理他们的伤口。Ayo警告角色们下一个区域可能有威胁或宝藏，但是Apotheon扭曲了位置，使Ayo看起来好像对他们撒谎了。(基本上，人物在不知情的情况下被转移到了地下城的另一个地方。如果他们按原路返回，就会在他们之前去过的地方结束，不会被转移。）
Apotheon对Galsariad低声说，这些人物知道Netherdeep的秘密，但他们拒绝分享。Galsariad痛苦地指责这些人物知道的比他们透露的更多，或者他说服他的同伴们，其中一个人物应该被抓起来审问。
当人物接近发现苦难碎片时，阿普特恩重现了对手的尖叫声，引诱人物到另一个等待危险的地方。

entries: 如果你的目标是把对手变成讨厌的对手，考虑使用以下一种或多种战术。

items: 在人物克服挑战获得苦难碎片后，他们发现对手已经领走了碎片，并留下了某种电话卡。

When the characters arrive at a new location, they find the rivals exiting it, being chased by several creatures snapping hungrily at them. Ayo spots the characters, winks maliciously at them, and casts {@spell pass without trace} on her party, causing the monsters to lose sight of their quarry and turn their attention to the newcomers.
格尔萨里德用他的{@spell telekinesis}法术引发了一条隧道的部分坍塌，阻挡了人物的道路，直到他们花10分钟时间清理瓦砾。

entries.name: Netherdeep Regions
entries: Netherdeep有三个相互连接的区域。
{@area Grottoes of Regret (Areas N1–N9).|2e2|x} 穿过Cael Morrow的裂缝的角色会到达这个区域，这个区域是由Apotheon对未完成的生活的悲哀所塑造的。阿波提翁的记忆和遗憾在这里以各种方式表现出来。
{@area Vents of Fury (Areas N10–N18).|33c|x} 这个地区被火热的喷口照亮，喷出阿普特恩的怒火。这里充满了暴力的生物和阿普特恩的人格碎片。
{@area Chasm of Yearning (Areas N19–N25).|379|x}这些扭曲的幻觉走廊代表了阿波提翁对自由的渴望。该地区的生物和建筑试图让入侵者迷失方向。

The three regions are linked by a central hub ({@area area N26|3a9|x}) that contains the Heart of Despair, a cocoon of pain and misery that the Apotheon has constructed for himself. {@adventure Chapter 7|CRCotN|7} describes the interior of his self-made prison in more detail. Mortal creatures can enter the Heart of Despair only by taking his pain into their souls (see "{@adventure Fragments of Suffering|CRCotN|6|Appendix D: Fragments of Suffering}" earlier in the chapter), thus becoming more like the Apotheon.

entries.name: Grottoes of Regret

entries: 我为他人服务，无私地活着，因为我不知道有别的办法。现在，我被遗忘了，在生与死之间徘徊，我想到的只有对被困扰的、未曾经历过的生命的遗憾。
纹路粗糙的石墙被宏伟的方阵战士的浮雕所打断，他们骄傲地站在那里，对抗着可怕的大军和高耸的泰坦。飘渺的记忆在雕刻的墙壁前徘徊，迷失在无尽的、怀念的梦境中。裂缝变成了蜿蜒的隧道，连接着石窟，阿波提翁把这些石窟作为他悲伤的记忆的容器。
遗憾之窟的墙壁和地板上挂满了像珊瑚一样颜色各异的树叶--通常是鬼魅般的白色，但阴森的颜色也刺穿了更柔和、更茂盛的景观，被发光的深红色脉络的Ruidium打断。

entries.name: Living Memories
entries: 当他们进入某些房间（区域{@area N2|2ec|x}、{@area N3|2f7|x}、{@area N4|2ff|x}、{@area N5|30d|x}和{@area N7|323|x}）时，角色会被传送到非水下的新地点--在那里他们可以与Alyxian过去的角色和地点互动，而实际上并没有改变过去。Netherdeep从未完全与这些准真实的地点隔离。在这些地方的外围出现了Ruidium结构、海草和白色珊瑚，地面上有水坑--这表明Netherdeep离我们并不遥远。
就像活的透视画一样，这些场景不仅仅包括人物目睹Alyxian生活中令他后悔的事件；人物从Alyxian的角度体验这些时刻，并有机会改变他所做的或可能做的事情--不是为了改变过去，而是帮助Apotheon面对他所做的选择。有些玩家会很快弄清这种情况，但其他人可能需要额外的提示。例如，穿着旧式服装和使用晦涩成语的人物可能会暗示人物，他们不仅被带到了另一个地方，而且是另一个时代。

entries.name: Emotional Torment
entries: Netherdeep中的各种效应可以扭曲和放大来访者的情绪，导致他们的行为不理性。他们可能会被诱惑向自己的恶习屈服，直面自己的缺陷，或者以Alyxian的方式遭受痛苦。这个效果没有使用疯狂的规则；相反，来访者正在被未解决的痛苦所折磨，如果角色在最后的对抗中帮助阿利仙达到宣泄，这种区别会使结果更有意义。

entries.name: Roleplaying the Apotheon
entries: 阿普提翁的声音伴随着人物探索悔恨洞窟的过程。在石窟里，阿普特翁的语气是悲哀的，甚至是不情愿的，但却很有帮助。他多年来一直沉浸在这些折磨中，并紧紧抓住这些折磨--这些折磨既是他熟悉的安慰，同时也让他受伤。
阿普特恩在悔恨之窟中从来都只是一个虚无的声音，但他在这个区域比在尼瑟斯底的任何地方都更愿意与角色交谈。当角色们第一次进入某些区域时，阿波提翁把他们从尼瑟斯地府拉出来，并把他们扔到那些让人回想起继续困扰他的过去事件的场景中。他让人物参与这些令人遗憾的情节的原因来自于这些动机中的一个或多个。

items: Alyxian正试图通过别人的眼睛看到一些他害怕的记忆，以获得对他目前被监禁的看法。
本能地、没有恶意地，阿利贤正试图引起党的共鸣。
Alyxian专注于自己的悲剧，忍不住要把别人拉进来。

entries: 你可以为后悔石窟的所有区域选择一种动机，也可以为每个区域选择不同的方案，但要尽力在这个区域同情地描绘阿普特翁。

entries.name: Grottoes of Regret Locations
entries: 遗憾之窟包括尼瑟迪普地图上的N1至N9区域。

entries.name: N1: Antechamber
entries: 当人物第一次通过Cael Morrow的裂缝并进入Netherdeep时，阅读或转述以下内容。
你从平面裂缝中冲出，陷入深沉、寒冷的水中。
Characters who emerge from the rift are immediately subjected to the pressure of the deep (see "{@area Water Pressure|2dd|x}" earlier in the chapter). Describe their surroundings as follows:
你正漂浮在一个空洞的坑的地板上方十英尺，裂缝在你的背后。两座巨大的雕像以尴尬的角度沉入海底。每座雕像都少了头，其中一座雕像伸出了一只手，看起来它可能会抓住任何离它太近的东西。覆盖在雕像上并附着在墙壁上的是水晶卷须，发出昏暗、阴森的红光。一条十英尺高的地道通向这个下沉式密室的外面，里面到处都是成片的海草。

Swimming in the dark water 20 feet above the characters (30 feet above the floor) are two {@creature Light Devourer|CRCotN|devourers} and a {@creature slithering bloodfin|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8} for their stat blocks) that act as sentries. Characters who find themselves outmatched by the monsters or unable to cope with the water pressure can retreat through the open rift and return to Cael Morrow.

entries.name: Statues
entries: 这些覆盖着一层层红宝石的雕像描绘的是阿波提翁的阿利贤，他是一个全盛时期的高贵的战士，但由于缺少头颅，所以很难辨认。头颅无处可寻，象征着Alyxian的自我丧失。

entries.name: N2: Child's Lament
entries: 这个充满水的石窟在南部、东北部和西北部都有通道。这些短小的通道分别通向N1、{@area N3|2f7|x}和{@area N4|2ff|x}区域。
人物第一次进入这个区域时，要读。
当你从海底的阴暗处被带出，进入一个孩子的房间时，水面闪闪发光。简单的舒适物品散落在房间的周围：一只长满瑞德的泰迪熊，一个衬有瑞德尖刺的摇篮，以及一个一侧爬满瑞德卷轴的摇马。简单的玩具散落在地板上，更多的玩具放在小木架上。所有这些玩具都带着Ruidium。
阳光透过两扇小而高的窗户照进房间。你听到外面传来低沉的声音，偶尔有沉闷的砰砰声。
人物被带到了阿廖沙的童年之家，那是一个不大的木制住宅，有三个房间：一个20英尺见方的房间，包含一个厨房和一个生活区，有门通向两个10英尺见方的卧室。人物出现在Alyxian的卧室。厨房外的一扇门通向外面。

entries.title: Alyxian's Childhood Bedroom

entries.name: Alyxian's Toys
entries: A character who examines the rocking horse notices the name "Alyxian" carved on its flank in Common. Characters who want to keep one or more of Alyxian's toys can do so, and those toys remain with the characters after this vision ends. The first time a character picks up one of these toys, the Apotheon whispers, "Such a thing no longer holds a special place in my heart, but it might be worth something to you." These toys prove useful in {@area area N6|31f|x}. Any character who handles a toy without gloves or similar protective gear might be subject to ruidium corruption, at your discretion (see "{@area Ruidium|021|x}" in the {@adventure introduction|CRCotN|0}).

entries.name: Bedroom Windows
entries: Alyxian的卧室有一个10英尺高的天花板和两个窗户。每个窗户是一个2英尺见方的开口，其底部离地面7英尺高。一个中等身材的人物可以通过站在摇马的背上轻松地窥视窗外。

entries.name: Outdoor Scene
entries: Any character who looks out a window or exits the cottage sees two humans being attacked by a band of six people armed with farm implements. The two folks being accosted are representations of Alyxian's parents. His father has a kindly face and a bushy brown beard. His mother has a worry-lined, scarred face. Both have olive skin and wear simple, dirt-stained garments made of a single piece of cloth. Their attackers are shadowy, faceless facsimiles of people draped in worn-out clothes. Red eyes burn from beneath their wide-brimmed hats. These shadowy assailants use the {@creature berserker} stat block, but their weapon attacks deal psychic damage. Their vague forms are due to the fact that Alyxian's memory of them has faded.
只要有一个或多个角色看到外面发生的事情，阿利桑的声音就会对他们耳语。
"你已经找到了我，我的朋友。见证我最早的记忆吧。一个出生在命运多舛的瑞德斯星座的孩子的痛苦。当战争在我们周围肆虐的时候，我们被朋友和亲戚们背叛。许多人因我的存在而受苦，其中以我的父母为最。我的故事从他们开始。他们的故事随我而逝。"
随着一声巨响，其中一个阴暗的身影击中了阿廖沙的父亲，将他打倒在地。
离开小屋的人物不仅目睹了正在发生的这一幕，而且还吸引了袭击者的注意。他们中的四个人断然袭击了人物，而剩下的两个人则继续袭击地上的Alyxian的父母。这两个袭击者在袭击人物的四个人死后才转而与人物作战。
如果角色与无脸攻击者对峙，让玩家为他们的角色掷出主动权，为所有攻击者掷出一个主动权。

entries.name: Placating the Apotheon's Regret
entries: 为了平息Alyxian的这一遗憾，角色们必须努力拯救他的父母。如果在第四回合开始时，袭击者还没有被全部击败，Alyxian的父亲就会因伤势过重而死亡，他的母亲也会被抛弃。对父亲进行魔法治疗可以使他在袭击者手中的死亡时间推迟1个回合。
在攻击过程中，攻击者声嘶力竭地解释为什么小Alyxian和他的父母应该死亡。他们可能会说的例子。

items: "你给我们带来了这种毁灭！"
"怪兽生怪兽！"
"庇护Ruidus的孩子没有任何好处！"

entries: 如果Alyxian的父母被救了，他们会像对Alyxian说话一样对人物说话。
"回屋去吧，阿莱克斯。一切都很好。他们只是不明白。"

If one or more characters offer words of comfort to Alyxian's parents after rescuing them from the assailants, this interaction has a positive effect on the final battle against Alyxian (see "{@area Emotional Healing|3be|x}" in {@adventure chapter 7|CRCotN|7}).

entries.name: Ending the Vision
entries: 一旦这个情节结束，人物就会被送回水下石窟，连同他们所穿戴或携带的任何东西，包括他们从Alyxian的卧室收集的任何玩具。一旦他们回到充满水的房间，Alyxian就在他们的脑海中轻声说了以下的话。
"我从小就明白的是：因为我，他们会一直受苦"。

entries.name: Subsequent Visits
entries: 如果人物离开这个区域，以后再回来，涉及阿利仙童年家园的幻象就不会再出现。在以后的访问中，除了几片海草，这个石窟是黑暗和空旷的。

entries.name: N3: Unforgotten Fallacy
entries: 这个充满水的石窟由一条短隧道与N2区相连。北墙的一条较长的隧道向西弯曲，在通往(1%)的路上从{@area area N4a|306|x}下面经过。
人物第一次进入这个区域时，要读。
当你进入另一段记忆时，这个房间的墙壁闪闪发光。零碎的回忆充斥着你的脑海：你记得阿利仙是个大胆的少年，他想参加村里的狩猎活动。那晚朱红色的月亮照得很圆，你记得阿利贤告诉自己，他有足够的力量来克服它。你记得他穿上斗篷，秘密地参加了狩猎活动。
你的意识转移到了月光下森林中的一块空地。它的美丽被浓郁的血腥味和疯狂的喊叫声所掩盖。

The characters are whisked away to a forest where a hunt has just gone terribly wrong. The misfortune that has followed Alyxian his entire life has now doomed his hunting party. One of the hunt captains, a neutral {@creature drow elite warrior} named Saqiri Yestrana, was mauled by two {@creature Owlbear||owlbears} in the red moonlight, and another hunter caught a glimpse of the young Alyxian before he parted company with Saqiri and darted into the woods.
当人物进入这个场景时，猫头鹰熊正在逃跑，在这个过程中驱散了一群鹿，而萨基里正在流血。当萨基里咳血时，人物听到了猎人发出的以下惊恐的喊声。

items: "这些野兽将帮助我们度过冬天！"。我们现在会很缺钱！"
"Alyxian已经跑了！"
"Saqiri不会成功的！她需要照顾。她需要照顾！"

entries: Alyxian在人物接受了这个场景后，在他们的脑海中轻声说了以下的话。
"我很早就知道了我自私的代价。我只是想--我只是想在他们中间打猎，和他们在一起。" 他叹了口气，沮丧地吼道。"这并不重要。萨基里那晚死了，我将带着这种遗憾，直到我加入她。"

entries.name: Placating the Apotheon's Regret
entries: 为了平息Alyxian的遗憾，角色们必须猎取肉类，治疗Saqiri，或者两者都要。完成一个或两个任务对最后与Alyxian的战斗有积极影响（见{@adventure chapter 7|CRCotN|7}中的"{@area Emotional Healing|3be|x}"）。

entries.name: Hunting for Meat
entries: One or more characters can hunt the owlbears and the deer to bring back meat to the hunters' camp. At least one character must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check to track the owlbears through the forest. As they explore the forest, the characters see beds of long, flowing kelp emerging from among the trees—a hint that the Netherdeep isn't far away. If one or more characters succeed on the check, they encounter the two {@creature Owlbear||owlbears}. When an owlbear dies, its body splits open and a {@creature swarm of sorrowfish|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) bursts out and attacks. These sorrowfish swim through the air as if it were water. Once the swarms are defeated, the characters can take the owlbear meat—enough to sustain the village—back to the hunters' camp. If no characters succeed on the check, they don't encounter the owlbears and find only the carcasses of sickly deer that couldn't keep up with the rest of the herd. If these carcasses are returned to the camp, they provide some edible meat—enough to placate the Apotheon's regret.

entries.name: Healing Saqiri
entries: 四个猎人（{@creature Scout||scouts}）守卫着萨基里。这些猎人形态朦胧，面目模糊，因为阿利仙对他们的记忆已经有些模糊了。

猎人用他们对阿利森的蔑视来看待这些人物，对他们喊道："跟你走！你是我们所有人的诅咒。你是我们所有人的诅咒！" 角色可以通过DC14灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查成功地溜过守卫，从而到达萨基里的身边。一个角色也可以接近守卫，说服他们不要攻击，并成功地进行DC14魅力（{@skill Persuasion}）检查。守卫会攻击任何没有通过这两项检查的角色。试图强行通过守卫的角色也会受到攻击。

Saqiri is {@condition unconscious} and dying from her wounds. If healing restores her to 1 hit point or more, she struggles to sit up and speaks the following words to the character closest to her, as if that character were Alyxian: "Go on, boy. Take one of the carcasses to your ma. Tell her you did a good job tonight. I don't know if a curse truly follows you—but people believe it does, and that's enough for them." The characters then hear Alyxian whisper the following words: "I have watched Saqiri's death a thousand times. It never stops tearing my soul apart—but now I know what she would have said had she lived." More quietly, he adds, "It is not what I expected after so long."

entries.name: Ending the Vision
entries: 一旦这个场景结束，森林就会消失，人物就会回到水下石窟。如果他们在幻象中完成了一个或两个任务，附近的地板上就会出现一个没有上锁的小箱子。根据人物完成的任务，它包含以下奖励。

items: 如果人物治好了萨基里，箱子里有15颗小红宝石（每颗100金币）。
如果人物把猫头鹰肉带回营地，箱子里有两个6英寸高的纯金猫头鹰雕像（每个750金币），一个四肢着地，另一个用后腿抬起。如果他们带着鹿肉回到营地，箱子里有一个3英寸高的鹿的塑像，是用半透明的灰蓝色玉髓雕刻的（150GP）。

entries.name: Subsequent Visits
entries: 如果人物离开这个区域，以后再回来的话，阿利仙第一次狩猎的景象就不会再出现。在以后的访问中，除了几片海草，这个石窟是黑暗和空旷的。

entries.name: N4: Haunted Ashes
entries: 这个充满水的石窟有短小的隧道通往{@area N2|2ec|x}和{@area N5|30d|x}区域。第三条通往{@area area N4a|306|x}的隧道隐藏在一扇暗门后面。
人物第一次进入这个区域时，要读。
这个房间里的水感觉像油一样滑。当淡红色的光晕围绕着你和你的同伴时，你的脊柱一阵颤抖。你们都沉到了密室的底部，当你们的脚接触到地板时，轻轻地落地。
你不再是在水下，而是站在一个被山丘环绕的小村庄的边缘。在村子中间大约一百码的地方发生了一场混战。阴暗的士兵们正在掠夺定居点，而村民们则在徒劳地努力反抗他们。在你采取行动之前，其中一个士兵将他的剑举过头顶，嚎叫道："你应该亲吻我们走过的土地，你们这些没有骨气的懦夫！" 转眼间，他刺死了一个村民，他的死亡哀号在你耳边响起。
人物被传送到了遥远的过去，在灾变时期的一个被洗劫的村庄。

entries.name: Red Halos
entries: 每个角色周围的光环在10英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外10英尺范围内发出暗光。这些光环在人物离开这段记忆并返回Netherdeep时消失。

A character encircled by a red halo leaves blotches of ruidium wherever their feet touch the ground. These ruidium deposits slowly send out tendrils across the ground in the character's wake. In this vision, any successful attack a character makes with a melee or ranged weapon deals an extra 11 ({@dice 2d10}) psychic damage to the target.

entries.name: Raiders
entries: A group of soldiers—allies of Alyxian in the battle against Torog—have decided that since they saved this village, it is theirs to pillage. Four {@creature Sword Wraith Warrior|MPMM|sword wraith warriors} led by a {@creature sword wraith commander|MPMM} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8} for their stat blocks) take the shadowy shape of Alyxian's crass allies. They are bullying a group of ten {@creature Commoner||commoners} in the middle of the village. As the characters approach, the commander, a neutral evil human in his mid-twenties named Kalagothe, looks to them as if they were Alyxian and roars, "Commander Alyxian, these people refuse to pay us tribute!"
让玩家为自己的角色掷出主动权，然后为Kalagothe掷出一个主动权；其余的剑灵在他之后立即按主动权顺序行动。为所有的平民掷一次主动权，但不要浪费时间为他们设计战术；他们在轮到自己的时候会畏缩或从士兵面前退缩。

A character can use an action to try to convince the soldiers to stand down, doing so with a successful DC 27 Charisma ({@skill Intimidation} or {@skill Persuasion}) check. The DC drops to 17 if Kalagothe is dead and only the {@creature Sword Wraith Warrior|MPMM|sword wraith warriors} need to be dealt with. Only three such attempts can be made, after which the sword wraiths are immune to such coercion.
除非士兵被杀或被迫退下，否则他们会抓捕并谋杀平民。

entries.name: Placating the Apotheon's Regret
entries: 如果角色拯救了一个或多个村民，阿普特翁的声音会试探性地低语："在废墟中有时会有亮点。美丽。仁慈。" 这种互动对与阿利仙的最后一战有积极影响（见{@adventure chapter 7|CRCotN|7}中的"{@area Emotional Healing|3be|x}"）。

entries.name: Ending the Vision
entries: If the characters rescue at least five of the ten commoners, the Apotheon whispers to them, "You handled that better than I did. I wish I could have seen their faces happy with relief that they were saved, rather than fraught with sorrow at their losses." After Alyxian speaks these words, the vision fades and the characters are returned to the underwater grotto. As the characters reappear in the grotto, a secret door in the north wall opens (see "{@area Secret Doors|32e|x}" earlier in the chapter). Beyond this door lies a short tunnel leading to a small chamber (area N4a).

entries.name: Subsequent Visits
entries: 如果人物离开这个区域，以后再回来，村庄的景象就不会再出现。在以后的访问中，除了墙边生长的几片海草，这个石窟是黑暗和空旷的。

entries.name: N4a: Fragment of Despondence

entries: 在这个房间的中间，矗立着一个大理石基座，上面漂浮着一粒无花果大小的乳白色光点。一束深红色的能量偶尔会在其发光的表面噼啪作响。在这道光下面的基座上，有一个小小的灰色娃娃，形状像某种四脚动物。
当他们进入这个区域时，人物在脑海中听到了阿普特恩的苦口婆心。
"是的，你放下了希望，因为你知道什么都不会改变。"

entries.name: Doll
entries: 基座上的娃娃看起来像一个摩尔人。它对Alyxian有感情上的价值。如果一个角色拿起它，房间里的每个人都会听到阿普特恩的低语："迈斯卡，我的老朋友。" 这个摩尔比德娃娃可能会被证明对{@area area N6|31f|x}中的人物有用。

entries.name: Fragment of Despondence
entries: The mote of light above the pedestal is the Fragment of Despondence (see "{@adventure Fragments of Suffering|CRCotN|6|Appendix D: Fragments of Suffering}" earlier in the chapter). When a character touches the mote, it disappears and becomes part of the character's soul. When this happens, all the characters receive a fleeting vision (see the {@area Apotheon Lore table|2de|x} earlier in the chapter).
携带 "绝望碎片 "的角色会获得以下好处和坏处，并能意识到这两点。

items.name: Benefit.
items.entry: 你对{@condition charmed}条件免疫。

items.name: Drawback.
items.entry: You can't take the {@action Help} action.

entries: Give the Fragment of Despondence card (see {@adventure appendix D|CRCotN|11}) to the player whose character is carrying the fragment.

entries.name: Tunnel Exits
entries: Two short tunnels lead away from this chamber, one toward area N4 and the other toward area N6. Each tunnel ends at a secret door (see "{@area Secret Doors|32e|x}" earlier in the chapter). A creature leaving this location automatically finds either secret door.

entries.name: N5: Alyxian's Refuge
entries: This water-filled grotto has short tunnels leading to areas {@area N4|2ff|x} and {@area N6|31f|x}. Between them, a longer tunnel travels east, passing under area N4a on its way to {@area area N3|2f7|x}. A fourth tunnel leading to area N5a is hidden behind a secret door.
人物第一次进入这个区域时，要读。
当你的意识与Apotheon的意识融为一体时，你想起了灾变中的一个故事，当时Alyxian在三个女人的家里避难。一夜之间，这些女人给了Alyxian食物，并给了他一张床睡觉。现在，你站在她们家门口，附近种着三块由锯齿状红色水晶制成的难看的墓碑。
在你的脑海中，你听到Alyxian说："他们欢迎我进入他们的家。为什么我记不起他们的名字或脸？请帮助我记住。"
这些人物被传送到了Alyxian记忆中的另一个地方，那是他混乱的过去。当他还是一个注定要被卷入灾祸的年轻人时，Alyxian在一户人家住了一个晚上，毁灭跟着他来到了他们家门口。在Alyxian离开的第二天，村子被洗劫一空，两个女人和他们十几岁的女儿被杀。几个月后，当另一名士兵告诉他村子被毁的消息时，他才知道他们的死讯。Alyxian急切地想记住这三个受害者的名字，这就是为什么这些人物被带到这里。

entries.name: Gravestones
entries: 废墟房屋附近的墓碑是由废墟制成的，没有铭文。墓碑下没有坟墓，所以没有尸体可供检查或用魔法询问。

entries.name: Ruined House
entries: 如果人物探索房子的废墟，请阅读。
尸体和被砸烂的家具散落在房子的一楼，里面有一个客厅和一个厨房以及一个小餐厅。一个损坏的楼梯通向二楼的卧室。
对底层进行彻底搜查后，发现了10具尸体。它们属于三个女人、五个鬼魂和两个身穿血迹斑斑的链式盔甲的人类战士。这些战士显然是为了保护家人不受狰狞者的伤害而被杀害的。所有这些生物看起来都像是几天前死的。

entries.name: Forgotten Names
entries: 为了满足Alyxian，人物必须了解这三个女人的名字。{@creature Marisa|CRCotN}, {@creature Celeste|CRCotN}, 和 {@creature Meri|CRCotN}。{@creature Marisa|CRCotN}是老大，{@creature Celeste|CRCotN}是她的妻子，{@creature Meri|CRCotN}是他们十几岁的女儿。他们的姓氏是Zenthas。{@creature Marisa|CRCotN}的名字可以在厨房里发现，{@creature Celeste|CRCotN}的名字在客厅里，而玛丽的名字在卧室里，如下所述。

items.name: Kitchen.
items.entry: {@creature Marisa|CRCotN} was making a {@item loaf of bread|PHB} when the attack came. A character who spends at least 1 minute searching the kitchen can make a DC 12 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check. On a successful check, the character finds a folded note next to a torn bag of cinnamon spattered with blood and tied shut with a green ribbon. The note reads: "{@creature Marisa|CRCotN}—for that little cake you like so much."

entries.name: Living Room
entries: {@creature Celeste|CRCotN}把客厅作为一个空间，让她沉溺于自己的爱好：制香。药草、瓶子和香棒散落在房间一角的工作台上和地板上。任何花了至少1分钟搜索客厅的人物都可以进行DC12智力（{@skill Investigation}）检查。检查成功后，该角色会发现一本名为《四季的气味》的书躺在椅子下面。书的内页上写着"{@creature Celeste|CRCotN}Zenthas "的名字。

items.name: Bedroom.
items.entry: {@creature Meri|CRCotN}, on the cusp of adulthood, was training to be a soldier. Any character who spends at least 1 minute searching the bedroom can make a DC 12 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check. On a successful check, the character finds the name "{@creature Meri|CRCotN}" carved into the empty sheath of a shortsword.

entries.name: Ghosts of the Remembered
entries: When the characters learn all three names, three {@creature Ghost||ghosts} rise from the women's corpses and attack the intruders until at least one of the ghosts' names is spoken aloud. The ghosts resemble the three women, but they are not restless spirits. Rather, they are manifestations of Alyxian's rage and regret. The characters can destroy these ghosts by reducing each of them to 0 hit points.
如果一个角色用它所像的女人的名字来称呼一个鬼魂，那么这个鬼魂对聚会的态度就会从敌意变成冷漠，而且这个鬼魂对每个角色的称呼就像他们是Alyxian。如果一个角色以Alyxian的名义向鬼魂道歉，因为在它需要的时候没有在它身边，那么鬼魂的态度就会变成友好。
下面的章节描述了这三个女人和她们作为鬼魂的行为。

items.name: Marisa.
items.entry: {@creature Marisa|CRCotN}的鬼魂有淡淡的糖和肉桂的味道。在她第一次参加战斗时，她会哀嚎："我们的家，被玷污了！" 如果一个角色直呼{@creature Marisa|CRCotN}的鬼魂的名字并代表Alyxian向她道歉，鬼魂会说："Alyxian! 当他们来找我们时，我担心他们也会杀了你。能听到你的声音真好。你要好好的，不要哀伤。没有人能伤害我们了。" 说完这些话后，鬼魂渐渐消失了。

entries.name: Celeste
entries: {@creature Celeste|CRCotN}的鬼魂有淡淡的香火味。在她第一次参加战斗时，她咆哮道："我们庇护了他！我们为他而死！我们为他而死！" 如果一个角色直呼(1%)的鬼魂的名字，并代表Alyxian向她道歉，鬼魂的脸色会变得柔和，并说："我愿意为你而死，被月亮诅咒和被月亮祝福的人。如果需要的话，一千次。" 说完这些话后，鬼魂渐渐消失了。

items.name: Meri.
items.entry: {@creature Meri|CRCotN} has wavy, shoulder-length hair, strong arms, and sharp eyes. The resemblance to {@creature Marisa|CRCotN} is unmistakable. She doesn't speak unless she is addressed by name. If a character does so and then apologizes to {@creature Meri|CRCotN} on behalf of Alyxian, she says, "I died a soldier, like my mother. What happened was neither our fault nor yours. Be well, Alyxian." After speaking these words, the ghost fades away.

entries.title: Three ghosts of women from Alyxian's past haunt a ruined house

entries.name: Placating the Apotheon's Regret
entries: 如果一个或多个鬼魂得到安息，阿利贤就会得到安抚。在大声说出鬼魂的名字后，他又说："爬行王的部落摧毁了他们，而我却没有去帮助他们。然而他们原谅了我。这真的是全部吗？"

Each ghost that vanishes on its own instead of being defeated in combat has a positive effect on the final battle against Alyxian (see "{@area Emotional Healing|3be|x}" in {@adventure chapter 7|CRCotN|7}).

entries.name: Ending the Vision
entries: When all three ghosts are destroyed or vanish on their own, the characters are returned to the underwater grotto. A secret door opens in the northwest wall, revealing a narrow tunnel that leads to area N5a (see "{@area Secret Doors|32e|x}" earlier in the chapter).

entries.name: Subsequent Visits
entries: 如果人物离开这个区域，以后再回来，就不会再出现废墟房屋的景象了。在以后的访问中，除了几片海草，这个石窟是空的。

entries.name: N5a: Fragment of Attachment

entries: 在这个石窟的中心，从地板上升起的是一个大理石基座，上面漂浮着一缕缕的光。
一个或多个角色第一次进入这个区域时，所有角色都会听到阿利仙在他们的脑海中低声说以下的话。
"这些遗憾是我的全部。剩下的就是走我走过的路，走到这里。"

entries.name: Fragment of Attachment
entries: The mote of light above the pedestal is the Fragment of Attachment (see "{@adventure Fragments of Suffering|CRCotN|6|Appendix D: Fragments of Suffering}" earlier in the chapter). When a character touches the mote, it disappears and becomes part of the character's soul. When this happens, all the characters receive a fleeting vision (see the {@area Apotheon Lore table|2de|x} earlier in the chapter).
携带附着物碎片的角色获得以下好处和缺点，并能意识到这两点。

items.name: Benefit.
items.entry: You can't be {@condition frightened} while within 10 feet of an ally. If you're already {@condition frightened} and move within 10 feet of an ally, the {@condition frightened} condition ends on you.

items.name: Drawback.
items.entry: 当你不在盟友的10英尺范围内时，你在智慧和魅力的救赎上有劣势。

entries: Give the Fragment of Attachment card (see {@adventure appendix D|CRCotN|11}) to the player whose character is carrying the fragment.

entries.name: Tunnel Exits
entries: 这间屋子里有两条隧道：一条向东通往N5区，另一条螺旋式下降，从东边的隧道下穿过，然后在一条更宽的隧道的墙壁上打开，连接{@area N10|340|x}和{@area N11|345|x}区。每条隧道的尽头都有一个秘密门（见本章前面的"{@area Secret Doors|32e|x}"）。离开这个地方的生物会自动找到其中一个秘密门。
这个房间里充满了令人神魂颠倒的美丽海藻和幽灵般的白色珊瑚。房间中间的一个石质祭坛上雕刻着独眼巨人的头骨和抓着的手。
一道由红色能量构成的屏障覆盖了北墙的一个门洞，在门洞外你可以看到另一个水底室。门口上方用普通话刻着以下铭文。
{@i Apotheon, Apotheon}.
{@i Leave your childhood yearnings behind.}
{@i It is time to don your armor and go to war.}

entries.name: Altar
entries: 检查祭坛并成功通过DC13智力({@skill Religion})检查的人物可以认出它的图像是格鲁姆什和托罗格神的象征。在这个祭坛上放置某些物品可以帮助人物绕过红色能量之门（见下文）。

entries.name: Door of Red Energy
entries: 这个魔法屏障不受伤害，但可以用一个成功的{@spell dispel magic}(DC19)来否定。任何接触到门的生物都必须进行DC15的宪法救赎。如果救赎失败，该生物会受到35({@dice 10d6})的力量伤害，并被推离门10英尺远。如果救赎成功，该生物将受到一半的伤害并且不会被推开。

If the characters can't dispel the door, they can place a sentimental item from Alyxian's childhood on the altar ("Leave your childhood yearnings behind"), which causes the item to disappear and dispels the door for 8 hours. Items that qualify include a toy taken from Alyxian's childhood bedroom ({@area area N2|2ec|x}) and the moorbounder doll found in {@area area N4a|306|x}. A character can substitute a trinket or toy from their own childhood, with the same effect. Any item that disappears from the altar can't be retrieved by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.
此外，在这个密室或N7区穿上盔甲的角色可以通过门洞（"是时候穿上盔甲去打仗了"）。进入这两个密室的角色如果已经穿上了盔甲，就必须先脱下盔甲，然后再穿上，才能安全通过门洞。

entries.title: Sword wraiths haunt a vision of the ancient past, with the Netherdeep never far away

entries.name: N7: Battle at the Betrayers' Rise
entries: 当人物第一次进入这个区域时，描述如下。
这个水下墓穴的屋顶有三个自然形成的圆顶，每个圆顶离地面约30英尺。墙壁上有Ruidium的脉络，形成一个格子，将红色的光投射在沿着房间周边生长的海草丛中。
人物只有几秒钟的时间来观察周围的环境，然后他们就被带到了另一个时间和地点。
水下的阴霾让位给一个场景，显示出凄凉的灰暗天空下的枯竭战场。在你的周围，朦胧的人影碰撞着刀剑，空气中充满了战斗的呐喊和战争的鼓声。
远处看起来很熟悉的黑色塔楼提供了线索，告诉你现在的位置和时间：在灾变中最激烈的战斗之一的背叛者崛起之门。在这场冲突中，阿利仙与爬行王的部落作战，取得了来之不易的胜利。在这个版本的场景中，似乎，这场战斗的输赢是由你来决定的。
人物正在经历阿波提翁对一场可怕的战斗的记忆。战场的大部分被冲突的军队所占据--Alyxian的盟友与爬行之王Torog的怪物群对抗。这些生物有着朦胧的形态和朦胧的面孔，反映出Alyxian对它们的记忆已经有些淡化，而且它们中的大多数都无视这些人物。

entries.name: Battle Rules
entries: 随着周围战斗的进行，角色们即将面对三波敌人（如下所述），除了自卫，他们没有什么选择。让玩家指定一个角色在战斗期间充当队伍的领袖。(可以是魅力值最高的角色，也可以是习惯上在团体中担任领导角色的角色）。这个角色在整个战斗中仍然是指定的领袖，即使他们被杀或无法行动。一旦确定了领导者，让玩家为他们的角色掷出主动权，而你则为每一波进入战场的敌对生物掷出主动权。当第二波和第三波出现时，角色不需要重新滚动主动权。在这场战斗中，角色不能进行短期或长期休息。

The characters can move anywhere they want on the battlefield, but a character who moves farther than 30 feet from the party leader or starts their turn in such a location takes 16 ({@dice 3d10}) psychic damage from the chaos around them, even if the leader is dead or {@condition incapacitated}. A character can take this damage no more than once per turn.

entries.name: First Wave
entries: This wave consists of one {@creature sword wraith warrior|MPMM} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) per character, up to a maximum of five. These grim knights represent the evil soldiers of the Crawling King. As the battle is joined, Alyxian chimes in:
"过了这么久，他们的面孔已经消逝在过去的阴霾中。我试图记住他们--不是我的敌人，而是那些与我并肩作战的士兵。我至少可以做的是涉足战斗的中心地带，那里的痛苦已经是最严重的，并把它全部纳入我的身体。"
Alyxian的话语应该让人明白，只有征服一波又一波的敌人，才能平息这场战斗。

entries.name: Second Wave
entries: After the first wave is defeated, the characters have 2 rounds to heal and prepare for the second wave: two {@creature Moorbounder|EGW|moorbounders} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) accompanied by five {@creature Sword Wraith Warrior|MPMM|sword wraith warriors}. Before the characters can do anything to prevent it, the sword wraiths merge into one creature—a {@creature slithering bloodfin|CRCotN} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8}) that swims through the air as easily as it normally swims through water. The howling faces of the warriors are visible on the bloodfin's flesh. The bloodfin is not what the Apotheon sought to conjure in this moment; rather, it represents Alyxian's inability to keep the Netherdeep from intruding upon his memories.
当第二波被打败时，阿利仙的盟友们齐声怒吼，阿利仙也跟着附和。
"你把它们砍下来，没完没了，就像收割者手中的镰刀。你杀了多少人并不重要。你用鲜血浇灌土地，你的盟友还是会死。"

entries.name: Third Wave
entries: After the second wave is defeated, the characters have 1 round to heal and prepare for the final wave: a {@creature sword wraith commander|MPMM} and four {@creature Sword Wraith Warrior|MPMM|sword wraith warriors} on the back of a {@creature horizonback tortoise|EGW} (see {@adventure appendix A|CRCotN|8} for these creatures' stat blocks). Alyxian shares his thoughts as the tortoise lumbers toward the party:
"为了打断爬行王部落的脊梁，我知道我必须同时杀死指挥官和乌龟。我不记得我先杀了哪一个。"

When the commander drops to 0 hit points, it lets out a terrible scream, and any remaining sword wraith warriors flee on their next turn. When the tortoise drops to 0 hit points, it falls {@condition prone} and lets out one last shudder before expiring. The characters are victorious when both the commander and the tortoise are slain.

entries.name: Placating the Apotheon's Regret
entries: When all three waves of foes are defeated, Alyxian's allies cheer as the enemy is routed. A {@creature veteran} covered in blood limps toward the characters and says, "You won the day, brave Alyxian. My wounds burn, but if you command it, I will follow you to the end." Alyxian whispers an answer that only the characters can hear: "It never ends." The wounded soldier, named Talmyth, has 1 hit point. If a character heals him, that act has a positive effect on the final battle against Alyxian (see "{@area Emotional Healing|3be|x}" in {@adventure chapter 7|CRCotN|7}).

entries.name: Secret Doors
entries: Once the battle has ended and the scene with Talmyth has played out, the characters are returned to the underwater grotto. At the same time, two secret doors open in the north wall (see "{@area Secret Doors|32e|x}" earlier in the chapter). Behind one secret door is a narrow, dimly lit tunnel that connects to area N7a; behind the other is {@area area N8|336|x}.

entries.name: Subsequent Visits
